1b1('dul ba): / 'dul bgrazhi// dam pang drug pa// thams cad
1b2('dul ba): zil gnon thams cad gzigs// thub pa 'jig rten kun la spyan/
1b3('dul ba): sred pa thams cad zad pa brnyes// sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyi ni mdzod//
2a1('dul ba): #/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad rig/ thub chen thams cad mngon
2a2('dul ba): par mkhyen// 'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das// chos kun gyi ni pha rol gsheg
2a3('dul ba): bsam pa kun la mkhas pa po// sred pa thams tud rab tu bcom// sems can kun
2a4('dul ba): la phan dgongs pa// mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol// bag la nyal kun btud nas
2b1('dul ba): ni/ 'ching ba thams cad yang dag bcad// sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste// thub pa chos rnams ston par
2b2('dul ba): mdzad// sems dpa' chen po shes rab che// brtson 'grus chen po grags pa che// chos chen 'od ni chen pa pa//
2b3('dul ba): chos chen don gyi pha rol gshegs// klu chen seng ge chen po pa// dge slong chen po drang srong che// shes rab chen
2b4('dul ba): po'i ral gri mtshon// nyon mongs chen po rab tu bcom// stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che// brtan pa
2b5('dul ba): chen po pha rol gnon// byang chub chen po brnyes pa gang // dgra chen rnams las rnam par rgyal// nad chen
3a1('dul ba): #/ po yi dpyad mdzad pas// bcom ldan sman pa chen po legs// 'dod chags chen po zil gnon la// sman chen po
3a2('dul ba): ni stsol ba po// 'khor ba chen po'i btson ra na// 'ching ba chen pos bcings rnams la// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// 'ching ba
3a3('dul ba): kun las grol bar mdzad// skyes bu chen po lha chen po// tshogs rnams kyi ni tshogs chen ldan// sbyin pa'i mchog ni sbyin chen po//
3a4('dul ba): zhi ba chen po'i go 'phang reg/ sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog/ de bzhin rnam par 'dren mchog brnyes// nyan thos mchog ni
3a5('dul ba): phun sum tshogs// chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i mchog/ g.yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu
3a6('dul ba): 'os rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog/ mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang ldan// bcom ldan srid las rab tu grol// srid pa'i
3b1('dul ba): ga' phrulas 'phags smra/ byud pa'i 'ad rgyags gnanas bcud// med pa'i sred parab tu bcogamachen pan bsgoms byasnyas 'gas dang
3b2('dul ba): rlung ba sangs u yi rgyal po rnams kyi gnas/ mdzes pa yi mtsho chen du/ khams cad b+ha ba b+has bA lI/ na po sna rnams kyis mdudu byas te/ #
3b3('dul ba): dang thabs gcig tu// rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' las gshegs/ chub de'i 'gram rab tu/ pa'i sats+tsha kA ni bzhugs nas ni/ sa sku brtse bu thugs rje /
3b4('dul ba): can kun lnga pa na mdzad pas/ ma tshol gzigs nas dge slong la// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang / nga yi tshig 'di mtshan par gyis/
3b5('dul ba): ni sngon gyi tshe rabs su/ g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gyur/ rang sangs rgyas ni legs spen te// sngon med la ni skur ba btob/ skye bo'i tshogs chen lhags nas su/ thub
3b6('dul ba): ba ches kyi yon tan dga'/ bcing ba dam pos de bcings nas/ grong khyer nas ni phreng ba dang / dge sbyong bcing bas dam bcings nas// sdug bsngal gyur te nga yis mthong /
3b7('dul ba): de la snying rje bskyed nas kyang / nga nyid kyis ni thar bar byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ dmyal ba rnams su yun rings 'phangs/ slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ ngas
4a1('dul ba): ni skur pa thob par gyur/ de nas las kyi lhag mas kyang / nga yi yang srid tha ma la/ mu stegs rnams kyis mdzes ma'i phyir/ yang dag ma yin skur
4a2('dul ba): pa btab// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/ gsang tshig 'dzin cing mang thos pa// bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni// tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe// mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu 'phrul
4a3('dul ba): ches byin chen drang srong der 'ongs pa/ bkur sti byed pa ngas mthong nas/ skyon med la ni skur pa btab/ drang song 'di ni 'dod spyod ces/ ngas ni bram ze'i khye'u la smras/
4a4('dul ba): bram ze'u khye'u rnams nga yi tshig / thos nas rjes su yi rang zhing // de nas bram ze khye'u rnams kyis// khyim dang khyim du slong ba na// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces/
4a5('dul ba): skye bo mang po dag la smras// las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang // mdzes ma kho ra'i rgyu las ni/ skur pa dag ni thob par gyur// sangs rgyas thams
4a6('dul ba): cad zil gnon gyi// nyan thos gyur pa gnas 'jog bu// de tshe dge sbyong de la ni// ngas ni mi bden skur pa btab/ sdig pa'i las de byas pas na/ mi bzad ngan 'gror song nas ni/
4a7('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ nga la bram ze rtsa mis 'dir// skye bo'i tsho gas ni 'dus pa na/ yang
4b1('dul ba): dag ma yin skur ba btab/ nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par// ngas ni g.yas khyim nu bo ni/ ri yi gseb tu bcug nas su// ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bstan/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des/
4b2('dul ba): dmyal bdag tu yun rings 'bangs// rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/ sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas nI// lnga sbyin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te/ gang yi zhabs
4b3('dul ba): kyi mthe bo nI/ rdo ba'i dum bus rma yang phyung // rgya mtsho yi ni thu bo ches/ rgya mtsho la ni 'gro bAn// grun 'dug pa'i tshong ba ni/ mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur/ las
4b4('dul ba): rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams su yun rings 'phangs// de yi las kyi lhag mas nga'i// zhabs la tshal ba zug par gyur// sngon ni nye ba'i grong khyer gyi/ zla ba'i drar
4b5('dul ba): ri byung ba na// nya rnams gsod par byed pa dang / gaming dga' ba ni skyes par gyur/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ gang nI dmyal bar yun rings 'brangs/ rab tu tsha dang thig nag dang
4b6('dul ba): sdug bsngal mang po rkyong bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// gang po chen 'phags skyes pos/ rnams nI gsod pa na// mang pa mi 'i bang nad kyis thibs// rnam par/
4b7('dul ba): gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi// nyan thos yongs su spang byas te// khyed ni nas dag pa bar 'os// khyed la 'bras ni mi rigs zhes// ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /
5a1('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba thig nag rnams su ni/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ dam mthar dbyar na/
5a2('dul ba): gnas bcas te// bram ze yis ni spyan drangs tshe// zla ba gsum du nas dag zos// da ni sman par gyur pa nA// tshong dpon bu pho 'khrur 'jug tshe/ nad kyi sdug bsngal/
5a3('dul ba): gyur pa la// sman ma yin pa ngas byin no// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// de 'dra'i 'khru ba'i nang//
5a4('dul ba): kyis thebs// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ nga ni mthu can gyang gyur tshe/ stobs dag 'gyed par byed pa na// ngas ni gyad kyi bu zhig bsad// las kyi rnam par smin
5a5('dul ba): pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// 'di na nga yi rgyab srung ngo // sngon ni ngan spong bur gyur pa// dga' skyong la ni smras pa ni//
5a6('dul ba): mgo reg ngas mthong ci zhig bya/ 'di la byang chub yod ma yin/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa des// 'dir yang mir ni 'ongs pa ni// khyim ma
5a7('dul ba): bar ni rab byung nas/ byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lteng rgyas 'gram du lo drug tu/ mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong / sems can/
5b1('dul ba): kur gyi rab mchog gis// chos kyi dam pa thugs chud nas// sdig pa'i las ni gang mdzad pa/ tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to// thams cad zil gnon spobs brnyes kyis/
5b2('dul ba): srang dge 'dun srung bzhugs nas/ ma dros pa yis mtsho chen du/ gnyid kyi 'phrin las lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u sam cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas
5b3('dul ba): ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu/ mtsho chen po ma dres par 'phrin las kyi chu ba lung bstan nas/ ma dzes pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i
5b4('dul ba): sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so// ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gas/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi sdang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod du gshegs nas// mnyan
5b5('dul ba): bod kyi bdag gi khang bzangs kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas
5b6('dul ba): cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
5b7('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros par/ rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag lags pa dang thabs gcig tu sang
6a1('dul ba): bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gas gnang bar rig nas zhes bya
6a2('dul ba): ba nas bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/
6a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/
6a4('dul ba): yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan la sa bzhengs te gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
6a5('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la ma rdzogs pa yod de/ des dge
6a6('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/ 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong khyer thig/
6a7('dul ba): ba can du byon nas/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byang phyogs kyi grong khyer shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so// grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom
6b1('dul ba): ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ga zos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khru nas khrur zad cings 'dus
6b2('dul ba): zong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste ldags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas pa zhes bya ba nas
6b3('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las latra
6b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
6b5('dul ba): gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la
6b6('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das
6b7('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas yi dgas rus gong sbrel ba bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi sgras yog pa lho ri tsam/ kha khab kyi mig cas
7a1('dul ba): 'bar rab tu 'baran rab tu 'bar te/ me ldegaN+DIg tu gyur pa sdu bcwa bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas yongs
7a2('dul ba): su bskor te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag gi he dur gyur pa legs na/ kye ma bcom ldan
7a3('dul ba): 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed
7a4('dul ba): cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yon sngo ba byed pa'i tshe 'ong na ni/ khyed cag gi ming nas yon bsngo ba bya'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das g.yar tsha lags na/ ji ltar mchi lags
7a5('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo tsha med la ngo tsha byed/ ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha// 'jigs pa med la 'jigs par lta// 'jigs pa la ni mi
7a6('dul ba): 'jigs lha/ log pa'i lta ba blangs pas na/ sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ ngo tsha ba la ngo tsha dang / ngo tsha med la ngo mtshe/ mi 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs lta/ 'jigs pa/
7a7('dul ba): la ni 'jigs lta ba'i// yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis// sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro// de rnams kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na mchi lags so//
7b1('dul ba): de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ sUr/
7b2('dul ba): ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs pa dang / de nas grong
7b3('dul ba): khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis yi dgas rnams mthong nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir
7b4('dul ba): 'bros de rnams kyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das yi dgas 'o ni rig mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa tshur shog/ 'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no//
7b5('dul ba): gal te khyed cag gis gnang na ngas 'di rnams kyi gal te khyed cag gis gnang na ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rung lags so//
7b6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis de rnams kyi ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de/ sbyin pa 'di yis bsod nams gang // de ni yis dgas rjes 'gro zhing /
7b7('dul ba): 'di dag yi dgas 'jig rten ni/ mi bzad pa nas zur ldang shig de yis gos dang skom dang zas/ gnas mal rnam pa sna chags pa dus kun tu ni ma zad par/ de rnams la ni grub par
8a1('dul ba): shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstun yang dag par
8a2('dul ba): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim
8a3('dul ba): bdag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing tshogs nas/ 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi btam dag gleng bar byed de/ kye dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen che zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen che ba
8a4('dul ba): yin no// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhe na chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ste/ mu stegs can rnams ni de lta ma yin no// /
8a5('dul ba): de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams
8a6('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dod zhen che 'am/ 'dod zhen chung ba dang / de'i nyan thos rnams 'dod zhen che 'am/ 'dod zhen chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par bya'o//
8a7('dul ba): de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /
8b1('dul ba): thabs gcig la/ bdag gis bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
8b2('dul ba): de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
8b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze spu 'dod kyi seng ge klan ka tshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan drangs kyis/ khyed cag las gang gis ji
8b4('dul ba): tsam yog pa des de tsam zhig blang bar bya'o// bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge la bu ram 'tshong ba'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas/ des bu ram gyi khang pa re re nas/ bu ram gyi snod blangs te/ bu ram gyi snod lnga
8b5('dul ba): brgya khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u ta ma bu ram bsdogs lags na/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs
8b6('dul ba): gcig tu bzhugs te/ longs spyad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bcabs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod
8b7('dul ba): kyi seng ges bu ram gyi snod gcig blangs te brim par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du brims kyang lhag pas/ thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'dug pa de ltar byin gyis brla/
9a1('dul ba): so/ de nas bram ze spa 'dod kyi seng ge mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas de dang bskyes nas phyogs mtha' dag tu sgra bsgrags pa shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u tam ni 'dod zhen chu/
9a2('dul ba): zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no// de nas mu stegs can rnams bu ram la longs spyod du gzhug pa'i phyir mgron du bos pa dang / de rnams kyis bu ram bag med par blangs
9a3('dul ba): nas kha cig gis ni longs spyad do// kha cig gis ni snod bka' nas bor zhing khyer te song ngo // de nas bram ze spu 'dod kyi seng ges smras pa/ skyes bu blun po khyed cag kho na 'dod zhen che ba
9a4('dul ba): yin la dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhe na chung zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dang bar gyur te/
9a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
9a6('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas tshangs par spyad par brgya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chur shig ces
9a7('dul ba): bya ba nas/ dge slong nur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cog ces gsungs pas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
9b1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dus sam dus ma yin pa 'am/ nub 'am/ myin bas bu rab la longs spyad pa/
9b2('dul ba): bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa spu 'dod kyi seng ge ro myags pa'i dri mo zhim pas/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid mthob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa
9b3('dul ba): dge slong sA 'dod kyi seng ge ni/ srid pa tha ma pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam du gongs na/ lus rul pa'i dri mi zhim pa las gyur par gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra/
9b4('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge'i gtsug lag khang dri dang / be tog gi 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams
9b5('dul ba): kyis gtor la/ gnas mal la yang bdug pas bdug cing / me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs res shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
9b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan to// ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba de'i bar du de'i gtsug lag khang du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin thams cad byas so//
9b7('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / lha'i 'byor pa mthong nas/ de nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms la longs
10a1('dul ba): spyad de/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nasaskyil mo krung bcas te/ lus
10a2('dul ba): drang por bsrang nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug pa dang / dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sems mnyam par gzhag par skyes so// de nas des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
10a3('dul ba): te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ mngon du smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
10a4('dul ba): dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dang / nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge 'di yin no// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes
10a5('dul ba): nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni/ mi sdug pas rnam par grol na/ tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge
10a6('dul ba): sdug pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya bsdud mar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing de nyid
10a7('dul ba): du skyes te/ da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnams su skyes pa na/ lus rul pa'i dri mnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o// dri zhim po'i dri mnam nas sems mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas
10b1('dul ba): rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur na/ dro bar gyur pa yang 'dis bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ gzhan gang zhig/
10b2('dul ba): sdug pa'i 'di lta bus rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba des rim pa de lta bu bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
10b3('dul ba): te yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom
10b4('dul ba): ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so//
10b5('dul ba): thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u
10b6('dul ba): gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes grag gis/ gal te bdag cag re re nas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na ni/ bcom ldan 'das slar
10b7('dul ba): gshegs dang / gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas/ de la khrims shig bcas te/ ci nas kyang cho gas shing 'dus pa kho nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol gyi
11a1('dul ba): mi gcig pus ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas bzhag go/ de'i tshe yangs pa can na bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa bzhi gnas te
11a2('dul ba): nor can dang / nor can gyi rlung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma'o// de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang mi rnams kyi g.yang babs par gyur to// de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa de ma thos par/
11a3('dul ba): khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i
11a4('dul ba): gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cad
11a5('dul ba): mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo
11a6('dul ba): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyong zhing mchis na
11a7('dul ba): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ khyim bdag nor can la gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
11b1('dul ba): bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim
11b2('dul ba): bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi
11b3('dul ba): sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar/
11b4('dul ba): khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan drangs zin to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor can gyis ni tshogs kyi khrims bcas pa las 'das par byas so// kha cig dag gis
11b5('dul ba): smras pa/ ci ste de 'das par byed/ gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa ma thos so// 'on kyang bdag cag pas de ni skyes bu dam pa yin pas/ gdugs tshod gsol du chub bdag cag
11b6('dul ba): sa ni gnangs gdugs chod gsol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na der song
11b7('dul ba): ste byin nas/ shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong nas de nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smras so//
12a1('dul ba): khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa 'phags pa kun
12a2('dul ba): dga' bo ci ste de skang gsung khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams su gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs khyim bdag shar nas/
12a3('dul ba): so/ 'phags pa lho nas zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa las ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas
12a4('dul ba): kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag nor can gyi spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod pa shams lags shing mchis
12a5('dul ba): na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
12a6('dul ba): stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te bcom
12a7('dul ba): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi
12b1('dul ba): sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi chung ma la gnang ngo // gnang nas kyang khyim bdag nor can kha chos
12b2('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// nor can gyi chung mas kyang zhal zas rnams sta gon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang /
12b3('dul ba): chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo //
12b4('dul ba): mthong nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa ga/ 'phags
12b5('dul ba): ba ci ste de skad gsung gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs lho nas so// 'phags pa shar nas zhugs shig/
12b6('dul ba): ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i spyan 'dzin gyis
12b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das nga de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs
13a1('dul ba): te lhung bzed gyur pa rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor
13a2('dul ba): can gyi bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/
13a3('dul ba): sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi bu la gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi chung
13a4('dul ba): ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed
13a5('dul ba): dang chos gos thogs te/ nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
13a6('dul ba): nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung //
13a7('dul ba): gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs lho nas so// 'phags pa nub nas zhugs shig/ ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing /
13b1('dul ba): zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// denas nor can gyi bu'i sun 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshong gsol ba btsun pa gdung/
13b2('dul ba): chotsho bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur pa rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/
13b3('dul ba): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
13b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
13b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze
13b6('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug
13b7('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
14a1('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud/
14a2('dul ba): debacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar
14a3('dul ba): mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar nor can gyi mna' mas spyan drangs zin to// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rngams/
14a4('dul ba): nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nor can gcig pu la nor yod kyis bdag cag la med dam/ ci na des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nyi ma re re gdugs chod gsol zhing / bdag/
14a5('dul ba): cag kho nas skabs ma thob par gyur/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas gshegs par gyur/
14a6('dul ba): pa de'i tshe/ de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te gzhig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song
14a7('dul ba): ste phyin nas nub sgo nas zhugs na gdan ma bshams shing zhal zes kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nor can gyi mna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so// nor can gyi mna' ma
14b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi ge 'dun rnams spyan drangs na ci si las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa kyi ste de skad gsung / gdanam bshams shing zhal zas rnams kya
14b2('dul ba): gon ma byas par mthong ngo // 'phags pa chab skogang nas zhugs nub nas so// 'phags pa byang nas zhugs ni// de nas byang nas zhugs na/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan ba shams shing lha'i zhal
14b3('dul ba): zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tung mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma'i spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tsho
14b4('dul ba): bgams lags shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par 'khyen pa mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gangan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong
14b5('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag thams cad 'dus nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi sngon 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad
14b6('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag yangs gakyi tshigs rngams nas skyon 'dug ste/ de dag gis khyed la gnod pa byas par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ song la bzod pa gsol cig/ de phyir byungs/
14b7('dul ba): bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis spras pa/ khyim bdag ci khyod gcig pu la nor yod dam/ gang gi phyir khyed kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
15a1('dul ba): gdugs tshod gsol te/ kho bo cag gis skabs mi rnyed par byed/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/ de bas na
15a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bzod par bya ba'i rigs so// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas 'di la bzod par bya'o zhes de rnams bzod par gyur pa dang / des
15a3('dul ba): smras pa/ gal te de lha na nang du zhugs shig/ de rnams khyim du zhugs pa dang / gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo//
15a4('dul ba): mtshar skyes par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os kyi/ kho bo cag ni ma yin no// des de rnams la rin po
15a5('dul ba): che dag byin pa dang / de rnams kyis ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin po che 'di dag ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ long zhig/ de rnams kyis blangs pa las/
15a6('dul ba): gang gis ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog de 'dra ba kho nar snang bar gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang
15a7('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gru bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan
15b1('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang nor can gyi mna' ma rnam
15b2('dul ba): kyi bsam pa dang / bag l+yA ny+dzal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos na nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' marnams
15b3('dul ba): kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs
15b4('dul ba): bar byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags so zhes
15b5('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag drug bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge
15b6('dul ba): bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mche bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nor can gyi chung
15b7('dul ba): ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag
16a1('dul ba): par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gangan las bzhengs te gshegs so// / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po nga bdun pa// dge slong
16a2('dul ba): rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa nor can dang / nor can gyi mchis brang dang / nor can gyi bu dang nor can gyi mna' ma rnams
16a3('dul ba): kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal nyams su myong bar gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
16a4('dul ba): pa dge slong dag 'di rnams kho nas las rnams byas shing bsag pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si na
16a5('dul ba): tog 'phreng rgyung mkhan zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed
16a6('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so// des de yang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs so// de dus phyi zhig na bkren zhing shin tu bkren par gyur nas/ de dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / mna' mas
16a7('dul ba): brtson pa chen pos 'bad pas/ dar yug gcig cig grub nas/ de nas me tog 'phreng rlung mkhan yang de bgos nas rgyal po la me tog 'phreng 'bul me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi chung ma yang de nyid bgos nas btsun mo la
16b1('dul ba): 'bul/ me tog 'phreng rlung mkhan gyi bu yang de nyid bgos nas gzhon nu rnams la 'bul me tog 'phreng chung mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid bgos nas rgyal po'i mna'am rnams la me tog 'phreng 'bul bar byed do//
16b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ gnas mal bas mtha' la bsten pa/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas
16b3('dul ba): na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ nyi ma nub ka'i dus su wA rA NA sir phyin nas/ me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum ra nub mo gnas btab ste/ me'i khams la sgo/
16b4('dul ba): par zhugs so// de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan des/ me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bur mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ chung ma la smras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des bu la smras pa dang / de yang
16b5('dul ba): dad par gyur to// des mna' ma la spras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar rtsams pa/ bdag cag sang zan ma zos kyang bla / 'dus la/ rab byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can
16b6('dul ba): 'di bshos gsol lo// de nas nam langs nas/ de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phul lo// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyis spras pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i ras kyi bgo skal gang yin pa de ni rab tu byung ba 'di
16b7('dul ba): la dbul lo// des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbul lo// bus smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// mna' mas smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// de nas de rnams 'dus nas/ de la
17a1('dul ba): ras bskon to// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyi chos sto gyi tshig gis ma yin pas/ de nas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas
17a2('dul ba): 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas shing rtsa nas bcad pa bzhin
17a3('dul ba): du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su
17a4('dul ba): skye zhing bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang 'bab par gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur
17a5('dul ba): cig ces byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtse bas rdzu 'phrul byas nas rgyal po'i khab kyi steng na phar chas te song ba dang / de'i grib mas rgyal po'i steng du bab pa dang / de gdong
17a6('dul ba): bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag nyid chen po 'dis yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i rtsa ba phyung bar gyur snyam mo// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po la/
17a7('dul ba): me tog 'bul ba'i dus gang yin pa de las theg gi tsam zhig yol lo// rgyal po yang me tog la sdod cing 'dug go// de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis bkug pa
17b1('dul ba): dang rgyal pos / de la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis me tog de ring dus las yol des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par spras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pa byin no// de bzhin du mo to/
17b2('dul ba): 'phreng chung mkhan gyi chung ma la ni/ btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed gyen pa byin no// me tog 'phreng rgyung mkhan gyi bu la ni/ gzhon nu rnams kyis so// me tog 'breng rlung mkhan gyi mna'am la ni rgyal
17b3('dul ba): po'i mna' ma rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par gyur te/ dbul ba med par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan
17b4('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni nor can 'di nyid yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyun mkhan gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi chung ma yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyung mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi bu yin no// /
17b5('dul ba): me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma ni/ nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ drug cing /
17b6('dul ba): nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/ khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur to// nga'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/ nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas khyad
17b7('dul ba): bar du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/
18a1('dul ba): dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur/
18a2('dul ba): nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
18a3('dul ba): dang thabs gcig la/ bdag cag gis dgun zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang sran dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na
18a4('dul ba): gnang bar mdzad du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams
18a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang
18a6('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon brus te zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur pa rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba
18a7('dul ba): zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
18b1('dul ba): la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshes
18b2('dul ba): so de nyid du nyi ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du 'das so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ de rnams kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir/
18b3('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas de dag gis gtses par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bdag cag gi nye du dag sbur mchis te/ de rnams
18b4('dul ba): la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyad par rngo mi thogs na/ kye 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis zhal ta kha na mdzod cig/ dge
18b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis smras pa bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta
18b6('dul ba): bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te
18b7('dul ba): ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshod pa'i zhal ta byas pa las lhas char phab pas/ des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
19a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa steng g.yogs med par btso bar mi bya'o// sgo khang dang khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sgo khang dang khyam
19a2('dul ba): su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir mi rung ba ni bcu po 'di dag ste 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ steng g.yogs med pa/
19a3('dul ba): dang sgo khang dang khyams dang ba sro khang dang / khrus khang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang
19a4('dul ba): dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo // gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/
19a5('dul ba): sdom ni/ nang pu can dang zas dag dang / g.yar tshus lhag pa dag dang yang tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang pad+ma'i rtsa dang lus dag go gleng gzhin
19a6('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong nang bu can zhig yod pa des sman pa dris pa/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo la sman ston cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dris nas sbas pa/ 'phags pa thug
19a7('dul ba): pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des spras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phagrub khyod kyi ston pa thug rje can yin pas 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas
19b1('dul ba): nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do// des skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
19b2('dul ba): gal te sman pa thug pa 'thung zhig ces zer na/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyed par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar
19b3('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no// de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des spras pa/ bzhin bzangs
19b4('dul ba): ma de de'o// nr-i khyed kyis thug pa ma gsol lam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sang ni drin mo gsol cig/ de nas
19b5('dul ba): de'i nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas des de bsros te byin no// de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o// ci thug pa ma gsol
19b6('dul ba): lam 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig grang mo zhig bsos nas so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// de grang ste bsros pa lags kyis sang ni rang bzhin gyis
19b7('dul ba): dron por mdzod de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa la de nas
20a1('dul ba): kha'i drug pas de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
20a2('dul ba): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la dge slong dag de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsgo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal
20a3('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang / ji tsam pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtod pa'i mtha'
20a4('dul ba): can dang / ba nya la ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas gnas rtsom pa nas/ der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun
20a5('dul ba): gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing / tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mthar can zhes bya'o// sems gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong /
20a6('dul ba): lag gi sras der thog mang rdo ba 'deg pa na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i nges par bzung zhig/ nges par zung zhig ces
20a7('dul ba): bya ba ste/ 'di ni sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad par gses pa ste/ 'di ni bi nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas song pa gang zhe na spangs
20b1('dul ba): ma # nga mas sa
20b2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa nad patshams dang byi la nye lakhor 'dos gang dang bcas pa la/ dge 'dun gyis 'dod de 'go par bya'o//
20b3('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal ba shams la kan+ti brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bskol/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong
20b4('dul ba): gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/
20b5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi
20b6('dul ba): rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsolaganas
20b7('dul ba): thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slang du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/
21a1('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskon tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags
21a2('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskor bar bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung zhig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/
21a3('dul ba): 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos
21a4('dul ba): lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i su bskos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du bcos pa dang / mtshams
21a5('dul ba): kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig
21a6('dul ba): gnas te/ de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za
21a7('dul ba): bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams spod par byed/ gzhogs pabyas byed/ kha zer ba byed de/ shes ldan dag
21b1('dul ba): da sa 'ims cadage sbyong rnams pa rgya pa sa sa smras
21b2('dul ba): thapa sa zhes bya ba'i mkhas de dag dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/ ngas gnas kyim gyis nga ba'i
21b3('dul ba): ga bza' bar ma bya'i zhes bslangs pa/ sum gang zhen/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du mthong ba/ rung ba ma phyin pa'i ga bza' bar su bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / 'du
21b4('dul ba): las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no zhes thos pa/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid kyi gro las rnam par rtog pa skyes pa/ tshul 'di las ni bdag gi cing du
21b5('dul ba): byas pa yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na
21b6('dul ba): 'dis bdag gi ched du byed par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar
21b7('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa'i tshul las 'di bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no//
22a1('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// zla ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag lhogs par gyur pas/ de rnams smos pab ste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang
22a2('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i slad du glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzadade rnams
22a3('dul ba): kyis spras pa mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bsod snyoms lho 'grangs par mi rnyed pas/ kho bo cag lhogs te nyam chung bas des na bres phab ste 'dug go// de rnams kyis spras
22a4('dul ba): pa/ tsi ste zhal tshul mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ banang par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag
22a5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge/
22a6('dul ba): slong rnams kyis g.yar tshus bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la/
22a7('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer
22b1('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
22b2('dul ba): la gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na/ sngar blangs zin to sum du sems la/
22b3('dul ba): sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang paca
22b4('dul ba): rnams kyis dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas/ de rnams kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lum so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
22b5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khrid kyi cid dus gron bgyis pa lags kyis/ snrums te 'thad pa phyis gsol ci/ de rnams kyis khyer te dang ngo // ded nas de yang za' 'dad
22b6('dul ba): sa da skye bang 'das na 'das thas pa sa /
22b7('dul ba): #/ #
23a1('dul ba): byung ba nabram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyisadage slong rnams zas la 'gron du bos te de rnams kyis zos nas bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad
23a2('dul ba): cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis spras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te
23a3('dul ba): mchis la khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes de rnams kyis te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
23a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/ sngar yongs su btab pa'o snyam
23a5('dul ba): du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i/
23a6('dul ba): 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ ro rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo zhes/ de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas srang du
23a7('dul ba): ba rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyis spras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi
23b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nasakhyed rnams kyang du ni yon gnas/
23b2('dul ba): su gyur pa lags na gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na/ ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i yul brgyags dang bral te me 'jig rten 'di nas 'jug rten pha rol tu mchis par bgyi ra
23b3('dul ba): khu bas na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang
23b4('dul ba): ste rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ rgun 'brum dang bal po se'u dang /
23b5('dul ba): 'brag go dang / star na dang yon tshe dang shing tog ur ma na dang shing tog ku ru ma yi ka dang shing tog ni ko tsa dang shing rtog pa b+hu dang shing tog sin tsi ka'o//
23b6('dul ba): phreng gzhi ni mnyan yod dado// zab ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyis ka dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / rganas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'ad kyang
23b7('dul ba): sa rgyas pa togs brjod pas mthos pa'i sangs de dge slong rnams thos/ bcom ldan 'das lagasal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal ba/ rnyed dgar bzhin tha
24a1('dul ba): bsams nas bza' bar byaste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ su wa ba'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang ku mu da'i sa
24a2('dul ba): bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to// de'i rim gro byed pa che dang
24a3('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa bdag rang gyi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi ma la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas
24a4('dul ba): des sman pa la dris pa bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bang kan 'khrugs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par/
24a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal ba'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams
24a6('dul ba): nas ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal
24a7('dul ba): po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas sbas pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byin des spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dzag dang
24b1('dul ba): bad kan zhugs nas/ de la sman pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'om bstan to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de wA na re zhig gzhes shig de ngal gyis 'bab kyi
24b2('dul ba): nang du zhugs nas mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag bton cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo
24b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la blta bar brtsams pa dang de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis spras pa 'phags pa ci gzigs pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag
24b4('dul ba): gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang maM smra bar 'dug pa dang spras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshwa dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung
24b5('dul ba): bzeng bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rmes/
24b6('dul ba): nas snyan pas bstan pa bzhin pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab san gyis kyang blang ba che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la bad+ma'i rtsa ba ra 'acig bkrums pany+dza
24b7('dul ba): yang kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du songal/ gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog la shog ci/ de rlung gi shugs par daphyogs pa'i 'grus gtan yod kyi rgyal du rgyal byed kyi mas kyi
25a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/ pad+ma'i rtsab rnams khrims kyi mdun du bzhag nas slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi baglang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par
25a2('dul ba): gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na ba glang mo de las ba glang phrug gu gcig 'brangs te/ 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin no// de nas ba glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug gtor nas/ ba glang
25a3('dul ba): zug gu bor te bros so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las/ baglang drug gu de mthong nas/ khyim du blangs te/ bsnyun gsos bskyed de/
25a4('dul ba): nor gyis bskyangs pas ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyes su bskur ba las de mnyan yod
25a5('dul ba): kyi yul na gnas pa la skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pas na nor skyong zhes 'don no// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zos kha cig ni tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i/
25a6('dul ba): bu/ kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang za 'dod na/ bdag cag gis spang ba byas so zhes ma zos pa'i
25a7('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas/ de'i
25b1('dul ba): phyir rjes su gnang ngo // pad+ma'i rdza ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'grod par mi bya'o// phreng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i/
25b2('dul ba): tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / yug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi man ma dang /
25b3('dul ba): bran po dang / lug gi zan mo'o// khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ bal te 'ang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas na/ mthong zag kho nar gang bar 'gyur
25b4('dul ba): de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so// lug gi chung gA ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du snod du bcos pa ni/ brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung sa/ lug gi chung ma ni
25b5('dul ba): lha bu yin no// lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i sred pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug
25b6('dul ba): ma su zang pa po 'gyur / zug g-i bra ni dag bu yin no// drug gi mna'am ji lta buzhen/ ras gcig gi don du ji srung na/ brgya stong ljod par 'gyur/ zug gi man mni
25b7('dul ba): tha yin no// mug kyi dran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la rol gcis rjes pa de'i tshaMzhing la rol bdun thos par 'gyur te/ lug gi zan pa ni da~M lA bu yin no// phus gi zan
26a1('dul ba): mo ji ltar na bsod nams che bar shes she na/ de gang gi tshe gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che
26a2('dul ba): ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong rnams la da/
26a3('dul ba): slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs chu zhing grong khyer bzang /
26a4('dul ba): byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras
26a5('dul ba): pa tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer
26a6('dul ba): bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams lang zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan
26a7('dul ba): 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
26b1('dul ba): mnyan mang du tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i che mu segs can rnams mtha' 'khong du 'dong ba las de nas kha cig zong khyer bzang byed du dang nas gnas bdernabyas kyis da sbyong
26b2('dul ba): go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rong rong por gyur nasabadag cag sngon ni dge sbyong go'u tams yul dbus nas spyugs so// de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gdon mi na
26b3('dul ba): bdag cag 'di nas sprugs par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo// de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob par
26b4('dul ba): gyur cig 'phags pa dag de tso lags shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis/ 'gro'o// ci'i slad du re zhig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis
26b5('dul ba): dza srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo // 'phags ba dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing ga du ma
26b6('dul ba): zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig/
26b7('dul ba): ma bzhud ci/ de rnams kyis spras pa bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub bo// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig/ mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams
27a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas byung la zong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du tshud cing
27a2('dul ba): sngon po rnams ni rngos shig/ 'dug gnas rnams ni shig cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chos cig/ chu rnams ni dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa
27a3('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ thams cad bgyi'o// de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong khyer bzang byed
27a4('dul ba): kyi nang du btsud de/ rtsa sngon po rnams ni brngas 'dug gnas rnams ni bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug blugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi
27a5('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du
27a6('dul ba): dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du chu
27a7('dul ba): zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nasades rlung gtor ba'i lha'i
27b1('dul ba): bu la bsgo ba/ song la chu drug snyoms shig/ chur pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskums pa dang / khyod kyi rgyu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas long/
27b2('dul ba): zhig rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob cig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu drug can rnams
27b3('dul ba): bskams so// char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus ni der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi
27b4('dul ba): 'khor du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsogs nas/ de rnams kyis rtog chen dag
27b5('dul ba): ngags te/ ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig/ de rnams dong ba las/ ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas slar 'ongs te smras pa shes ldan dag ldong
27b6('dul ba): rnams 'di lta bur 'byor zhing rgyas pa ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo // mu steg can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag byed kyis bathong / re zhig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sbyar
27b7('dul ba): bar byed pa des khyed cag sbyar bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/ khyed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ blta ba'i mtha' ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags
28a1('dul ba): ba dag bzhugs pashig khyed cag la dge sbyong go'u tams ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba srong zhing 'tsha ba lags na/ ci sa/
28a2('dul ba): khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam mam mu stegs can rnams kyis spras pa dam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing
28a3('dul ba): gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha ba cu drug cus gcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go// de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
28a4('dul ba): terim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang ba der ba'o/
28a5('dul ba): kha na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das mun khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das shAkyi'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung /
28a6('dul ba): ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na bdag mar me thogs la 'babs pa zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas them skas zhog
28a7('dul ba): sprul lo// de nas de snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
28b1('dul ba): kyi sun sngar mar me bzhas nas zhabs gnyis la mtho zes byag brus te/ chos margyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / ngag la nyal dang / khams/
28b2('dul ba): dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bani so sor rtogs par 'thur ba'i chos bshang ba mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ skabs su mchi bar mngon par dang 'gas
28b3('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la byin pa dang / de la ngan
28b4('dul ba): re/ nad med par gyur cig ces spos la 'di skad ces kyang spes shig/ khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar nga 'dir 'ongs na khyed ske bcad nas 'dug pa glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de la
28b5('dul ba): bur bya ba de cig rigs sam gal te tshogs kyis khrims su bca' bar byas so zhes smras pa dang khyod kyi bu'i sked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am stong 'god
28b6('dul ba): par gtang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing / yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kar sha pa Na drug cu byin nas 'od mi nus sam zhes spros shig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des
28b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar ma nyan nas chas pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang / smras pa
29a1('dul ba): khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo // des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag
29a2('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshegs nA/ khyod spro bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de sa dur bya ba cig rigs sam das
29a3('dul ba): spras pa bu mo tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do zhes
29a4('dul ba): bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i skyed pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am ste nga 'god par gtang na gang ba kho
29a5('dul ba): nar 'gyur zhing / yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ kar sha pa Na drug cu byin nas/ khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo // des bsam pa 'di ni sus kyang mi shes nabacom ldan
29a6('dul ba): 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/ des kar sha pa Na drug cu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der/
29a7('dul ba): song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug
29b1('dul ba): kibs pa pa dang / ga la tsas dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ 'gags pa'i ban pa thams mar rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bshad pa bad/
29b2('dul ba): gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar bong ba ba'i'i du'o// des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsod ldar 'das pazang bye
29b3('dul ba): gnas par skye bo'i tshigs 'di dag gis kyang / cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba khyib bdag khyod las bas
29b4('dul ba): nas phal tshor kun gyis thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du
29b5('dul ba): phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa Na'i phung po bcer te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can blta
29b6('dul ba): 'dod pa// de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byas la// myur du dengs shig de yi nar ni kho bos gzhal// skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur/
29b7('dul ba): ram des smras pa dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa gal te de lta na tshogs kho nas khrims su bcad pa tshogs kho nas shig tu zad mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod
30a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so// de nas phan tshun sngos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa/
30a2('dul ba): skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas rab dral nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo //
30a3('dul ba): de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge
30a4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas sems can du ma dag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs
30a5('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// / 'dul ba gzhi
30a6('dul ba): bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas/ gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis
30a7('dul ba): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsol pa
30b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pA/ mar dang bu ram dang / hwags dang sha kha ra dang / btung ba dag go// de nas/
30b2('dul ba): khyim bdag lug gos g.yon mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gron gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams
30b3('dul ba): sta gon byas so// de nas khyim bdag lug gis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis tshim par
30b4('dul ba): byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du
30b5('dul ba): btul te gshegs pa na khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi spun brgyug kyi zong kAr sha pa NA dgra bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
30b6('dul ba): bladrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha ba Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
30b7('dul ba): bral ba/ rung ba byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das le/ tshe dang ldan pa
31a1('dul ba): bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul mi len pa gsungs la bcom ldan 'das kyis/
31a2('dul ba): dge tshul gyis brang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyimi blang ba
31a3('dul ba): ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o// blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig/ bcom
31a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am//
31a5('dul ba): dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis bslabs nas/ rang nyid kyis 'khrur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba na shes nas/ bcom
31a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhog gi mdun du
31a7('dul ba): 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir/ zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab po zhes
31b1('dul ba): deskadulan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhan 'dun dang /
31b2('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / sbyang ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang /
31b3('dul ba): dge skos dang / lag gi blas so// dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las lam gyis ngal nas bza' bar 'dod nas 'gyod
31b4('dul ba): pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas des zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus
31b5('dul ba): bas 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o// phye rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o// kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrus ma
31b6('dul ba): rung ste/ zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug ma'i tshal bas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang zas med
31b7('dul ba): par bkru ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par bsal te/ chu'i nang du mnyes la btang bar byas nas/ de chags kyis btsags la
32a1('dul ba): btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
32a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag lus dang / lug gi mchis zang dang lug ki bu dang / lug gi mna' mA dang / lkug gi bran po dang / l+ra
32a3('dul ba): gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ de nas de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par
32a4('dul ba): bgyis kyi ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba
32a5('dul ba): nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA rA so'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid du 'jug
32a6('dul ba): de'i che wA nA nA si'i grong khyer du lus mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bas pas/ zung mas 'che ba'i thi ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bsten to// mu ge rna
32a7('dul ba): pagasum ni the ma tog dang / rjes gang dgang ba dang / thu pas 'tshab // de la tha ma chog ces bya ba ni/ zab cig 'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru ga zugs te/ ma 'ongs pa
