62a4('dul ba): dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do// gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa ga shes ldan
62a5('dul ba): dag gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ gzhan dag gris smras pa ka khyad
62a6('dul ba): bar yod de/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do// dum bus
62a7('dul ba): skyong dang / seng ge khyim phub nas/ seng ge rtse bar byedadaga' bar byedadaga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gos can zhes
62b1('dul ba): byab tags so// de sa papa rnams yongs/ nan pa bzu' bar 'gyur dang sbrul sa da sa/
62b2('dul ba): lung bsan to// de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed pa dga' dmar smon par byed pa las bu ma zhig bcas te/ de'i bcas sod yang d+ha cher byas nas/ gas can ni d+hA gapas/
62b3('dul ba): de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nasabu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas langs pa can gyi la~M tsa byi rnams
62b4('dul ba): skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis/ de dag gi skyed mos tsha/
62b5('dul ba): rnams ma rung bar ma bya zhig ces/ des sngar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis/ dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi mi li rtsa byi rnams
62b6('dul ba): kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsi byi 'di dag ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gis/ 'di sngar bzlog cig/ des de bkug nas smras
62b7('dul ba): pa bu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi skyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya zhig/ de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re/ des smras pa/ yab
63a1('dul ba): 'di dag la ni skyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag la ma mchis so// des smras pa/ bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo// des
63a2('dul ba): tshegs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis/ bdag la skyed mos tshal cig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams
63a3('dul ba): kyis de dag la skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go// cig
63a4('dul ba): gos kyis ni zhal sros byas so// de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ sa skyong dang / se gre'i shong sA la'i tshal
63a5('dul ba): na bzhugs zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas/ li tsa byi rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de nas dum bus bkug ste/
63a6('dul ba): bsgo nga/ bu khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par/ ri 'od che ge mo zhig tu song la/ der rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug cig/ de der song nas rang gi zhing blas kyi
63a7('dul ba): mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya bar brtsams so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las / des
63b1('dul ba): kyang ngas zung du zhig tu ches dang mthun pas sde dben byas nas pa'o// sangs pa can gyi chags 'das nas su rig sde shin du gzug ces byas pa dang / de nas 'tsha gis smras
63b2('dul ba): blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bsnyungs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhug go// kha cig gis spras pa/ de'i bu sa spyong ni gdug partsal po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du btsun na/
63b3('dul ba): gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni nges pa/ 'grogs ni bde ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod
63b4('dul ba): na sde dpon du gzhug go// thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des smras pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas
63b5('dul ba): de sde dpon du chu gcig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyad kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'brang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mo da/ gal
63b6('dul ba): te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go// des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni ma 'os pas ye bkur ro snyam
63b7('dul ba): nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go// yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka'
64a1('dul ba): stsal pa zhes 'dri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar bya'o// ji tsam
64a2('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing las kyi mthar rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste bklags nas/ des smras
64a3('dul ba): ba shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'drin//
64a4('dul ba): ci kho bo'i bshi 'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa shi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bong 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba cig rigs sam// /
64a5('dul ba): seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas
64a6('dul ba): kyis rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btang ngo // des de la spring ba/ 'ong ba
64a7('dul ba): legs kyis shog cig ces spring ngo // de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po sa blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
64b1('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de 'gram pa lag pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de sa sbyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la/
64b2('dul ba): phyag gtung thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chung cing mi 'dug khA thong thugs ngan ma mdzad cig
64b3('dul ba): bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ cig
64b4('dul ba): shos la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ lnga'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung
64b5('dul ba): bstan pa gang yin pa de'o// de nas sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos tsan tshur smis shig dang / btsun mo
64b6('dul ba): dam par 'gyur ro// des de la yi ge la na spring ba / gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad kyikhyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so//
64b7('dul ba): ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtang ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de
65a1('dul ba): skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang / de'i tshe khyod kyis khrid de song zhig/ de nas sa skyong gi rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas/ shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du
65a2('dul ba): song ba las/ rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs shig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des/ yangs pa can rnams
65a3('dul ba): la bstan pa bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul bar dril sbyongs shig dang / gal te yangs pa can rnams la byir
65a4('dul ba): rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na/ bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa 'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi snga bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas
65a5('dul ba): nas mgul ba la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog 'phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go sa skyong gis seng ge la springag
65a6('dul ba): khro bo skyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung zhig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la
65a7('dul ba): byin gyis/ rgyan rnams thogs la skyed mos tshal du byung zhig/ de rgyan rnams 'dogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas/ re spras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir
65b1('dul ba): rgyan rnams 'dogs kho mo bag mar btang ngo // su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o// des smras pa/ kho mo phu mo yin na/ khyod ci ste bag mar btang /
65b2('dul ba): gal te de ltar na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang sba ba las dril gyi snga byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs rong rong por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs
65b3('dul ba): so// seng ge dngangs pas nye gos can yin no snyam nas/ gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang dngangs pas/ gos can shing nAr bcug ste song ngo // 5nga
65b4('dul ba): pa can gyi tshogs kyis byi bzhin pa sngags nas de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnang du bsnun nas/
65b5('dul ba): des smras pa shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag las lnga brgya gnang du bsnun zin gyis lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar dengs shig/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ nged cag las sems
65b6('dul ba): can gcig kyang bsad pa med do// go bud cig/ de rnams kyis go bud pa dang / lnga brgyas la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas
65b7('dul ba): skrag ste bros so// yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gis glegs bu la
66a1('dul ba): yi ger bris te sbom bur bcug nas rtswa skyegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go// zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/ sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal/
66a2('dul ba): po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can pobs shig/ des spras pa/ khru gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so// khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma
66a3('dul ba): smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa stong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa legs so// lha bdag
66a4('dul ba): mchis lags so// nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la/ khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so// ci zhig zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid de
66a5('dul ba): mchis so// bltas khrid de shog cig/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag
66a6('dul ba): kho nar/ rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu pa gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas/ gal te ngal bu yod par gyur na/ de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pa
66a7('dul ba): gyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na/ lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig
66b1('dul ba): rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi phyir byung ba na/ bsti gnas shig madrang song mdzan/
66b2('dul ba): par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// ji tsam na ri dgas mnga'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig/ drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing 'byung ba/ rgyal po'i mangs gnang du/
66b3('dul ba): bsnun no// de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya bar/ ri dgas skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis
66b4('dul ba): gsad dam zhes drang song de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di su la g.yang mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngal yin na/ shes ldan dag
66b5('dul ba): rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so// gal te de ltar na ngas drang srong de yongs su spangs so// de gsad par brtsams te
66b6('dul ba): de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab bkrol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par smis pa gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur
66b7('dul ba): cig/ yangs bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin pas/ gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi
67a1('dul ba): 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du smon lam 'dis bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so// des smom la ma log par btab pas/
67a2('dul ba): gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gi nyi ma kho na la nyingad mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi tsa ma la khrag gi char banga'o// gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i
67a3('dul ba): sha bcad cing zos kyang tsa ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos lhas mkhan rnams bkug nas rnas pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun
67a4('dul ba): mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so// rgyal po sems khongs su chud de 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas
67a5('dul ba): pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar rtsang shas bltam par bgyis te gsol la/ de nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang
67a6('dul ba): bar byas pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang / des chub kyi sha yin no snyam nas thos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang ji 'do
67a7('dul ba): skyes pa/ kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho ma 'thungs kyang cim rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la spras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag thud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang
67b1('dul ba): yang bral bar gyur to// ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas te gang gi nyi ma la bcas pa de nyid kyi ni ma la ya
67b2('dul ba): khrag gi char bab po// rgyal pos yang lhas mkhan rnams bkug nas rmas pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon ma mtshal bar lde'u 'dzas
67b3('dul ba): lha sku tshe dang phral nas/ rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis/
67b4('dul ba): 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo// de'i tshe yangs pa can na li tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal
67b5('dul ba): yod pa las/ der blo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga' ra ba bsrung bas mthong ngo // de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang
67b6('dul ba): des lhas mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de bsrung du gsol cig dang / dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar
67b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ skyed mos tshal der kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so//
68a1('dul ba): tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus nag chag bta/ shin tu dri zhim than/
68a2('dul ba): pos por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ klu dang rol po'i swa rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su
68a3('dul ba): bskor nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas/ skyed mos tshal de na/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dgal dgur spyod par byed pa las/ chu shing gis
68a4('dul ba): sdong po gas nas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang //
68a5('dul ba): des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o// ji tsam na
68a6('dul ba): khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas/ chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de slong ba'i
68a7('dul ba): phyir yul khrung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul snga chags na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang / rnon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs
68b1('dul ba): dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa/ gang kho na la mi byin pa de kho na sdang bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pas/ re zhig tshogs la brtag go snyam
68b2('dul ba): nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan dag/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de/ bdag gis bsnun/
68b3('dul ba): bstod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs bcud dpa'atsham par/ 'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ khyim bdag sngon
68b4('dul ba): tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che mi gtang ste/ tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas pa yin gyis/ re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba bltas/ khrid de shog cig/ des de chos
68b5('dul ba): kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dpa lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrang de/ kun tu brtag par brtsams nas smras pa/
68b6('dul ba): khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis/ su la yang mi sbyin no// de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing / rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa la
68b7('dul ba): lag pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang / a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i sdad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes/ tshogs
69a1('dul ba): kyis spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so// yab khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam bu mo sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ bud med/
69a2('dul ba): rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// des smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te bdag la tshogs
69a3('dul ba): kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/ bdag gis tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang por khang pa stsal ba dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ cig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang /
69a4('dul ba): nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kar sha pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe/ bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnam
69a5('dul ba): kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o// ming chen gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i 'bri ni bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa
69a6('dul ba): zhes gang smras pa la/ ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po che kho na la 'os so// gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ cig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/
69a7('dul ba): khon rnams la ni/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi shakhon tha chad yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang / cig shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi za bar gcig la gcig
69b1('dul ba): gsod par 'gyur ro// nang du 'jug pa des kar sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs te/ nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes pang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du dgos so//
69b2('dul ba): zhag 'dun lon na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung / de la 'gal ba ci zhog yod/ skyes pa rnams phyir byung ba dang / nang du 'jug
69b3('dul ba): pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma'i yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa brtags na/ su zhig de'i khyim du
69b4('dul ba): 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to// yangs pa can gyi li tse byi rnams kyis dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir/ de'i khyim du 'jug
69b5('dul ba): par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir/ mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// kha cig gis ni rig pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas
69b6('dul ba): kAng skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so// des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i
69b7('dul ba): ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang na rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ phyug po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa 'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig
70a1('dul ba): mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra sbyong ma rgyun rnams kyis brgyan nas/ ri mo'i
70a2('dul ba): las rnam la so sor brtags te dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di dag ni gang zhig/ 'di dag ni rgyal po rab snang ngo // gzhan 'di gang zhig ko sa la'i rgyal po gas la rgyal lo// gzhan 'di
70a3('dul ba): gang zhig/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed do// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o// des de bzhin du dris pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so//
70a4('dul ba): de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs snying po la mig chags nas/ des bsams pa skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par nus
70a5('dul ba): so snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul
70a6('dul ba): ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong ka sa skyong gis smras pa/ lha re zhig gzhan lha zhog la/ yangs pa can na smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyig
70a7('dul ba): shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba/ lnga kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so// des smras pa sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dod
70b1('dul ba): de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad do// des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni yun ring mo nas/ gnod pa bgyid pa/ sngar rgol ba/ dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyis
70b2('dul ba): su mchi'o// rgyal pos spros pa/ shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpal skying can yin pas 'dong ngo // des spras pa/ lha gal te don ma mchis pa la gtsigs cher mdzad na gshes
70b3('dul ba): bong/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa sbyong ni skyed mos tshal na sdod do// rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i phyi
70b4('dul ba): du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rod rong po gyur nas/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo//
70b5('dul ba): zhes sA gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ a mra skyong ma la dris pa bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin lha sdum par nyu la bar bgyid do// ci zhig gi
70b6('dul ba): phyiralha'i slad du'o// ji ltar bya/ ci 'bros sam/ lha mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang / bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas/ re zhig dgung bdun rol
70b7('dul ba): khas dgyes par marjodadagyes dgur mdzod la/ dgung bdun lags dang / dus mkhyen par bgyi'o// de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las
71a1('dul ba): ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so// de la seng
71a2('dul ba): ras gcig dang / sor bdub rgya byin nas spros pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no// 'on te khye'u yin na seng ras 'di bskon la sor ga dub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du
71a3('dul ba): sI zhig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang / dril bu mi 'khrol bar 'dug go / de rnams kyis smras pa shes ldan dag dgra bo byung gis rje bzhin btsal lo/
71a4('dul ba): zhes li tsa byi sbyin 'khor gyi mnga' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsgags pa dang / sa skyong gis mthong nas/ des smras palnga yangs pa can gyi li
71a5('dul ba): tsa byi rnams mchi na/ lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa da ni dub pas shing na ded kyisakhyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye
71a6('dul ba): zhig des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis
71a7('dul ba): slar log go// de rnams slar log nas/ yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon
71b1('dul ba): ru gzhug go zhes bcas so// ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang po// mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas zhes bya ba
71b2('dul ba): nasabasrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhe bya ba'i bar du'o// de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras pa/
71b3('dul ba): bran mo'i khye'u khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na/ pha su yin/ des dus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang / des smras pa bu ci'i phyir du des thams cad rgyas par smras pa/
71b4('dul ba): bu gal te yang dris dang / pa'i pa lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do zhes spros 'azhig gal te su yin zhes spras dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no zhes spros 'ashig/ ji tsam na de/
71b5('dul ba): rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa nga'i ba lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do// su yin rgyal po gzugs can
71b6('dul ba): snying po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i ba yin no zhes lhag par yang brdegs so// des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang /
71b7('dul ba): des bsams pa yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snya ma mo// de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang /
72a1('dul ba): tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgyu 'dis snod rgyas thob la dengs shig dang / shogam/
72a2('dul ba): mi gcod par 'gyur ro// khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog cig de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du
72a3('dul ba): bya'o zhes khas blangs so// bu la yang mu tig gi do sha la zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang / mu tig gi do sha la rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang
72a4('dul ba): du 'dug cig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smra dang / de la bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis/
72a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te/ sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas kargyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhags pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ mu tig gi
72a6('dul ba): shal rkang pa la bzhags nas 'dzegs te bang du 'dug go// rgyal pos spras pa shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go / des spras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga'
72a7('dul ba): mchis lags sam de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu smras pas ka rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// /
72b1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi// bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas/ glang po che la zhon nas thong khyer
72b2('dul ba): gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyab par byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po khab na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las
72b3('dul ba): chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba nas/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na/ chung ma la spras pa bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du
72b4('dul ba): 'gro'o// des smras parje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo // de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/
72b5('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas/ de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi 'phreng ba bor ro// de nas rgyal pos mthong
72b6('dul ba): nas spras pa mar shog/ des spras pa lnga g.yar tsha lags kyis/ khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/ de de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par/
72b7('dul ba): byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas
73a1('dul ba): rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgyu dang / seng ras khro bo byin nas smras pa gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya yang
73a2('dul ba): mgul du thogs te/ nga'i drung du sI zhig/ 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nasargyal po song ngo // dza tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang
73a3('dul ba): nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba sbed cig/ kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te gzhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo // spring ba des thos nasabadag gis ni bya
73a4('dul ba): ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'o na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/ des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar
73a5('dul ba): spring ba bag ma tsha bar 'dug cig/ ji nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar ngas bya'o// rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba ded dpo mang la rin po che che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis/ de med par
73a6('dul ba): khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo // de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba ga mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig
73a7('dul ba): btsas so// ma bslabs kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pa sa des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par baspyod nas sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis dkris nas
73b1('dul ba): sbom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba song la sdom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyis dkyil 'khor byos la/ me mar bus te phyogs btsa
73b2('dul ba): tu ji srong 'ga' zhig gis zangs kyi bar du sdod cig des de bzhin du byas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang
73b3('dul ba): lhan cig 'dug pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgon mar me mthong ngo // de nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba
73b4('dul ba): dza ni ci yin ltos shig/ de dag gis bltas nas smras pa lnga sbom bu zhig mchis so// des smras pa long zhig/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis spras pa/ lnga sbom bu de/
73b5('dul ba): na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar cig nang rgyal pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// ji tsam na sbom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/
73b6('dul ba): kha bye zhig kha bye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di cig son nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal
73b7('dul ba): khos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bsnun bsnyong bskyed de/ rgyal po sa gson nam zhes tshig tu byung ba dang /
74a1('dul ba): rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsol pas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed
74a2('dul ba): gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to// de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan
74a3('dul ba): gyis bdag cag ni bzo cung zad bsrabs te/ des na bdag cag gi phyi rus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar thos byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa
74a4('dul ba): mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong nas/ des rgyal bu'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/
74a5('dul ba): 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags so// 'dis ci thob/ 'tsho ba'o// des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas/ shing rta mkhan
74a6('dul ba): bslab po snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab po// rgyal pos spras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab rgyal po'i bus ni
74a7('dul ba): bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan spobs shig/ des bslab par brtsams so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa
74b1('dul ba): gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis spras pa/ sman pa lags so//
74b2('dul ba): 'di ci zhig byed/ dpyang bgyid do// ci thob/ gal te nang pa zhig sos marngan pa thob bo// 'on te gum na mi tshol mi 'dri'o// nges bsams pa/ sman dbyang bslab bo snyam nas/ de'i bachi/
74b3('dul ba): gan du song nas smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig/ sman dpyang bsrab lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no// khyod la sman dpyad kyis tsi byA/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad bslab par
74b4('dul ba): bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na slobs shig/ de sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni lobs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog
74b5('dul ba): na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/ des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o// ci zhig
74b6('dul ba): gi phyir/ de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klang pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bar de slob tu mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis 'tsho 'am/ lnga yang na ni sman
74b7('dul ba): mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o// bu gal te de lta na song zhig/ des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la spring ba/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du
75a1('dul ba): 'ong gis 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la
75a2('dul ba): gtad nas/ rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis/ 'di la sman dpyang slobs shig/ rdzun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho
75a3('dul ba): byed khyad par dang bcas par ldob bo// rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/ de dus gzhan
75a4('dul ba): zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/ des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo // 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/ gal/
75a5('dul ba): te 'di sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs pa ma yin gyis/ thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas
75a6('dul ba): sngar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo // kho bos spyan bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig/ des de bzhin du byas pas sos pa
75a7('dul ba): gyur to// ji tsam na nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ nab ji ltar sos par gyur to// sang yang de nyid byin cig/ ci snga ma lags samapa'on/
75b1('dul ba): te skad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bstan nAm/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'di ni 'tsho byed la
75b2('dul ba): 'dzin du sring ba yin no// des bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis/ 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas sbas pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang y-i
75b3('dul ba): de byin cig/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas/ de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid ngo do// bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis spras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i
75b4('dul ba): bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bar ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag la ni mi mdzad do// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par
75b5('dul ba): 'byed nus kyi/ khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lha na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// des bram ze'i khye'u
75b6('dul ba): de rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig/ khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo // 'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o
75b7('dul ba): zhes bsgo'o// bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so// 'tsho byed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi
76a1('dul ba): rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam mo// de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas
76a2('dul ba): ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa ma 'tshal lo//
76a3('dul ba): gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa ma 'tshal lags so// 'tsho byed la dris pa dang / des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag/
76a4('dul ba): khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so// ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te cung zad bstan na yang / de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no// gzhan
76a5('dul ba): yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes de/ de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la deng la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog cig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin/
76a6('dul ba): par shes pa de dag gis blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blang/
76a7('dul ba): so// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyan shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las/ de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des
76b1('dul ba): dris pa gang du 'gro ba des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las/ nges byas pa dang / mod la sos par gyur to// de dga'
76b2('dul ba): skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshung 'di khyod sdoms shig/ des phrum tshung blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas/ de phrum tshung khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na
76b3('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci
76b4('dul ba): yin/ glang po che'i rjes so// 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyis/ 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pazhang ba/ de ring kho nar glang po'i thug gu 'byung bar
76b5('dul ba): 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu po btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi
76b6('dul ba): bu'i drung du 'ongs nas/ gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dga' di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni cho ga che ge
76b7('dul ba): mo zhig srind che ge mo zhig yin la/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no// 'tsho byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad sman legs
77a1('dul ba): te d+hUsman ma lags pa ni tsi yang ma mchis so// 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mnga' chu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchis
77a2('dul ba): so// 'di dag ci dgos sdig pas zin pa la 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go// phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o// rdo'i dum bus ni ston ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa
77a3('dul ba): 'tshag par 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyi bus 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/
77a4('dul ba): ci 'di gcig bur bas snyam mam/ bdag cag mche ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas/ 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas
77a5('dul ba): pa zhar ba la snum pa/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du phu
77a6('dul ba): bo btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tsho byed bden nam/ mkhan po mang ngo // de glang po che'i rjes sam pa lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes
77a7('dul ba): des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na/ ji ste ma 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo// ba lang mo'i rjes ni chur ring ngo // mig/
77b1('dul ba): g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa las so// snum pa ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon ci mchi ba las so// deng kho nar/
77b2('dul ba): 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang po che'i phrug gu por 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag
77b3('dul ba): par gnon cing mchi bas so// de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcig pa las so// de yang mog g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon byos
77b4('dul ba): su me tog thu zhing mchis pas so// de yang sbrum pa ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/
77b5('dul ba): gcin ldan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so// de lha lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ 'gron pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig ma ngag
77b6('dul ba): tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/
77b7('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ 'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no// 'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslabs so//
78a1('dul ba): ji tsam na mi zhig klang nad kyis thebs nas/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/
78a2('dul ba): kye nang rje che zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang / sang bdag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis
78a3('dul ba): cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin na/ bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig tu zhog cig
78a4('dul ba): dang / khyod kyi las ji ltar byed pa blta'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go// de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du bcug
78a5('dul ba): ste/ thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas/ des skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po gzu lums su ma blang zhig/ rigs
78a6('dul ba): kyi bu 'di deng nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan po bdag mchis so// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan
78a7('dul ba): po skam pa tsha bar mdzod de/ rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums pa gyur pa dang / de nas bor cig/ de des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/
78b1('dul ba): 'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyis/ khyod khrus byos la shog cig dang / klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin no// de khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang / des de la klang pa'i thod pa 'byed/
78b2('dul ba): pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig/ mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas
78b3('dul ba): nas rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyi mchi'o// de'i tshe rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa smra bseng zhes bya ba
78b4('dul ba): dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis/ 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ re zhig de phob la
78b5('dul ba): phyis song zhig dang / de ltar na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro// des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/
78b6('dul ba): de mtha' 'khob pa skya ba seng de rnams phab nas/ gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas/ de nyid
78b7('dul ba): la rjes su yi rang ste/ des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la byin no// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas/ de nyid du dbyar gnas te/ de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad
79a1('dul ba): ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas/ grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khrur nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang pags pa'i lbag/
79a2('dul ba): ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'jug pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras/ kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des spras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na/
79a3('dul ba): 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to// de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/
79a4('dul ba): 'tshong ngo // rin ji tsam/ kar sha pa Na lnga bcu'o// des de nyos nas/ de nas bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/ de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra
79a5('dul ba): ste gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ mar mes khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du/ nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo // de rim gyis yul u dum wa rang phyin pa dang /
79a6('dul ba): de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bor gzhal nas/ bre mgo la bsnun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas spras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par
79a7('dul ba): gapa' 'o// tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bskal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ji tsam/
79b1('dul ba): na srin gyi med cig snang ngo // de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod ngo do// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des
79b2('dul ba): khas blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dpyang bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci bdag sku
79b3('dul ba): kon byas shig dang / sang dpyad bya'o// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo // 'tsho byed kyis de'i byi de nyin 'ongs nas/ de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis
79b4('dul ba): klad pa'i thod pa bye nas/ skam pa tsha bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg par byas te/ des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// des
79b5('dul ba): de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar byin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag cig laM skyed mos
79b6('dul ba): tshal me tog dang / 'bras dra dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las/ shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so// de'i bu ni khyim gyi
79b7('dul ba): dpon por gyur nas/ des skyed mos tshal der srung ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa bzhag pa dang de yang bsad nas/ khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos
80a1('dul ba): tshal de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dgu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs bzhig/ skyed mos tshul der song nas nub mo brang btag ste 'dug nas /
80a2('dul ba): bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung sum mo// de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go// ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang /
80a3('dul ba): dbu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir 'di bsdigs/ khyod la ra spu'i rud pas 'dug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis
80a4('dul ba): su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang sngar smras pa/ khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang ba med pa lta/ des ni khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag
80a5('dul ba): par 'gyur ro// thams cad 'tsho byed kyis zos nas/ de nang bar lngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /
80a6('dul ba): chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor / khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams sbas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag ra spu'i drung pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad
80a7('dul ba): bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis ra spu'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang / mi ma yin pa de dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to// khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la
80b1('dul ba): kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis/ dbu chu can la dris pa/ nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab parda/
80b2('dul ba): skyed mos tshal du 'dug/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la phrag gi sa bon mar byung ba'i dang ba dang btags pa 'thungs shig dang / sos
80b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro// nges 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/ mi des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin no// des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis
80b4('dul ba): bcom brlag tu phyin nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung ngu ngal bso zhing 'dug go/ ji ltar na gyad kyis gyad cig brdabs pas de'i nang khrol rnams 'khrugs nas de shi
80b5('dul ba): zhes phyi rol tu byung ngo // shing de la yang bya rgod mo brug gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las/ de la phrug gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma sha byin cig/ des smras pa/ bu sha
80b6('dul ba): ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ me gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te shi nas byung ba yin no// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na/ des 'di sos par byed pa'i gnas
80b7('dul ba): de yod do// ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang khrol rnams phye mas reg par byas na'o// de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so// de nas de langs te ro drung du
81a1('dul ba): song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ thad kyis kyang brngubs pas shi ba yin no// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/
81a2('dul ba): cig dang blta'o// de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang / de na 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nang khrol
81a3('dul ba): rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ des des smug ma'i sbubs su phye ma blugs te khas bus pa dang / phye mas nang khrol rnams la reg nas sos par gyur to// des kyang
81a4('dul ba): 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa
81a5('dul ba): yin pas/ de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur to// de gang dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do//
81a6('dul ba): de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par mi byed do// des sman pa 'tshe byed der 'ongs so zhes thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste spras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag la bro nang mchis
81a7('dul ba): kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pa lta na dpyad bya'o//
81b1('dul ba): des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lags so// des smras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni med do// bdag las 'phangs pa gzhan med pas des las blangs so// de nas des skye
81b2('dul ba): mor phyung ste/ bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bor te/ sos par gyur to//
81b3('dul ba): de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos
81b4('dul ba): de ltar byas par zad do// des kyang de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bkur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis rim gyis chu bo ya mun na'i
81b5('dul ba): 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i rting pa'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i phreng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las/ de'i mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums pa mthong nas//
81b6('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar nus pa dang / long mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas/ de rim gyis yangs pa can du byin pa/
81b7('dul ba): dang ji tsam na gyad kyis kyang cig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ des rting pa'i nus pa'i phreng nas drangs pa dang / slar chung par
82a1('dul ba): gyur to// des de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can nu mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/ 8
82a2('dul ba): de las phrug gu bdun brgya byung bas/ de rna ba'i nad kyis nyen par gyur nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag gis mkhan
82a3('dul ba): pos bstan pa las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos byas so sbam nas/ des mi de la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje song la lo ma'i spyil po byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la/ de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa
82a4('dul ba): yang dron por gyis shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de sa la bskal nas/ sa de chus chag chag btab nas/ de nas rnga brdungs pa dang / srin gyi med/
82a5('dul ba): kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo // de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phrug gu rnams khrid de byung nas/ phrug gu rnams dang
82a6('dul ba): lhan cig sha'i dram bul chags pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dub bu bor ba dang / mi des sos par gyur to// des kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin
82a7('dul ba): no/ de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gnon nu ma skyes dpral bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyis bsur
82b1('dul ba): song zhig/ de bsur song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bskur 'ong ba thos nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis de bsrung ba rang gir byas na ni/ nam rtul por/
82b2('dul ba): gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de sngar log ste sku gzhan zhig nas zhugs so// dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye ba'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/
82b3('dul ba): sems g.yeng zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la sman ston cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob cig/ des drang
82b4('dul ba): bo zhig pas/ thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to// mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tshe byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje gang du 'gro
82b5('dul ba): des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod la 'tshe byed ci dgos/ des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas/ des thal ba btab pa dang long bar gyur
82b6('dul ba): to/ dus gzhan zhag na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor po la mig byung ngo // des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag sman pa rnams khrag cig/ blon po rnams kyis sman pa/
82b7('dul ba): rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos sbas pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i spyi bor bo la mig byung gis dpyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ lha sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na/ bdag cag
83a1('dul ba): cag gi bkyi ci 'tshal/ rgyal pos spras pa/ shes ldan dga'atsho byed khrag cig/ de rnams kyis de bkrug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed dbyang byas
83a2('dul ba): shig 'tsho byed kyis spras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis sku ru ras skud cing
83a3('dul ba): smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas/ smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya thugs te/ gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na ma tshor ba spu bris reg par byas pa dang rdol
83a4('dul ba): lo// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rma de sos shing pags pa 'dra ba dang sgra yang mnyam
83a5('dul ba): par gyur to// rgyal po khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha re zhig shos gsol cig/ rgyal pos zan zos nas/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig
83a6('dul ba): lha bgyis lags so// de yid mches nas leg pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// me long blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // btsun mo la dzes na/ des kyang
83a7('dul ba): phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ blon po rnams la spras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur zhig/ mi long ba des smras
83b1('dul ba): ba/ tsams la byams pas sas/ 'on te stan mkhas pas dbang bsrung bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ snyun mkhas pas so// des sbas pa/ kas ti lta lanas/
83b2('dul ba): 'das bdag rnaMms par ma bgyis lags so// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag gis khyod macing yang ma mthong mams par lhag la byas/ des smras pa de ni 'ad/
83b3('dul ba): kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des bdag la bstan to// ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go 'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin
83b4('dul ba): gyis da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang smras pa/ lha 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che la
83b5('dul ba): zhon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro// rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa sman gyi nad kyis thebs nas/ sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang / des
83b6('dul ba): bsams pa 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o// gal te dpyad cig byas na ni de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/ 'a
83b7('dul ba): byed bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka' 'o// des bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/ 'di la ci byar yod/ dus
84a1('dul ba): la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo // de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar ba'i ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang srog chags ko d+ha tsan dan zhes bya
84a2('dul ba): ba 'thabs te lhung ba dang / de bkres pas nyen pas de gnyis kar zos te/ lhas dur khrod du char bab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na
84a3('dul ba): gnag lhas yod pa der song ste ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas sman rdol te yar slon mar 'khrus nas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags
84a4('dul ba): ma'i mdoms kyi phyogs su bol mig byung ngo // des rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos/ 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dbyed gyis shig/ des khas blangs so// de nas zan byas
84a5('dul ba): te ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 'dug tu chug cig/ des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snyam mo// de nas smin par
84a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/ smin par shes nas/ zan gyi nang du gtsigs bu sbas te ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la/ btsun mo 'dug nas slar slongs shig/
84a7('dul ba): des de bzhin byas pa las gtsags pus reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i
84b1('dul ba): rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur to// 'tsho byed rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos spras pa/ 'tsho byed khyod kyis ma yar mo'i dpyad byas sam/ lha bgyis so// khyod
84b2('dul ba): kyis sgren mor byung ste ma bltas grang/ lha ma bltas so// ji ltar byas des ji ltar gyur pa rnams spras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po rnams la sbas pa/
84b3('dul ba): 'tsho byed la lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur zhig/ mi sman can la 'tsho byed kyis sman rnyed par dka' 'o zhes spras pa gang yin pa des spras pa/ lA ci sras la sdug pas
84b4('dul ba): sama'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos spras pa/ sman mkhas pas so// gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so// 'tsho byed
84b5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ kye nang rjengs khyod la dpyad ni ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang nga khyod kyi sman ni rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras so// des smras pa/ bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 'tsho
84b6('dul ba): byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya cig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le 'dug pa dang / srog chags go d+ha tsan dan 'thabs nas mer lhung ba dang /
84b7('dul ba): de gnyis khyed kyis zos la/ dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/ ko dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la
85a1('dul ba): sos par 'gyur te/ bdag gis de las bsams nas sman rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smraspras pa yin no// des spras pa shin tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin/
85a2('dul ba): du bdag gis zos so// de nas dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ lha 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rdo thog gis/ dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis su yang sman
85a3('dul ba): pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro// gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra bslus nas/ pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/ de la
85a4('dul ba): sman gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to// des sman pa rnams la smras pa/ nga la dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa lha lha'i gcen po sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'i 'tsho/
85a5('dul ba): byed 'di na mchis bzhin du/ bdag cag gis dpyad bgyid rngo ga la thog/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug cig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 'tsho byed
85a6('dul ba): ngal sman gyi nad byung gis dpyad byos shig/ lha bgyi'o// des bsams pa/ rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'gyur te/ lhag par dga' ba 'am/ lhag par khros pas yin na/
85a7('dul ba): sems can sdig pa byed pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu
85b1('dul ba): 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol ba ldan dpyad brtsi'o// rgyal pos thos nas khros te spras pa/ legs so// ngas ni pha srog dang bral/ khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog
85b2('dul ba): dang bral/ pa yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas/ khyod ni rgyal por 'thur mod/ des spras pa/ lha dpyad ni 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis sos par rje mi thog pa/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i
85b3('dul ba): phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la
85b4('dul ba): legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bstan nas/ khyim du khrid nas bzhag go// de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i
85b5('dul ba): tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni shi ba'i ros stong pa ma yin pas/ de nas des ro'i sha blangs te/ yo byad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas/
85b6('dul ba): rgyal po phrol bab pa'i dus su bstabs so// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sha khu'i phor pa blangs nas za bar gzas pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis phrogs nas klad du bsnun te
85b7('dul ba): sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral la/ dbu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na ci'i phyir gsad ces mi
86a1('dul ba): bzod pa skyes pas de'i sman rdol nas yar sngon mar 'khrus te/ kha nAs khrag dang bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel lo// de nas/
86a2('dul ba): chus gtor nas dbu gus slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas / sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rnyan
86a3('dul ba): thams cad kyi se rgyan te khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te sma se pa/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di lags te/ bdag srog chags grog spur yang
86a4('dul ba): srog dpa' bral ba re bgyid mi bod na/ gzhon nu lha smos kyang ci 'tshal du 'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis thabs bsham pa bgyis bar bas so//
86a5('dul ba): rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur zhig/ blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/ dpal
86a6('dul ba): gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes te/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa ni 'jig
86a7('dul ba): rten na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni lus kyi dpyad byed pa rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no snyam mo
86b1('dul ba): des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las/ de grags pa'i bsnyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gsan/
86b2('dul ba): pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/ grags pa'i bsnyems pa lus gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i dregs
86b3('dul ba): pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/ btsun
86b4('dul ba): pa ma mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung zhig/ des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po
86b5('dul ba): 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'bar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman pa'i rgyal
86b6('dul ba): po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'tsho byed sman ji tsam 'dod pa long zhig/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin/
86b7('dul ba): bkan rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig/ de dang song nas 'tsho byed la sman rnam pa sna tshogs rab blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
87a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sma nu 'di ming ci yin/ nges gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das che ge mo lags te/ cho ga 'dis nas nAd che ge mo zhig ni/
87a2('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni che ge mo zhig lags te/ nang che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams kyi ming yang mi shes so// ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom
87a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed 'di ni che ge mo ste/ cho ga che mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis gsol
87a4('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lha/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa/
87a5('dul ba): yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mkho ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro'o// / 'dul ba kA'i/
87a6('dul ba): bam po drug cu gnyis pa/ bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang la mkhas pa yin/ nang kun nas spong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba spang ba la mkhas
87a7('dul ba): pa yin/ spangs pa byis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing nad 'di ni 'di lta bu dang 'diH/
87b1('dul ba): bu yin no zhes de ltar nang la mkhas pa yin no// nang kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing nad 'di ni rlung gis kun/
87b2('dul ba): nas bslangs pa'am/ mkhris pas kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bdag las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las
87b3('dul ba): gyur pa 'o zhes/ de ltar nad kun nas spong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing nad 'di ni
87b4('dul ba): mig sman namabasku mnye 'am/ sbugs sman nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar blugs pa 'am/ ru bas bdug pa 'am ka nAn rtsi'i las kyis spong bar 'gyur re zhes/ de ltar nad
87b5('dul ba): byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nang spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nang 'di ni 'phrod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu/
87b6('dul ba): dang 'di lta bu dag byas te spangs na phyis mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de ltar nang spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa// rgyal
87b7('dul ba): zo la 'os pa yin/ rgyal po la mkho ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
88a1('dul ba): yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// 'tsho byed bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
88a2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug
88a3('dul ba): bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pas ni
88a4('dul ba): skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so// rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
88a5('dul ba): dang 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so// 'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen no// nab
88a6('dul ba): dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen no//
88a7('dul ba): de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed
88b1('dul ba): gzhon nus bskyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang /
88b2('dul ba): chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi
88b3('dul ba): 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
88b4('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi na/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng sngan
88b5('dul ba): chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
88b6('dul ba): phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas song ngo // ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha pas yog ste rtag tu lpags pa che bas/ bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi spun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i
88b7('dul ba): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin/ bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog uH
89a1('dul ba): la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/
89a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdams pa las thang sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das jig la legs par 'grus lags
89a3('dul ba): sa ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod/ 'khrus la g.yos pa yang yod/ ma 'grus la ma g.yos pa yang
89a4('dul ba): yod do// 'tshe byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lha na bu ram dang a ru ra gsol la/ khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad
89a5('dul ba): nas snyun gdangs par gyur to// 'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// ji tsam
89a6('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dpyad byas pa las/ des de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang / des de blangs pa nas bcom
89a7('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'tsho byed
89b1('dul ba): gzhon nus bskyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste/
89b2('dul ba): bdag la grong ngam/ grong mchog stsol ba lags pas/ bdag gi lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i ras shig stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das
89b3('dul ba): la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i
89b4('dul ba): gos be'u ras yug po che bzhes so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yab cing 'dug go// de nas
89b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che long la/ nga'i ched du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang
89b6('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal ba yangs par song nas gzhal bar brtsams pa las/ chos gos mang du ldang bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
89b7('dul ba): na bza' chos gos gsum dang / bdag nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ral cung dpung chad gcig byas so// bcom ldan
90a1('dul ba): 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ras lnga brgya brnyes shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par
90a2('dul ba): bya ba ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams
90a3('dul ba): kyis khyim po'i gos gris dras te/ kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las
90a4('dul ba): babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin no// de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhen nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ji tsam
90a5('dul ba): lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba pa zhig mthong nas/ de de la gus pa bskyed de/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis
90a6('dul ba): bsams pa/ lha ni dge slong 'ba' zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no// dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa ni gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/
90a7('dul ba): gus pas glang po che las babs nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so snyam nas/ de rnams yid gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas su la phyag bgyis/ bcom
90b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o// lha de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/ 'tsho ba pa lags so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems
90b2('dul ba): te/ bdag gi don 'di kho na gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
90b3('dul ba): tephyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
90b4('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas/ de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/ de ring bdag gus pa
90b5('dul ba): skyes nas glang po che las babs te dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar
90b6('dul ba): gzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsu
90b7('dul ba): bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
91a1('dul ba): phyag byas te song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'tsho ba bgang gis bden pa mthong ba la phyag bdag
91a2('dul ba): gir byas pa nyams te ma rung ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go// de nas
91a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthong ngam/ btsun pa ma mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs
91a4('dul ba): ba'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung zhig/ des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam
91a5('dul ba): mkha' las gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri bo la bzhugs so// de'i tshe ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam pa/ rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang skal gyis 'brel
91a6('dul ba): zhing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la/ rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang skal/
91a7('dul ba): gyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag mthong ngam ka btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o// gnas
91b1('dul ba): brtan kun 'ga' bos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dros la drubs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams/
91b2('dul ba): na/ snam bu rnams kha phyogs gcig tu bstan pas mi mdzes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal mo kyi/ 'di kho nas rkyen byas
91b3('dul ba): nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis kar bstan na/ 'on kyang mtha' skor med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas/ mtha' bskor byas so//
91b4('dul ba): de nas byas shing zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo legs so legs so// ngas gang gi phyir bka' stsal pa/
91b5('dul ba): de khyod kyis shes te/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur ches gos rnams rbas la drub par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas/
91b6('dul ba): lhag ma ni ma dras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ 'brog gnas su byon nas/ 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugs so//
91b7('dul ba): 'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nye bas grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to// thun par ma la gos gsol to// thun tha ma la tshe dang
92a1('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nga la snam sbyar gyis g.yogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lag pa gnyis bkrus nas
92a2('dul ba): snam sbyar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do// de nas nam nang nas dgong
