121b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni
121b5('dul ba): mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
121b6('dul ba): to// btsun pa bdag ral ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
121b7('dul ba): ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
122a1('dul ba): stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig
122a2('dul ba): gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes
122a3('dul ba): bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar
122a4('dul ba): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
122a5('dul ba): yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug
122a6('dul ba): 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar
122a7('dul ba): med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ snam sbar med par de phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i snam sbar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i 'bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
122b1('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing / snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// song na 'gal tshabs can tu 'gyur ro//
122b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dgal mchin nad can na ba'i de'i nangad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang / de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spo ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
122b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla gos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// gzhang yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge slong dang btsas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang / char ba
122b4('dul ba): pa 'am/ char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyi gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o// // bar sdom
122b5('dul ba): gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang / dge 'dun rnyed dang de de yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
122b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dong ba dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma byung/
122b7('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong
123a1('dul ba): rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa byung bar mi bya'o// blangs na 'gas tshangs/
123a2('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro// bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong nas
123a3('dul ba): sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o// dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par
123a4('dul ba): byed pa na/ rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// gzhan dag gis
123a5('dul ba): ma bcol bar dong ba dang / de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par
123a6('dul ba): mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor ma chag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod pa
123a7('dul ba): mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par brda bar bya'o// ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong/
123b1('dul ba): brgya gnan ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du nan zhugs gnyis
123b2('dul ba): shig dbyar gnas pa las/ khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba/ de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis spras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// cig shes kyis spras pa/
123b3('dul ba): bdag cag kho na yid 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na khong zhig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur zang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas/ de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub
123b4('dul ba): bar bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o// cig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams sus srung / gang gzhon pas
123b5('dul ba): sod de ltar mi nus kyis/ gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams srung ngo // de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams 'bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo // drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa/
123b6('dul ba): ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal sgo re mos re mos mi stongs par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas 'dug pa des rlung ring po kho na nas mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skya
123b7('dul ba): ban smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas bcan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis/ de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas/ gnas brtan byin pa legs so// byon pa legs so// slob dpon phyag
124a1('dul ba): 'tshal lo// des bsams pa/ 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni nan zhugs shig yin no snyam du rig nas spras pakanan zhugs khyod gang nas 'o/
124a2('dul ba): ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so// ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te 'phongs pa yin// des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par spras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la/
124a3('dul ba): 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob dpon legs so// nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan/
124a4('dul ba): du song na skye bo'i tshegs chen pos shes rab 'gyur gyis/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas/ ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis nam
124a5('dul ba): sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te/ rkang po bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas/ ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do// de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi
124a6('dul ba): 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so// de nas de nang bar sngar langs te rgan zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri bor du phyin pa dang / de nas
124a7('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs cig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal sos pa dang / khong gsum car yang gnas gcig
124b1('dul ba): tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig/ gnas brtan bgo'o// nye dgas nan zhugs shig la smras pa/ nan thugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ gnas brtan bdag rnaM bag nga/
124b2('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // cig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du spras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyed ni nyes
124b3('dul ba): babyung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci// nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas//
124b4('dul ba): de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyed kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag
124b5('dul ba): tu rtag tu chag chag btab/ phyag bdar dang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// nan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag bdar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lha/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang tham
124b6('dul ba): cang chag chag dang phyag bdar bya'o// 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ nan zhugs cig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i smyon pa byed pas/
124b7('dul ba): chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas ca
125a1('dul ba): mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas cig shes kyi drung bus nas smras pa/ nan zhags khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas// gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bskrus/
125a2('dul ba): pa'i sbyin pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lha/ nye dag su 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang cung zad
125a3('dul ba): grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs cig shes de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag bdar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das/
125a4('dul ba): kyis phyag bdar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
125a5('dul ba): mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang // lus zhig nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug
125a6('dul ba): lag khang phyag bdar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas/ des ci byin pa/
125a7('dul ba): de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ nan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
125b1('dul ba): gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o// de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas spras pa/ gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du/
125b2('dul ba): mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go// de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsal ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs
125b3('dul ba): khyed gnyis nyon cig/ khyed gnyis dang 'odi gcig/ 'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so//
125b4('dul ba): cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des bgo
125b5('dul ba): bar brtsams nas/ de na ras yug cig la 'khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo // de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du byin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis
125b6('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza
125b7('dul ba): ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong
126a1('dul ba): rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
126a2('dul ba): ro// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas nan zhugs de gnyis ches kyi sgo nas/
126a3('dul ba): bsdus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dge
126a4('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na/ sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe skam la dong ba
126a5('dul ba): de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// cig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir
126a6('dul ba): bya'o// nga na gcig ni chur song so// cig shos ni snum la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa glang yin pas la rnams bsgrogs te snum la bton nas/ de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do// tshul gnas
126a7('dul ba): pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// ji tsam na ka'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis spras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig/ cig shos kyis spras pa/ bdag mi 'gyed do// ci'i phyir bdag la zhes
126b1('dul ba): pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de ldan pa bdag la yang ces pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems yongs su chud cing 'jug pA las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes byab/
126b2('dul ba): de gnyis kyi drang du 'ongs nas/ des smras pa/ tsha bo drug ci ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ zhang po dag bdag cag ni ha rnyed pas so// tsaM ste mi 'gyed/ zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so//
126b3('dul ba): khyed ni nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis sdong gis dbye bar
126b4('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chung zhugs te/ bdag chung zhu
126b5('dul ba): nas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la thon pa dpa'adis bsad do// tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro ba ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher
126b6('dul ba): ma'i 'jigs pa dang shAgacan gzan gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam thog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te nges ma bsad na/ khyod kyis bsdogs kyang ci pan/ mdoran
126b7('dul ba): 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang bar mi bya'o// de des gnas la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas
127a1('dul ba): cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir cing gu byas/ 'ang po byangag gis skrab la spyod ste/ bdag gis sam la thon pa'i nya rnams pas/
127a2('dul ba): do// tsha bo gAl te skam la song nas cung zad thob na lce/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba'i de dpa' klong gi 'jigs pa dang / ma sbrul gyi 'jig pa dang / chu sbyin gyis pa gsod
127a3('dul ba): 'khri pa dang / chu srin kum bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsgrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gas da/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni
127a4('dul ba): de'i mthu yin pas/ des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnang la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas kyi smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs
127a5('dul ba): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do// de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i
127a6('dul ba): mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ ngar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas// tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste// gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o//
127a7('dul ba): bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa// de ni chos la gnas pas bkra ru// bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi sred pa khyer
127b1('dul ba): ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i// ka bo che zhig thogs nas ni//
127b2('dul ba): shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs// des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing // chos dang chos min mi shes pas// rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang
127b3('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol gnan pa shin tu legs// de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
127b4('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis
127b5('dul ba): bslus so// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// /
127b6('dul ba): khyim bdag de'i blo smos pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bson no snyam mo// ji tsam na ste dgas khyim
127b7('dul ba): bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re la yang ras yug ra re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te nga las ras yug gcig ma grub na/
128a1('dul ba): bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas/ de mgron du ma pos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ ras rnams 'grim pa dang //
128a2('dul ba): nye dgas ras gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te
128a3('dul ba): mchis/ 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsdams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis
128a4('dul ba): spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so// des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
128a5('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na
128a6('dul ba): dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom
128a7('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan
128b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga lta 'ba' zhig tum zad de/ ji ldar 'das pa'i dus na yang ci dgas mthon du ma bos pas gzham gyi rnyed pa la thob rgya la byas par can cigag /
128b2('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod do// des bram ze'i lde'u brgya zla ba gsum du mthon du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang
128b3('dul ba): ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gnas pa de thos nas/ de rgad pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo //
128b4('dul ba): bram zes ras rnams 'drim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shresman dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na/ bram ze'i khye
128b5('dul ba): 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma
128b6('dul ba): bos so// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze des smad par brtsams so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni
128b7('dul ba): dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma bos so// de lta na yang ngo // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod ma'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag 'a bzhin
129a1('dul ba): brtsigs nas/ der dge slong zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa/
129a2('dul ba): dang phyag bdar byed do// gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs dben zhing bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang /
129a3('dul ba): ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang
129a4('dul ba): der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du
129a5('dul ba): rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas/ de nang par sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod phra ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge
129a6('dul ba): slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar
129a7('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang / der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu 'am/ phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu
129b1('dul ba): mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// / sdom la bye ba rnams la skal ba ni// sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las// dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi// rnyed
129b2('dul ba): ba brgyad du bya ba'o// / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye/
129b3('dul ba): bar gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni spyir ro// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos dang
129b4('dul ba): mthun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha
129b5('dul ba): cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi
129b6('dul ba): bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des yod byad thams cad dang ldan
129b7('dul ba): pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zas byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang /
130a1('dul ba): des ras yug lnga ban+d+ha po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs/
130a2('dul ba): rgyu zhing dong ba las ri bor de nyid du phyin nas/ khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos
130a3('dul ba): khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis/ de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po
130a4('dul ba): ni bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ de ldan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan blan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
130a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrim
130a6('dul ba): kyis theb pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / dge 'dun gyir btags pa dang / dge slong gyir btags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor bstan pa'o//
130a7('dul ba): mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas nyid la/ gso sbyong gcig la ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug
130b1('dul ba): mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin/
130b2('dul ba): pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin te/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rjed
130b3('dul ba): pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go// kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo
130b4('dul ba): zhig go/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang ga bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam
130b5('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su ram bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang
130b6('dul ba): dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/
130b7('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// // 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po ra
131a1('dul ba): lnga pa dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam
131a2('dul ba): bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan
131a3('dul ba): byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /
131a4('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan nas byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa
131a5('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang // dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam
131a6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam pa bcas pa'i rnams la chu drangs na
131a7('dul ba): rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/
131b1('dul ba): nan pa'i mayar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam la bcas pa'i dge slong rnams par byin nas )
131b2('dul ba): ba'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i /
131b3('dul ba): slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang /
131b4('dul ba): khyim bdag de rnams kyi lam po che dang / chongs dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa bul la/
131b5('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas/
131b6('dul ba): pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / cho
131b7('dul ba): dus dang ba ni mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/
132a1('dul ba): rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams/
132a2('dul ba): ban byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la rba drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang ga bzhi mdo dang
132a3('dul ba): sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis
132a4('dul ba): ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang // dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i
132a5('dul ba): mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin n+da/
132a6('dul ba): nan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis kA'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / ba ni mdo dang / sum mdi rnams
132a7('dul ba): su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o//
132b1('dul ba): lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sram mdo rnams su das bcas pa dang / dam pa bcas pa'i dag grang rnams par byin nas/ rgan pa'i mtha' nang ba sngal la/ rlan pa'i mthar da
132b2('dul ba): chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i
132b3('dul ba): rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la brten te/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de kho na'i yin te/
132b4('dul ba): 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la/ dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o//
132b5('dul ba): dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la/ dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i 'o// yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes btags pa ni/ de na dge
132b6('dul ba): spong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag
132b7('dul ba): rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la/ dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o//
133a1('dul ba): so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltam pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te/
133a2('dul ba): mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi/ gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// / sdom la/ gnas nas byung
133a3('dul ba): ba shi ba dang / bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang / gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
133a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas
133a5('dul ba): phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu
133a6('dul ba): mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags// rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la ga rang
133a7('dul ba): bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na
133b1('dul ba): gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gram lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/
133b2('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ bum pa de'i yo byad
133b3('dul ba): gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa cig shos so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mngal// rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa la gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
133b4('dul ba): lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam
133b5('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long zhig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'god par byed na/
133b6('dul ba): bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
133b7('dul ba): yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang /
134a1('dul ba): ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la byed kyi
134a2('dul ba): dge tshul ba yis// dem chos kas dang lha ba bzed long zhig ces po nya gtung bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'apyod par byed na/ ma bsgos panyes par bkrus pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa
134a3('dul ba): rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar
134a4('dul ba): byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi
134a5('dul ba): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
134a6('dul ba): yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'byed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs ba
134a7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag
134b1('dul ba): drangs du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi liH/
134b2('dul ba): de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyed pa byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed/
134b3('dul ba): na bags pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs pa
134b4('dul ba): bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i ltung
134b5('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed ni/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na// bags
134b6('dul ba): pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin/
134b7('dul ba): no// ram ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung
135a1('dul ba): bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces po nya btang bar bya'o//
135a2('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te
135a3('dul ba): 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams
135a4('dul ba): gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs pa spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos
135a5('dul ba): gos long zhig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs
135a6('dul ba): par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no//
135a7('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shin
135b1('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// dam
135b2('dul ba): ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te
135b3('dul ba): 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// / sdom ni/ 1
135b4('dul ba): dgra' dang ni byin gyis brlabs// bar ma sbyin dang bslang bya dang / bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / spang ba dang ni mo gsum mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nye dga'i
135b5('dul ba): spyi bor phol mig cig byung nas/ de sman po'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// nye dgas
135b6('dul ba): ba sams pa/ gal te de ring kho na 'thungs na/ de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam
135b7('dul ba): du shes nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kun tu mngag pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yog pa'i gos phal mo che blangs so// phyi
136a1('dul ba): de nyin par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod snyun gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol lam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig
136a2('dul ba): bgyis kyis/ deng nyis 'gyur du gsol cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos lags so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes
136a3('dul ba): par gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du dgos kyis spongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che baspangs so// de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs
136a4('dul ba): bas de'i nang rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa mar gsol lam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des
136a5('dul ba): spras pa/ bzhin bzangs de ring ni sum gyur du btung ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so// des smras pa/ gshin rje
136a6('dul ba): g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro// sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo // de nas nye dgas mar khrus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las
136a7('dul ba): mazhu nas shi'o// de la gser mang du yod do// cha gcig ni chos gos las so// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so// cha gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang
136b1('dul ba): sram khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dka' gum pa las/ de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchis kyis/ de la bka' stsal
136b2('dul ba): pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos spras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob cig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu song ngo // de rnams kyang lpags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo// dge slong
136b3('dul ba): rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nus skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / de nas bcom
136b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang
136b5('dul ba): gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyed bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho/
136b6('dul ba): ba'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na ba na rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so
136b7('dul ba): zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs
137a1('dul ba): par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thong zhig ces spros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi/
137a2('dul ba): lhur mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das
137a3('dul ba): kyis bka' ji skad stsal ba bzhin du bgyi ste/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas
137a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste
137a5('dul ba): bsgyur nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas/ de la gser mang du byung ste gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos so zhes thos nas/ de rnams myur
137a6('dul ba): bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas/ bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis
137a7('dul ba): bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so// yangs pa can dang / wA rA NA si pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar
137b1('dul ba): grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnams sdud cing 'gyed pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams
137b2('dul ba): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gan+d+hi dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul/
137b3('dul ba): shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o// shi ba'i gaN+DI de rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'grim pa
137b4('dul ba): dang gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang byas te gnas mal
137b5('dul ba): bams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis nan
137b6('dul ba): pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang / mi ganga' ba
137b7('dul ba): mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad rdzas gda'
138a1('dul ba): ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsol/
138a2('dul ba): ba'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
138a3('dul ba): gang na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha mar byas nas bgo bar
138a4('dul ba): bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad cig sbyar te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhan
138a5('dul ba): pa la byin nus ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol ba 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang
138a6('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas// the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os
138a7('dul ba): pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os par chags
138b1('dul ba): bas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mnga' dug caran gyis glang po che'i gnang du bstan pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mnga'i phyi rjes
138b2('dul ba): bzhin du song nas/ rngon pa de srog dang bral lo// ji tsam nam stes te/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas rdzogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // nu be dang
138b3('dul ba): bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis/ nyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu brang ngo // de na glang
138b4('dul ba): po che'i sha bcad cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis/ de dag la ci'i
138b5('dul ba): phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis gdab bo// de dag gis sha dug can zos dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos
138b6('dul ba): nas ni lhag ma dug gis btab bo// gang dag chu la dang ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas/ lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag gis ni sha zos
138b7('dul ba): pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs nas/ gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhag pas bcings nas/ phyogs
139a1('dul ba): der 'ongs nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo // de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim/

139a4('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa geng yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur

139b3('dul ba): shi nas/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo byad dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar srung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes

139b6('dul ba): gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang g.yog gis nang pa'i rtags la mkhas bar bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyam

140a1('dul ba): kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas// dge slong zhig la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas

140a3('dul ba): cig des smras pa/ des kho bo kho nA la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag
140a4('dul ba): de gsen po'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par

140a7('dul ba): par dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol ba dang / dge slong dag dge slong de log par lhung ngo // gal te tshangs pa mtshung
140b1('dul ba): par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas par gyur dang / dad pa skyes pas log pa'i ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod/

140b5('dul ba): yod na des 'bad de bsab par bya'o// gal te med na de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
140b6('dul ba): dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba/ nang tshabs che ba/ tshor bas nyen po zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ kho bo'i
140b7('dul ba): lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas/ de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so// dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu
141a1('dul ba): khyer nas/ bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lpags nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so// gos 'gyed pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar srungs so// de nas bcom ldan/

141a3('dul ba): kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye ba dang / sbrul zhig mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go/

141a7('dul ba): gcig gi lus de gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i dang / dur khrod du me phal bas sreg par 'gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o//
141b1('dul ba): nga lda bas na dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing / gang la skye ba de yongs su spang bar bya'o// ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur to// gzhan yang

141b3('dul ba): nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gos 'gyed pas lhung bzed dang ches gos bge'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/

141b7('dul ba): du lhags te/ gos 'gyed pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas/ dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des
142a1('dul ba): spras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i rol mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'byed par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das/
142a2('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro la mchod pa byas la/ de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang / nyes dmigs
142a3('dul ba): 'dir mi 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas/ de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te/ ro la mchod pa byas
142a4('dul ba): bsregs nas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'gyed pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa lngas/ de'i dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ re zhig bdag gi ched du chos
142a5('dul ba): kha sgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'gyed par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
142a6('dul ba): pa de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas/ chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// / sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang // dngos po'i/
142a7('dul ba): sbyin pa lag gis gla// mtshams pazhi dag tu bya ba dang / pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
142b1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lpags so// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms/
142b2('dul ba): kyi sku skal bzhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhis te/ lnga po gang gis she na// nang du
142b3('dul ba): yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams
142b4('dul ba): 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis
142b5('dul ba): bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal ba zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ lde mig bsnam
142b6('dul ba): te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dpa gtsug lag khang nas gtsug khang dang / spyil po nas spyil po dang / 'chag sa nAs 'chag sa rnams su 'chag cing gshegs pa na/ gtsug
142b7('dul ba): lag khang chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang / de na dge slong nang tshabs che ba/ shes pa chung ba/ rang go gcin dang ngan spyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/
143a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
143a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong pa khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu b+hu na/ ci'i phyir de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon
143a3('dul ba): ma mchis so zhes ngu skad 'don/ btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa 'am/ lta ba ma mchis so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs
143a4('dul ba): par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang blta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so// de bas dang khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha
143a5('dul ba): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing / ri spos kyi ngang ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do//
143a6('dul ba): chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi

143b1('dul ba): dad ldang ba las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdas

144a1('dul ba): sngar song ngo // chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad

149a1('dul ba): gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su
149a2('dul ba): bskur ba/ 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su
149a3('dul ba): zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag lngas byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyir rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sbyin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams
149a4('dul ba): la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur
149a5('dul ba): te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA sa'i grong
149a6('dul ba): khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to// mdun na 'dom la yang bu gnyis yod pa las
149a7('dul ba): nu ze shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas sheng 'phrod pa yin pas// de gnyis phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal bus
149b1('dul ba): smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni thabs mchis kyis/ snyan du gsol bar bgyid/
149b2('dul ba): des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste/ gzhug gis smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro// des rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas rgyal
149b3('dul ba): bu phu ba~M shos de sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni zhu bor gyur to snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur ro//
149b4('dul ba): des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug go// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nA rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa
149b5('dul ba): las rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo // des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs bri zhig byas so//
149b6('dul ba): lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyis/ gal te lha dgyes na 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o// des smras pa/ gnang gis byos shig/ des de la sman byin nas sos par
149b7('dul ba): gyur to// de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba
150a1('dul ba): byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing / zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i rnam par/
150a2('dul ba): smin pa yang nyams su mi myong bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// mdun na 'don gyi bu
150a3('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis kyis gros byas nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na ma nyam du zha bor gyur to// yang
150a4('dul ba): 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te/ slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam
150a5('dul ba): par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las
150a6('dul ba): gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//
150a7('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag tshong dben zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam
150b1('dul ba): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas nig
150b2('dul ba): dang chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / chal
150b3('dul ba): lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag
150b4('dul ba): la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni de lha ma yin te/ gal te de ltar
150b5('dul ba): gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo dag
150b6('dul ba): skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / mdus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas
150b7('dul ba): gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro// des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe/ lha thams cad spangs te/ bcom
151a1('dul ba): ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'brung/
151a2('dul ba): bar 'tshal lo// bzhin bzangs de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rim gyis sku bregs nas/ bsrab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brnams pa las rims chen pos thabs nas/ rab tu b+h+ya
151a3('dul ba): ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing /
151a4('dul ba): de'i rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams dang
151a5('dul ba): sman pas so// sman pa rnams kyis nyin par sman byas na/ mtshan mo nad la bab par gyur to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di'i dpyad bdag cag gis gdugs la bgyis na
151a6('dul ba): mtshan mo gro la bab par gyur gyis/ gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na/ bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
151a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du skyel la der yang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/ skra ring po ring por skyes pas/ khyim bdag de khyim bdag
151b1('dul ba): mgo reg ces bya bar zags so// de gang gi rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/ skyur la na bar gyur pa de'i chu/ des
151b2('dul ba): bdag ni 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gis cha chod nas/ de na des 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro// de ni ni'o// blon po rnams
151b3('dul ba): kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang /
151b4('dul ba): go cha la sogs te phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa nye
151b5('dul ba): dga' dbang ba glegs bu la ma bris pa yang ma thob na/ glegs bu la bris pa lha smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de long zhig pa'i skabs de dge
151b6('dul ba): slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ci dag yod// bar sdom la/ bzhi dpa gnas mal
151b7('dul ba): gos dang ni// lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang// rdza mkham 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan sogs// tshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang // rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang // zas dang /
152a1('dul ba): brdung ba sman dang ni// bran dang gding ba dbang rgya dag/ ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya// dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang // gzhan yang rdung byas rdungs ma byas/
152a2('dul ba): dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo'o zhes// drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rigs par bag
152a3('dul ba): bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang / tshong khang gi gzhi dang / gnas mal dang / lcags nag gi mgar ba'i lag spyad dang / lcags mgar gyi lag spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag
152a4('dul ba): spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / 'bru rnams kyi mi
152a5('dul ba): bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag par bya'o// ras yug dang / ras yug chen dang / ko s+tho dang / mchil lham dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang / ril pa dang /
152a6('dul ba): bya ma bum rnams ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o// mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o// thung ngu gang yin
152a7('dul ba): pa de dag ni 'khar gsil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyis mi kha sgyur te/ ci rigs pa zhog blangs nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o//
152b1('dul ba): rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang / D+ha dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / dre'u rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// ba lang dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug rnams ni phyogs
152b2('dul ba): bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag ste mi bgo'o// 'thab rten dang / gos dang / gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o//
152b3('dul ba): cha rnams ni gzhag la/ de rnams gri gu dang / khab dang / 'khar gsil du brdungs te/ dge 'dun la brim par bya'o// tshon rtsi rnams las tshon rtsi chen po kAng gus pa dang / mtshal dang
152b4('dul ba): thing shing la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni su'i gzugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang du gzhag par bya'o// thod lo kor dang / btsag dang / rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// chang ni
152b5('dul ba): yos thugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ tshar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o// tshar ma rung na dor bar bya'o// dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyis chang mi sbyin
152b6('dul ba): zhing na tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi bathung ngo // sman rnams ni nadu khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing / de nas dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya'o// rin po che rnams mya chog
152b7('dul ba): ma gtogs par nor bu dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ni cha gnyis su byas te/ gcig ni chos la'o// cig shos ni dge 'dun la'o// chos kyi gang
153a1('dul ba): yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// glegs
153a2('dul ba): ba ma rnams las sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhug par bya'o// phyi rol pa'i bstan//

153a4('dul ba): nus pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhag par bya'o// gser dang / dbyig dang / gzhan yang rdungs su byas pa dang / rdungs su ma byas
153a5('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni cha gsum du bya ste/ gcig ni sangs rgyas la'o// gnyis pa ni chos la'o// gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o// sangs rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni dri gtsang khang dang //

153b1('dul ba): snyon btsugs pa de'i tshe / de na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe dge slong khrums stong dge slong mas bkur ba
153b2('dul ba): yin pas/ chu bzangs kyi dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa khrums stong la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa chu bzangs kyi dus ston
153b3('dul ba): la spyan 'dren gyis gshegs so// des smras pa/ bdag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa

154a1('dul ba): pa bdag gi dus ma lags pa'i btung ba gsol cig/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras nas/ des de rnams kyi sems srung ba'i phyir
154a2('dul ba): ga ya ra tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs/ de bzhin du dro yang zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang / de dag brtseg brtseg pa yor langs nas de yang lam gyis
154a3('dul ba): dub pa des mang por zos nas ma zhu bar gyur te/ gsung de shi'o// de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du lhags so//

154a6('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shi ba'i
154a7('dul ba): yo byad kyi sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis bslab par bya'o// byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gaN+DI brdungs la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge
154b1('dul ba): srong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams/

154b3('dul ba): stong gum na/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos gos dang / gos kyi rin dang bcas pa/ kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis kyis/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/
154b4('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod kyi gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang / chos gos gos dang / gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i
154b5('dul ba): sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par gyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
154b6('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan du gum/ lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos po'i sbyin pa yang gzhan na mchis na/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur
154b7('dul ba): lags/ nye bar 'khor dngos po'i sbyin pa'i dge slong ngam/ khyim pa gang na yod pa'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod ne'o// de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o// da
155a1('dul ba): slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
155a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la ci 'dres sam ma 'dres pa gyur pa de brtag par bya'o// gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten gyi/

155a4('dul ba): dge 'dun no// dge 'dun gyi ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / dri gtsang khang dang / mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o//
155a5('dul ba): dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/ seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o// gal te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
155a6('dul ba): bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang /
155a7('dul ba): de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsugs lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis//
155b1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dang / rtswa thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / la
155b2('dul ba): gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing / de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'gyed par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/
155b3('dul ba): rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams pa dang / dge skos kyis mthong nas spras
155b4('dul ba): kha tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin
155b5('dul ba): pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te shi ba'i yo byad
155b6('dul ba): 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal 'tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de bzhin
155b7('dul ba): du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan
156a1('dul ba): dun 'gal 'tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes kyis 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
156a2('dul ba): yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byed
156a3('dul ba): na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
156a4('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ dge slong des gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas sprad pa'i skabs/
156a5('dul ba): de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong des yid gcugs par bya ba ma yin pa la yid gcugs par
156a6('dul ba): bskyed de/ 'di ltar des gang gis bsrur ba de la yid gcugs par spyad do// 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ gang la bsrur ba de la
156a7('dul ba): yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no// gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar/
156b1('dul ba): byed na/ gang la bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bsrur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed/
156b2('dul ba): nad legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang gis bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang gis bsrur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du ru
156b3('dul ba): bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bsrung
156b4('dul ba): ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur
156b5('dul ba): ba na/ gang la bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i
156b6('dul ba): yod byang du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis bslabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge 'dun la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang
156b7('dul ba): gis bskur ba de yang shi nas/ gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs
157a1('dul ba): par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi la/ gang gis skur bar/
157a2('dul ba): byed pa de'ang shi na/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung ba'i byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par
157a3('dul ba): byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// // sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang / rdol ba dang ni blangs pa dang
157a4('dul ba): dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi// nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang // bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis te// gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa// ston pa blta bar 'dod pa nang // 'dam rdzab
157a5('dul ba): kyis ni ngal gyur pa// de la dar ni chos gos gnang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par/
157a6('dul ba): zhal gyis bzhes so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos
157a7('dul ba): zin pa dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / rdul gyis lus yog bzhin mnyan yod ga na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/
157b1('dul ba): rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang / mnya nu yod du phyin to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang /
157b2('dul ba): na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
157b3('dul ba): ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong dag khyed de gzong gnas 'ongs// gnas
157b4('dul ba): gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa bdag cag ni gnas bcas nas du gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lags so// dge slong dag khyed
157b5('dul ba): cag gnas bcas su ji ga bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam/ bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa med par gsol te/ bdag cig gnas bcas su bde ba la reg
157b6('dul ba): par dbyar gnas shing / bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so// 'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dung chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdza ba chen po
157b7('dul ba): tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / rdul gyis lus yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na/ tshogs chen pos 'dir mchis lags so// // 'dul
158a1('dul ba): ba gzhi// / bam po re bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams
158a2('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdza ba chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rdul gyis yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis/ ma la ngas
158a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o// 'di/
158a4('dul ba): lhur sraswa brkyang bting na phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu lngas thal na ma yin pa dang / zla bo las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / bla gos thang gos dang bcas pa'i chos
158a5('dul ba): gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing za na ma yin pa dang / yang yang za ba na ma/
158a6('dul ba): yin pa dang / khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring po nas/ dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sna brkyang bting ba
158a7('dul ba): rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas mangs rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin
158b1('dul ba): ba po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal nas
158b2('dul ba): ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong
