158b3('dul ba): rnams kyis snga brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar bya'o//
158b4('dul ba): gding ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re zhig thog mar mthun pa'i go ba bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na
158b5('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/
158b6('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di na
158b7('dul ba): dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra brkyang bgyis nas/ sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas
159a1('dul ba): nas chas pa la chos gos rnyed pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lha smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/
159a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so// des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
159a3('dul ba): chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
159a4('dul ba): gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas
159a5('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so// de sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams lta smos kyang tsa
159a6('dul ba): 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag chos gro 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing / chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos/
159a7('dul ba): rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun
159b1('dul ba): gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings te/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba
159b2('dul ba): yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu sra
159b3('dul ba): brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bskor bar mi bya zhing / bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar
159b4('dul ba): gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsgo bar mi bya ste/
159b5('dul ba): spob pa dang / gzhi nas spob pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun
159b6('dul ba): pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong na
159b7('dul ba): sra brkyang 'dings par me bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing / bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /
160a1('dul ba): 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun tham/
160a2('dul ba): cad 'tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro 'am/ gal te
160a3('dul ba): spron des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings
160a4('dul ba): pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge
160a5('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol
160a6('dul ba): ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/ de'i slad du
160a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las
160b1('dul ba): gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/
160b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa meng 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas sra
160b3('dul ba): brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/
160b4('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sr-i brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar
160b5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca'
160b6('dul ba): bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas/ sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste bkru'o// brkyang ngo // dra'o// drub po// kha sbyar ro// chung ngun khab kyis srubs gnyis
160b7('dul ba): sam gsum yang bcom par bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
161a1('dul ba): dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog
161a2('dul ba): gis gtor zhing / dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+DI brdungs nas/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsko la/ dge 'dun
161a3('dul ba): thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol//
161a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas
161a5('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// gding ngo // bting ngo // de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyis
161a6('dul ba): gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gnas brtan dgongs su gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang
161a7('dul ba): 'dings par bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags so zhes brjod par bya'o// des legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting ste/ 'di la
161b1('dul ba): rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs
161b2('dul ba): par bting ngo // shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te/
161b3('dul ba): chab khung sar ma yin/ snam phyi sar ma yin te/ tshangs bang du 'jug par mi bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o// gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o// sra brlang 'dings
161b4('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa'i bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas spu brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis
161b5('dul ba): dpyid zla ra ba zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la yang go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnam byin gyis rlobs shig/ de la rnyed pa
161b6('dul ba): byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gis sra brkyang
161b7('dul ba): ma bting lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang /
162a1('dul ba): sra brlung de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o// gzhan yang 'di lnga'i ma bting ba yin te/ slob pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod/
162a2('dul ba): pA dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang bslab pa byin pa'i 'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la/ phan yon ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma
162a3('dul ba): yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur
162a4('dul ba): pa'i 'o// gzhan yang lnga pa 'di dag gi ste/ spob pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i 'o// btsun
162a5('dul ba): pa du zhig gi rnyed pa pa yang ma mchis la/ phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas/
162a6('dul ba): phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun byed na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o// dge slong
162a7('dul ba): rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs
162b1('dul ba): pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// ji ga bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ bdag cag ni chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom mo// tshe dang ldan pa
162b2('dul ba): dag bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyed la chos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /
162b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas brjes su gnang ste/ chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir/ sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/
162b4('dul ba): gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
162b5('dul ba): gsol ba bya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom
162b6('dul ba): rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lpags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnam
162b7('dul ba): kyi slad du / sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang
163a1('dul ba): bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi srang du ka sra brkyang /
163a2('dul ba): 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir/ sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod
163a3('dul ba): pa de dag ni de gsungs shig dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du cang
163a4('dul ba): mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste/ bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal ba las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams
163a5('dul ba): la bgo ba sha' bya'o// / sdom la/ rdol ba dang ni srin zos dang / mthal skor ldan rlo lhan rings dang / gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang / brnyings dang spangs dang dengs/
163a6('dul ba): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos gos rdol bas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor
163a7('dul ba): mi rung ngo // btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal ba dang / chos gos cha ga btab pa dang / chos gos ldan pa rlo bos btab pa dang / chos gos ldan rings can dang / gso ma'i
163b1('dul ba): seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos zegs pa dang / chos gos brnying pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos dedrangs pas sa brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar/
163b2('dul ba): 'khor mi rung ngo // / sdom la/ blings dang dus ma yin pa dang // gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum// mi rung ba dang ma dras dang // khru lngar mchog mi bya dang /
163b3('dul ba): blo mthun min dang mi gding dang // mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa blings pa'i
163b4('dul ba): chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang / mthang gos dang
163b5('dul ba): mi rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lngar ma mchis pa dang / blo mthun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'dings pa ma bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi skad rol
163b6('dul ba): tu blo mthun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyis brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sa brkyang 'dings pas/ sra brkyang gding du rlung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mo rung ngo //
163b7('dul ba): sdom la/ dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum/ sar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid// 'phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras// gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/
164a1('dul ba): btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas/ dge 'dun//
164a2('dul ba): gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // chos gos sar pa rung ngo // sar pa brtags pa rung ngo // 'phongs pa'i chos
164a3('dul ba): gos rung ngo // gso ma'i se ras snam sbyar mi rung ngo // btsun pa gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang 'dings su rung lags sam/ gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo
164a4('dul ba): bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no// // sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa dang // khru lnga pa dang khru lnga'i lhag blo mthun byas pa'i gding ba dang // mtshams kyi nang
164a5('dul ba): nyid skye ba'o// btsun pa gang zag gi chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na'o// khyim pa'i gos kyis
164a6('dul ba): mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // khru lnga pas rung ngo // khru lnga las lhag pas rung ngo // blo mthun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'dings
164a7('dul ba): pas rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos pas rung ngo // ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra
164b1('dul ba): brkyang byung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni
164b2('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang
164b3('dul ba): mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no// song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
164b4('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra
164b5('dul ba): brkyang phyung ba yin no// rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtsham
164b6('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i
164b7('dul ba): mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos
165a1('dul ba): ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ongs shing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang
165a2('dul ba): mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
165a3('dul ba): chos gros ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos
165a4('dul ba): kyang mi bya'o snyam nas/ des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang / nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na
165a5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun
165a6('dul ba): mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra rkyang phyung po zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra
165a7('dul ba): brkyang phyung ba yin no// mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par
165b1('dul ba): phyir 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa las/ mtshams kyi phyir rol tu song ba de'i ni mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na
165b2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ongs shing chos gos bya'o snyam pa
165b3('dul ba): las de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad chad pa de'i ni re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ dge slong sra
165b4('dul ba): brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang byung ba nyams su myong ba de'i ni brgyad pa
165b5('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin no// // sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang // brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang // re ba yod pa nyi shu dang // re ba med pa nyi shu yin//
165b6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di
165b7('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi/ 'on kyang ches gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
166a1('dul ba): chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi
166a2('dul ba): 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma
166a3('dul ba): zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// /
166a4('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun/
166a5('dul ba): pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha'
166a6('dul ba): can gyi sku brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong snga brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ sngar 'ong zhing chos
166a7('dul ba): gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang ches gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di
166b1('dul ba): lha ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song
166b2('dul ba): nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas
166b3('dul ba): nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ sngar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni
166b4('dul ba): nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slongs brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/
166b5('dul ba): slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /
166b6('dul ba): shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/
166b7('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing ches gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang chos
167a1('dul ba): gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
167a2('dul ba): ges ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kya
167a3('dul ba): mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu
167a4('dul ba): song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/
167a5('dul ba): dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing ches gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge
167a6('dul ba): 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i
167a7('dul ba): ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sa brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge spangasra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos mthon par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/
167b1('dul ba): slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi
167b2('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing ches gos bya'o/
167b3('dul ba): zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing ches gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/
167b4('dul ba): dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas// chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la zhag pa las/ de der
167b5('dul ba): song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sa brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas
167b6('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhags pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge
167b7('dul ba): 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// /
168a1('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par TI slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te srar mi 'ong zhes sems la
168a2('dul ba): the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
168a3('dul ba): byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za
168a4('dul ba): bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta
168a5('dul ba): ste/ dge sdang sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song
168a6('dul ba): ba las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sku brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slongs brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
168a7('dul ba): byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu seng ba las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/
168b1('dul ba): des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung
168b2('dul ba): yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang ba'i gnas nas chos gros ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o//
168b3('dul ba): 'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la ni ches gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par zhes bya'o// 'dir ni chos gos ma zin par zhes bya ba bor te/ chos gos brtsoms pa zhes bya ba bcug ste/ rnam pa
168b4('dul ba): 'di nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o//
168b5('dul ba): snyam pa'i re ba yod pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang ches gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba yod pa zhes
168b6('dul ba): bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas ches gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par skur 'ong zhing chos gos bya/
168b7('dul ba): snyam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyis brkyang
169a1('dul ba): phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// / sdom la/ bya ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang // btsal/
169a2('dul ba): ba dang ni de bzhin gzhan// yul la lngar ni bya ba ste// gnas la yang ni lnga yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
169a3('dul ba): gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni
169a4('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sgra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sa brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la
169a5('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song naswa/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i
169a6('dul ba): mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song
169a7('dul ba): nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang
169b1('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas
169b2('dul ba): sA brkyang phyubyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can
169b3('dul ba): gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos
169b4('dul ba): gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa'i de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// der song nas
169b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/
169b6('dul ba): dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems
169b7('dul ba): pa the tshom za ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// sems la the tshom zabs/
170a1('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa'i ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang / rnams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong
170a2('dul ba): sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par btsal ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song na/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
170a3('dul ba): slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// btsal ba'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no// 'di lta ste/ dge
170a4('dul ba): srong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di
170a5('dul ba): g+ha ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems
170a6('dul ba): la the tshom za ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin te/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyam
170a7('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// yul blta ba'i lnga ji lta bar gnas blta ba'i snga yang de bzhin no// sra brkyang gi ga ni rdzogs so//
170b1('dul ba): 'dul ba'i ka ni// bam po ro brgyang pa// ko'u sham bi'i gzhi'i sdom ni/ ko'u sham bir mi 'thab krol gyi// dge slong rtsod pa swa/
170b2('dul ba): tshogs dang // khre'u dang rtsod par byed pa dang // ring po len gyi spyod pa dang // ngan spyong lan tsa khab pa dang / bsrungs dang tshal sdug glang chen dang // ma 'gags pas ni de byas dang /
170b3('dul ba): mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bi'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gdug pa rnam/
170b4('dul ba): par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa
170b5('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no// yangs pa can na/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa
170b6('dul ba): zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no// de nas yangs pa can gyi da/
170b7('dul ba): slong dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ko'u sham par phyin te/ de lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gi drung du song ste son pa dang / phan tshun so so
171a1('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa rnams gtan la dbab par brtsams te/ de na gcig gis smras pa/ mdo sde
171a2('dul ba): 'di ni 'di skad du gdon par bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di yin no// cig shos kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de skad du gdon par mi bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i ni 'di ma yin no// kho bo'i ni
171a3('dul ba): rigs so// khyod kyi ni mi rigs so// kho bo'i 'brel ba yin no// khyod kyi ni 'brel ba me yin no zhes de gnyis phan tshun du ma mthun par gyur nas/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gis/ yangs
171a4('dul ba): pa can gyi dge sbyong la klan ka stsal ba lhur len cing 'dug go// dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba byas te/ gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa dang / nyung ba dang /
171a5('dul ba): chu med pa mthong ba des chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba 'am/ dge skos la khrus kyi bum pa sto par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// gal te bdag nyid kyis
171a6('dul ba): ma bkang ngam/ dge skos la ma bsgo bar gyur na/ de ni ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung ba 'chags su gzhug go zhes byas so// ji tsam na khyim bdag
171a7('dul ba): cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs so// de na dge slong kha cig ni zas la dong ngo // kha cig ni 'gro bar chas so// yangs
171b1('dul ba): pa can gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snam phyi sar zhugs pa dang / de'i lhan cig gnas pas rings rings ltar 'ongs nas sgra phyung ba/ mkhan po dge sbyong kha cig ni zas
171b2('dul ba): la dong lags so// kha cig ni 'dong bar chas kyis tshur spyon bzhud do// de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste ches so// ko'u sham pa'i dge slong de yang
171b3('dul ba): phyogs de nyid du phyin pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong des khrus kyi bum pa blangs te/ gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bsams pa dang / lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/
171b4('dul ba): mkhan po gar bzhud/ des smras pa/ bu kho bo la ko'u sham bi'i dge slong 'di klan ka 'tshol bas khrus kyi bum pa 'gengs su 'gro'o// ci 'di thams cad kyis thams cad du stong ngam/
171b5('dul ba): thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so// mkhan po thams cad kyi thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas 'tshal te/ bdag cag
171b6('dul ba): ni mkhan po'i phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs bgyid pa lags kyis tshur spyon bzhud do// des de nyid du bzhag nas de dang lhan cig tu dong ngo // ko'u sham pa'i dge slong gis mthong
171b7('dul ba): nas khrus kyi bum pa de la mnams so// de nas mi bzod pa skyes te/ mdzal lo zhes byas nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste chu'i bya ba byas nas song ngo // de nas zan zos nas/
172a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lpags pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsngags pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong des dge 'dun gyi
172a2('dul ba): nang khrims dral lo// de nas rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdung ba byas nas rims kyis de'i drung du son pa dang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa skabs phye zhig/ ltung ba ris lnga la skabs phye'o//
172a3('dul ba): khyod la de ring ltung ba byung gis/ ltung ba yang slar chos bzhin du gyis shig/ ltung ba ma mthong ngo // dge 'dun gyis khrims su bca' ba gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa
172a4('dul ba): dang chu nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong na bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya 'am/ dge skos la tshe dang pa khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes
172a5('dul ba): bsgo bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la/ dge skos la yang ma bsgo na de ni ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chags su gzhug
172a6('dul ba): go zhes bcas pa ma yin nam/ des smras pa/ de ha cang spong ba ni ma yin no// stong par ma gyur kyang rung ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so// de cang mi spa bar 'dug go// ke'u
172a7('dul ba): sham bi'i dge slong ni ko'u sham bi na gnyug ma pa dang / 'khor mang po yin pas/ des de la nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams
172b1('dul ba): 'khrugs par gyur nas/ de na ko'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams dang 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pas byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lhung ba zung ngo zhe 'am/
172b2('dul ba): ltung ba ma byung nga zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes gang yang ltung ba dang / ltung ba med pa dang / gnas nas dbyung ba dang / gnas
172b3('dul ba): nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
172b4('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i
172b5('dul ba): rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang
172b6('dul ba): 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/ 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste bden nam/ btsun pa mang lags
172b7('dul ba): so// dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig/ 'tshang ma 'dru zhig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ gzhan yang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod
173a1('dul ba): pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas nas phyung bas 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam
173a2('dul ba): par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba
173a3('dul ba): 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis lhung ba chos bzhin sbar ma byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gar+tha
173a4('dul ba): par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis ltung ba phyir chos bzhin du bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par
173a5('dul ba): mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas
173a6('dul ba): byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /
173a7('dul ba): gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba
173b1('dul ba): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ lhung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/ gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste bden nam/ btsun pa mad lags so//
173b2('dul ba): dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'dru zhig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig gzhan yang ngas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca'
173b3('dul ba): bar bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin
173b4('dul ba): pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin gyis/ gal te bdag
173b5('dul ba): gis de la mi 'dod pa glengs sam dran par byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di la
173b6('dul ba): mi 'dod pa gleng bar mi bya/ dran par mi bya'o// gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can
173b7('dul ba): du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso
174a1('dul ba): spyod la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge/
174a2('dul ba): slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal
174a3('dul ba): to// dge slong dag khyed la ngas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma
174a4('dul ba): yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad lags so// dge slong da 'thab krol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'dru zhig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol dang /
174a5('dul ba): mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing / gnas nas las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang /
174a6('dul ba): bzhi'i las byas pa rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing / dge slong dag khyed dang dge slong de rnams dang khyed du tha dad du gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag gnas
174a7('dul ba): po 'di dag ni tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyi
174b1('dul ba): tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa/
174b2('dul ba): na ched du bsams te/ chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ de lta bu ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos kyis
174b3('dul ba): bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi phyed pa dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas dbyung ba ste/ 'di ni
174b4('dul ba): dge 'dun gis chos kyis yin no// dge slong dag gnyis po 'di dag ni mthun par gnas pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su
174b5('dul ba): bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab
174b6('dul ba): krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsams te/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs nas chos kyi phyogs su 'gro ba
174b7('dul ba): ste/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas
175a1('dul ba): phyung ba 'byin pa dang / phyir mi byed pa dang / sdig can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa'i ni dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no//
175a2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su
175a3('dul ba): phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs
175a4('dul ba): pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang
175a5('dul ba): 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad lags so zhes bya ba nas/ bcom
175a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs kyang / dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
175a7('dul ba): khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis
175b1('dul ba): bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te/ bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku/
175b2('dul ba): skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas/ skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na
175b3('dul ba): bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams zas kyi phyir khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa dang /
175b4('dul ba): 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lhung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ lhung ba ma byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ gzhag par 'os pa'o zhes bya
175b5('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ da ni phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs so// de nas dge slong bsod snyoms nod pas bsod snyoms khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
175b6('dul ba): bsod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
175b7('dul ba): ni bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong jig dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod pa'i kha zas
176a1('dul ba): kyis tshim par byas sam zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa/
176a2('dul ba): 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong jig dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa med par dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas
176a3('dul ba): bsod pas tshim par bgyis na/ 'on kyang rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams sdum pa'i nang du 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas ka 'di lta ste/
176a4('dul ba): lhung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/ gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// da ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas
176a5('dul ba): kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug la khang du zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag
176a6('dul ba): 'jog las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
176a7('dul ba): slong dag khyed kha zas la khyim du zhugs pa na 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa byung bar gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/
176b1('dul ba): de ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam/ btsun pa mang lags so// dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'dru zhig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed
176b2('dul ba): cig gzhan yang ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis
176b3('dul ba): khab pa'i nang du zhugs nas/ gang du lus kyi kun tu spyod pa'i rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar bsten/ bar chad yod par 'dug par bya'o// rgol ba dang phyir rgol
176b4('dul ba): ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas/ kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom
176b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/
176b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'dru zhig/ ma rtsod cig/
176b7('dul ba): 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas nas rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba
177a1('dul ba): dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di med do// dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol med pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang
177a2('dul ba): 'gyed pa med par gyur cing gnas nas rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul ba las 'dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di yod do//
177a3('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po ring po len gnyis phan tshun rtsod par gyur te/ rgyas par ni lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i/
177a4('dul ba): le'u las ring po len gyi mdo 'byung ba bzhin no// de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces/ tshangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal te/ nor rnams yongs
177a5('dul ba): su gtugs pa dang // gnyen rnams kyang ni ma mthong dang // yul gzhan shi ba sdug bsngal lo// zhes bka' stsal pa zhig kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
177a6('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshig mi mthun la phyogs mnyam yang // 'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa// dge 'dun dbye bar gyur nago/ mthu chung cung zad cis mi bsam/
177a7('dul ba): srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang // rta dang ba lang nor phrogs dang // yul 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang // 'dum par 'gyur ba nyid yod na// chos 'di rnam par shes gyur pa/
177b1('dul ba): khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur// spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung // chags la zlog pa lhur len pa// brtags na mkhas par snang ba ni// gang la rtsod pa de mi shes// gzhan dag
177b2('dul ba): bdag cag 'di la ni// brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi// gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa// de la gzu bo mi dgos so// bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/
177b3('dul ba): de la gang dag kho na 'dzin pa// de dag sha kho na zhi mi 'gyur// bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal ba dag ni pham gyur pa// de la gang dag khon mi 'dzin// de dag sha khon zhi bar 'gyur/
177b4('dul ba): khon du 'dzin pas sha kho na dag/ 'dir ni gzhar yang zhi mi 'gyur// bzod pas sha kho na zhi 'gyur ba// 'di ni g.yu drung chos yin no// khon du 'dzin pas sha kho na nam yang zhi mi 'gyur//
177b5('dul ba): khon du 'dzin med rnams kyis sha kho na zhi bar 'gyur// kho na la chags pa lus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur// de lta bas na mkhas pa khon du 'dzin pa byed// gal te grogs po 'grus skyong
177b6('dul ba): lhan cig spyod pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur na ni// zag par 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyis mnan byas nas/ de dang yid dga' dran dang ldan zhing spya
177b7('dul ba): par bya// gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na// rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs par gyur pa bzhin//
178a1('dul ba): gcig pur 'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rnams mi bya// gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba 'am// lhag par rnyed par ma gyur na// byis pa stongs mor 'gyur med
178a2('dul ba): pas// gcig pur spyad pa brtan par spyad// gcig pu spyod pa legs 'gyur gyi// byis pas bstangs pa legs min pas// ma btang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar// sems las bsrungs
178a3('dul ba): te gcig pas spyad// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rje lags/ bde bar
178a4('dul ba): gshegs pa ni chos kyi rje lags na/ 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang mi snyan pa mchi na// bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/ de nas bcom ldan
178a5('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang / log par sgrub pa des/ thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/ mnyan yod/
178a6('dul ba): gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
178a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang / ko'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams dang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur te/ snga dro ni zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la 'jug/ zas
178b1('dul ba): kyi 'og tu ni sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to// de rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis 'das so// ko'u sham pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnan/
178b2('dul ba): 'dun khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spun spyad
178b3('dul ba): kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dang na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul du lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs te/ da dung yang ma byon no// kha cig gis smras pa
178b4('dul ba): shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs par ga la 'gyur/ 'di na de ltar ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de/ snga
178b5('dul ba): zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la/ zas kyi 'og tu sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed do// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag de rnams la nyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang bdag
178b6('dul ba): cag gis lan te/ bdag cag gis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin pa 'am/ tshig smras pas so// tshur bdag cag gis khrims shig bcas la bzhag ste/ sus kyang de rnams la bsod
178b7('dul ba): snyoms mi sbyin zhing / tshig kyang mi smra'o zhes de rnams kyis khrims su bcas nas bzhag go// de nas phyi de nyin ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / sus kyang
179a1('dul ba): ma smras la/ bsod soms kyang ma byin te/ de rnams ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar bkrus pa nyid kyis sbyor byung ste/ bso//
179a2('dul ba): snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de rnams 'dus nas ko'u sham bi'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la spras pa/ shes ldan dag re zhig nor zang par gyur na bsod snyoms mi ster ba ni rigs na//
179a3('dul ba): bdag cag gis nyes pa ci byas na tshig kyang mi ster/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ gang dag gi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab na/
179a4('dul ba): steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te lo bcu gnyis 'das na/ da dung yang slar gshegs pa khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yon par bdag nyid khas 'che 'am/ de rnams cad mi sba
179a5('dul ba): bar 'khod nas/ de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de rnams kyis bdag cag brgyad pa ni thog tu bab ste/ gang zhig sa la 'gyel ba de de nyid las brten te ldang bas
179a6('dul ba): mdor na mnyan yod du dong la/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo// de nas ko'u sham bi li dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pa/ lhung bzed dang chos
179a7('dul ba): gos khyer te ko'u sham bir ma bzhugs par mnyan yod gang na ba deran+d+ha zhing dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/ mtshang 'bru bar byed pa/
179b1('dul ba): rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir gshegs pa de dag po cha med pas
179b2('dul ba): mtho ba tsam pa'i phyir/ bdag cag la gleng bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
179b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
179b4('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham bi'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa
179b5('dul ba): rnams 'dir mchi'o zhes thos lags te/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir byon pa de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho ba tsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng
179b6('dul ba): bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid na/ de rnams la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ kun dga' bo de dag la dge slong rnams kyis lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan pa ma gtogs
179b7('dul ba): par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar me bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya'o// gal te bdag cag ni rgan na ci'i phyir gnas mal gyi tha ma zhes smra na/ gang dag gi
180a1('dul ba): tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dkris shing thugs la ma thub nas 'di gshegs shing byu gna'i sas kyi spyo /
180a2('dul ba): par bdag nyid khas 'che 'am/ ston pa thugs rje can des 'dri gnang ba nyid kyang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smos shig/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis/ ko'u sham po'i dge/
180a3('dul ba): spong 'thab krol byed pa/ mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i ga'i byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te
180a4('dul ba): song la de rnams la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
180a5('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen me go'u ta mis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
180a6('dul ba): pa bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyod par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o zhes thes lags
180a7('dul ba): na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ go'u ta ma khyed kyis ke'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams la 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas mthong ma thag tu stan dor ba ma gtogs par
180b1('dul ba): gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ ko lu gam pa'i dge slong 'thub pos byed/
180b2('dul ba): pa mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so// zos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ song la bdag
180b3('dul ba): gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
180b4('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
180b5('dul ba): to// btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham po'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyod par bgyi ba/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o/
180b6('dul ba): zhes thos lags na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ khyim bdag khyod kyis ko'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dang mi mthun pa med pas bsod snyoms ni
180b7('dul ba): sbyin gyi/ gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya'o// de nas ke'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas
181a1('dul ba): der lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas dris pa/ gnas mal 'gyed pa su yin/ phyag tsang dag gis smras pa/ 'banas pa kun
181a2('dul ba): dga' bo lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la gnas mal
181a3('dul ba): byin cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de rnams la lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan par brtsams pa dang // de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag nan pa
181a4('dul ba): yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag la gnas mal tha ma dag sbyin/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par zhes bya ba nas/ de yang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
181a5('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams yi chad cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'da' bar byed do// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su rang gi rgyud la brtags nas de 'di
181a6('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'thab bkrol dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin
181a7('dul ba): mon 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bdag ni srung ba ma byung ba ma yin te/ srung bzung ba yin zhing / gnas nis mi dbyung ba ma yin te// gnas nas dbyung ba yin la// gnas nam
181b1('dul ba): byung ba gang yin pa de yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gis/ ma la bdag gis mthun pa'i bsdams bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ nang par snangasaH/
181b2('dul ba): te gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der song ste son nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su
181b3('dul ba): phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir ma dang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su
181b4('dul ba): bdag gis rang gi rlung la brtags na 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ lhung ba
181b5('dul ba): ma byung ngo zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba/ bdag ni srung ba ma byung ba ma yin te/ srung ba byung ba yin zhing / gnas nas nas mi dbyung ba ma 'i/
181b6('dul ba): te/ gnas nas dbyung gA yin la/ gnas nas byung ba gang yin pa yang ris dang mthan pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhig par mi 'os pas phyung gos/ ma la bdag gis mthun par ba sdums
181b7('dul ba): bya'o snyam na khyed cig ci s+tha/ de rnams kyis spros pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rige slo
182a1('dul ba): rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i//
182a2('dul ba): rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang
182a3('dul ba): gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
182a4('dul ba): ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtagan 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba byung nas zhes bya ba nas
182a5('dul ba): 'dum par bsdu mas bya bar sems na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ khyed cag ci smra/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong
182a6('dul ba): dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang /
182a7('dul ba): gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de dong ste phyin nas
182b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis / bcom ldan 'das la 'di/
182b2('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rlud la brtags na 'di skab du sems te zhes bya ba nas/ mthun par bsdums bgyi bar zhes bya
182b3('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag gis dge slong 'di dag thams cad la mthun par bgyi ba spro bar bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so
182b4('dul ba): legs so// gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / ma tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa
182b5('dul ba): de ni/ bsod nams mang po tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med par skyed par 'gyur ro// gang 'ga' zhig gis skra dum bu brgyar gtubs pa thog ma dang thog mar sbyor ba byed pa de bzhin du/
182b6('dul ba): gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang zhes bya ba nas/ mthun par sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med pa/ grangs med pa gzhal du med pa skyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
182b7('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag 'on kyang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la dbyung ba
183a1('dul ba): gsol bar bya'o// gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs nas/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la
183a2('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang bcas pas gdung ba byas la/ nan rims kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te/ cog cog pur 'dug
183a3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag gi gleng ga ni gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ lkung
183a4('dul ba): ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bgyi ba 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe 'am/ gnas nas phyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba/ bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te/
183a5('dul ba): ltung ba byung ba lags shing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/ gnas nas phyung ba'i gang lags pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs
183a6('dul ba): pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams thugs brtse ba can
183a7('dul ba): thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dbyung du gsol/ chos ji lta ba bzhin dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin phyir bgyi'o zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//
183b1('dul ba): de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te khas bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshan
183b2('dul ba): 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so//
183b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te/ ltung ba byung ba lags shing / gnas nas mi byung ba ma lags te// gnas nas dbyung ba lags la// gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa
183b4('dul ba): chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs par gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus
183b5('dul ba): la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
183b6('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol byung ba zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gnas nas phyung ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol te/ de'i
183b7('dul ba): slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni ca
184a1('dul ba): ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//
184a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyung lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//
184a3('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas dge slong dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis/ dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol bar bya'o// gsol
184a4('dul ba): ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang
184a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ thugs brtse ba can zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//
184a6('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi'i gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lnga ste
184a7('dul ba): ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te / ldung
184b1('dul ba): ba byung ba lags shing / gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa de yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs/
184b2('dul ba): pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol nas/ dge 'dun las dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags
184b3('dul ba): te dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang
184b4('dul ba): bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge
184b5('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/
184b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang
184b7('dul ba): mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i las byas zin pa gang yin pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa sbyin par bya ste/ de la
185a1('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o// ngas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis mthun/
185a2('dul ba): pa byin pa'i dge slong gis gso sbyong gsol ba bya'o// gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba bdag ming 'di zhes
185a3('dul ba): bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste// mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong bdag ming
185a4('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol// de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te
185a5('dul ba): las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/
185a6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/
185a7('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis mthun pa'i
185b1('dul ba): gso sbyong stsol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba/
185b2('dul ba): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas/ mthun pa stsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las mthun
185b3('dul ba): pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag
185b4('dul ba): mthun pa mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig
185b5('dul ba): 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge
185b6('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong
185b7('dul ba): gang la mthun pa'i gso sbyong byin pa de dang dge 'dun lhan cig gcig tu 'dug la gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas
186a1('dul ba): te/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// mi mthun par byed na 'grus tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis bkra shes kyi gso stong dang / mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang / oM bde ba/
186a2('dul ba): la gso sbyong bya ba ma gtogs par/ gso sbyong ma yin par gso sbyong mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// ko'u sham bi'i gni rdzogs so// / 'dul ba ga'i/
186a3('dul ba): bam po dgu pa// las kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/ ka shi'i gnas pa'i grong khyer na// sde 'joms kyis ni dngos po dang / tsam par sangs rgyas bcom ldan
186a4('dul ba): 'das// las ma yin dang slar log pa'o// / yul ka shi'i gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na/ dge slong sde 'joms zhes bya ba gnas te/ de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi
186a5('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byed de/ dge slong glo bur ba gang dag gnas pa'i grong khyer du lhags nas/ de rnams des ngal sor bcug ste yo byad thams cad
186a6('dul ba): kyis bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsod snyoms sbyor ba'i khyim gang yin pa de rnams su zas la gtong bar byed do// ji tsam na rgan zhugs shig gnas pa'i
186a7('dul ba): grong khyer du dbyar gnas nas dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das pa dang / chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing
186b1('dul ba): dong ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang / mnyan yod du phyin to// drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo drug sde gang yang rung bas stong par mi 'jog pa yin pas ka rgyal bu rgya/
186b2('dul ba): byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nanye dga' 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na nas mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'di ni dge slong gnas brtan zhig yin te 'ong gi
186b3('dul ba): sur 'gro'o zhes/ des bsu nas gnas brtan byon pa legs so// byon pa legs so// des smras pa/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// des bsam pa/ kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs shig yin te/
186b4('dul ba): slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas/ rgan zhugs ji srid cig nas 'ongs/ gnas pa'i grong khyer nas so// ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do//
186b5('dul ba): de ci gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te 'phongs pa zhig yin/ gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/ 'phongs pa ni ji lta bu/ gang na yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa de ni gtsug lag khang yin no//
186b6('dul ba): gang na yo byad med pa de ni 'phongs pa yin no// gal te de lta na de ni gtsug lag khang yin te/ de na dge slong snga 'joms zhes bya ba gnas so// de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze
186b7('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byed de/ dge slong glo bur ba gang dag der lhags pa de rnams des ngal sor bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis
187a1('dul ba): bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsod snyobs sbyor ba'i khyim gang yin pa de rnams su zas la gtong bar byed do// drug sde/
187a2('dul ba): rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni nyin par cung zad cig thos pa de dgongs ka 'dug nas phan tshun smra bar byed pa yin pas/ dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis ji srid du sdug bsngal pog snyam bya//
187a3('dul ba): khyed las 'ga' zhig gis gang na rgya che ba snang ba yod pa lnga cung zad ci thos/ nyes dgas smras pa/ yul ka shi'i gnas pa'i grong khyer na/ dge slong sde 'joms zhes bya ba gnas te
187a4('dul ba): de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba nas/ zas la gtong bar byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gal te 'dod na der 'dong ngo zhes/
187a5('dul ba): rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der n+d+ha zhing dong ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba las gnas pa'i grong khyer du phyin pa dang / de rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas sde
187a6('dul ba): 'joms mthong nas des bsams pa/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa'i 'di dag 'ong gis/ ngal sor bcug ste mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs par bya'i/ khyim rnams su
187a7('dul ba): zas la ni gtang bar mi bya'o snyam nas/ des de rnams ngal sor bcug nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs kyi/ khyim rnams su zas la ni ma btang ngo // de rnams la kha cig gis smras pa/
187b1('dul ba): dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag la rgan zhugs 'dis yo byad thams cad kyis ni bstabs kyi/ khyim rnams su zas la ni ma btang ngo // gzhan dag gis smras pa/ re zhig cig grub zin pas/
187b2('dul ba): khyim rnams su yang gtong bar byed grang / ji tsam na dge slong gsar zhig 'ongs pa dang / des de ngal sor bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa
187b3('dul ba): dang / khyim rnams su zas la btang ngo // drug sde rnams khros nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di'i 'dun pa dang zhe sdang ci 'dra ba ltos/ re zhig gal te sngar 'ongs pa zhig
187b4('dul ba): yin na yang bdag cag yin la/ yang na rgan pa yin na yang bdag cag yin la/ 'on te mang du thos pa yin na yang bdag cag yin na/ dge slong 'di ni 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa gsar
187b5('dul ba): bu shes pa dang mi ldan pa yin na/ 'dis de la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas khyim rnams su zas la btang la/ bdag cag la ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis de la spyos pa/
