308a2('dul ba): 'dus la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa// mtshang 'dru bar gyid pa/ rjod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod/
308a3('dul ba): pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing / de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho btsam pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar brjid/ dran par bgyid do zhes thos na/ de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar
308a4('dul ba): bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos na/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum gnas mal gzung ba drug
308a5('dul ba): bya'o// gnas mal bsgo ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o// gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor/
308a6('dul ba): thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug
308a7('dul ba): lag khang skos shig ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig cen 'di yang bskos
308b1('dul ba): zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang
308b2('dul ba): bsgos zin no zhes brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/ gang la nyes pa spyad par 'gyur/ de nas bdo ba rnams med/ phyir rgol ba rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas/
308b3('dul ba): de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang ji tsam na dge
308b4('dul ba): slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa de bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/ de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas
308b5('dul ba): khang gzhan ni ma thob bo// dge slong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung zhig/ des smras pa/ bdag bro 'tshal bas nam sos pa
308b6('dul ba): na'o// dge slong de gtum po zhig pas/ des phyung nas dag rang bzhag go// ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis dge slong
308b7('dul ba): mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di gum lags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di shi ba ni ma yin no// 'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag/ 'di bas
309a1('dul ba): ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ 'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang / des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go// 'phags pa dag bdag
309a2('dul ba): cag khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas mi 'byin na/ khyed cag rab tu byung la ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed
309a3('dul ba): ces de rnams smon par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das
309a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa la gzhi spa ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsu/
309a5('dul ba): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas mjal lo zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// ci tsam na zhag drug gam bdun na gnas mal 'gyed par 'gyur ba na/ rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas
309a6('dul ba): te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang / gan+d+has khang 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no snyam nas de'i gnas mal bskos so// de gnas mal bskos zin nas/ rma'i
309a7('dul ba): g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go// nad pa lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ ci gnas brtan zhabs snyun sos sam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni/
309b1('dul ba): mi rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal lam/ ni kho bo'i nang rtag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan byur du sos par gyur pa na bar spya ni ma btab grang / des smras pa/ kho
309b2('dul ba): gnas khang sgo drung du gzhag par 'dod dam ci/ dge slong den nyung ba rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer byar byed do// de ltar dge slong dag ma ni bzhin du gnas khang spang ba rang gi byed pa ts+tsha tha tshig
309b3('dul ba): ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba
309b4('dul ba): sbyin par mi bya zhing // des rang gir yang mi bya'o// rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// / lnga tshan rnams kyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mdun du bdar dang rang khrims dang // ma chags
309b5('dul ba): pa dang de bzhin du// sdang ba skyes dang byung ba dang // bar du gcod dang de bzhin du// phyi mar byas pa lhung ba ste// bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin// bar sdom ni/ mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang
309b6('dul ba): nang dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni// sems can mang po phan bya ba// lnga tshan dag ni dang po yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang ma mo bzhag go// klu rnams la ni mdo
309b7('dul ba): sde'o// 'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chung bar dka' ba/ dgongs pa mang ba/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa yin na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang / dgoH
310a1('dul ba): pa mang ba nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa nyid yin pas 'don par mi spro'o// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstan
310a2('dul ba): pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs su nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i
310a3('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba yin/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'o /
310a4('dul ba): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod srung ba yin/ dge sbyong bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i
310a5('dul ba): phyir dang / bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar zhugs pa yin no// // khar sdom ni/ bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsu// 'gyod pa dang
310a6('dul ba): ni bag tsha med// chos dang mthun pas byed pa ste// lnga tshan gnyis pa yin par bshad// gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims//
310a7('dul ba): kyi phung pos legs par bsrungs shing legs par sbas pa yin/ 'khor bzhis mngon sum du bsu bar bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyed pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang na
310b1('dul ba): bag chab med pas gnas pa yin/ chos dang mthun pas byi rgol ba tshar gcod pa yin no// bar sdos ni/ ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang // bslag pa yi ni ka'i dag dang /
310b2('dul ba): snang bdag ni gnyis po nyid// lnga ldan dag ri gsum pa yin// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ don ma 'dres pa bsrel ba yin/ rnam par gtan la/
310b3('dul ba): dbab par bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par gzung ba yin/ sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin/
310b4('dul ba): sdom ni/ snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni// sems las chung dang mi spong pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ phyogs gangan gang zag
310b5('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs de ngas snang ba skyes pa dang / gsal ba skyes pa dang / 'od skyes par mthong / phyogs der nga thugs khral chung ngur gnas/ phyogs de ngas stong pa ma yin par/
310b6('dul ba): mthong ngo // / sdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang // rjes su bcas dang de bzhin du// bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni// lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba
310b7('dul ba): 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rjes su bcas pa shes/ bkag pa shes/ rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no// / sdom ni/ khar
311a1('dul ba): chang bar chad ma yin dang // gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang // slob pa'i mthu ni yod pa ste// lnga can drug pa dag tu bshad// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la/
311a2('dul ba): phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khar du gcod pa rnams shes khar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'doms par byed rjes su ston par byed/ lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyi gnas
311a3('dul ba): 'char 'jug nus so// / sdom ni/ ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min// lci dang yang dang de bzhin du// so sor thar pa rgyas par yang // gdon pa dag ni lnga tshan yin// gzhan yang gang zag
311a4('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ lhung ba ma byung ba shes/ lci bshes/ yang bshes shing / so ser thar pa'i mdo gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no//
311a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor/
311a6('dul ba): 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur nas/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ gus pas bstan par
311a7('dul ba): brtsams pas/ de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing / ring pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyam dmas par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed
311b1('dul ba): bar mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi/ maM mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi/ dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan pa rmed kyi/ don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
311b2('dul ba): rnams ni do dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu len gyis bzlogs par mdzad pa yin no// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams den dang ldan par med pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas/
311b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong nye bar 'khor lus skya bo bseng ba seng por gyur cing / ring ba dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas
311b4('dul ba): nyam dmas par gyur/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de thos nas/ spro ba dang bcas pas
311b5('dul ba): 'dul ba gdon par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes gus pas bstan pa brtsams
311b6('dul ba): te/ des na de lus skya bo bseng ba seng por gyur cing // ring ba dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so// byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
311b7('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas lung 'bog pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gi spyod lam rnam bzhir lung dbog par bya ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang /
312a1('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na'o// lung nod pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag par lung nod pa'i
312a2('dul ba): dge slong 'ongs la/ gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lung btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o//
312a3('dul ba): dzaM ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste 'greng ba na 'ongs la
312a4('dul ba): gsar bu zhig yin pa des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ stan ches dma' ba la tsog tsog pur 'dug la/ sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o//
312a5('dul ba): ji ste rgan pa zhig yin nas des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la/ lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// 'greng ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du
312a6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang nyal ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis shin tu goms pa dang / legs par byang ba dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung dbog par bya'o// lung nod pas
312a7('dul ba): kyang shin tu byang ba dang / shin tu zin pa dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung mnod par bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa
312b1('dul ba): bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gral tshabs can du 'gyur ro// drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na gtsug lag kha zhig tu nub mo phyin nas/ de rnams
312b2('dul ba): 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed/ gnas mal bskol ba bos shig/ de dag
312b3('dul ba): gis smras pa tsaM dgos/ gnas mal skor gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ma la yod kyis bde bar nyol zhig dang ka nam nangs nas bgo'o// de rnams kyis kun nas bkris
312b4('dul ba): pas smras pa/ ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kha stobs
312b5('dul ba): can yin pas gnas mal sko ba bred nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas ma la mnos te nyal lo// rdzi tsam gzhon rims kyi bar du sko ba de'i bar
312b6('dul ba): du nam nangs so// drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal sdus shig 'deng ngo // dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis
312b7('dul ba): nub gcig gi phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo mtho ba tsam mam/ kye ma'o khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' mnyan yod du 'dong ngo //
313a1('dul ba): 'di dag ni rlung nang can yin no zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis
313a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na nub mo gnas mal bsgo bar mi bya'o// gal te nub mo lhags na 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal sor gzhug par bya'o// yul zhig nas dge
313a3('dul ba): slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na/ de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan
313a4('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ de bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams
313a5('dul ba): so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa las rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs
313a6('dul ba): pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rdol bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/ des spras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon// khyod kyi ming rtsi/ mgon med zas sbyin no//
313a7('dul ba): kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod kyang mi shes la khyim yang mi shes so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis bsams pa/ dge slob
313b1('dul ba): 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs la rgyus mi shes pa zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyis/ 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ gang /
313b2('dul ba): yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
313b3('dul ba): phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong glo bur ba spyod yul ma 'tshal ba
313b4('dul ba): zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dri yol du nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la smod par 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan
313b5('dul ba): 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyad par
313b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig/ des gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas dag brtsigs
313b7('dul ba): nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis der khron pa brkos nas/ tsha ba gsum dang
314a1('dul ba): 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas/ chu de ro phun sum tshogs par gyur te zhes 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas
314a2('dul ba): lhags pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/
314a3('dul ba): chab 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
314a4('dul ba): dgag par mi bya'o// bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni/
314a5('dul ba): kun nas zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to// ci tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang lang che sa NAg+sa
314a6('dul ba): pa zhig/ dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin tu chags pas de la chu bslangs pa dang / de yang de la chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis slar bzlog kyang rgyun ma bcad par blugs te/ de yang de la
314a7('dul ba): rtog bzhin 'thungs pa las chu de glor song nas shi'o// don nyung dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
314b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang ga byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis/ dge slong la chu spong ba de la rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o// bud/
314b2('dul ba): med la chu n+dan ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung zhig ces bsgo la/ skabs skabs su gcad cing blugs par bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
314b3('dul ba): 'dul gyi gzhi// / bam po don bdun pa/ de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba de rnams kyis de nyid
314b4('dul ba): dbul bar brtsams pa/ drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong ste 'dug nas/ bsod snyoms kyi thog mar khyer te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la rmas te gal te 'o thug yin na ni lhung
314b5('dul ba): bzed zed par byed do// ci ste chu thug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o// de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar
314b6('dul ba): bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das
314b7('dul ba): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o// kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brdam
315a1('dul ba): mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pazhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ste/ de rnams der phyin pa na drol bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa/
315a2('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ched du bsams te 'gro bar mi bya'o// ma bsams par 'o/
315a3('dul ba): ba las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las/ de na
315a4('dul ba): dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas longs mi spyod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di
315a5('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de blangs la/ de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu 'drim na blang bar bya'o// ji ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na blang
315a6('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so// de'i tshe ri nag po la
315a7('dul ba): dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs
315b1('dul ba): par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed/ dran par byed par/
315b2('dul ba): 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas
315b3('dul ba): mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o// gnas mal bsgo ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o// gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang /
315b4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad
315b5('dul ba): bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa dang / 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// gtsug lag
315b6('dul ba): khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to// kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin
315b7('dul ba): no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa 'dzem pa med pas bdag cag la gleng
316a1('dul ba): bAr mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so// ci tsam na bcom ldan 'das rinag po la/
316a2('dul ba): gshegs na/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang gtsug lag
316a3('dul ba): khang skos shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gtsug lag khung sngar bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor sgos shig/ de
316a4('dul ba): yang bsgos zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor sgos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// kun dga' rab skos shig/ de yang bsgos zin no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig/ de
316a5('dul ba): yang bsgos zin no// gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang shA de nas kun dgra' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po dang sba chen po byung ngo // sangs
316a6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi shA mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi/ dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan
316a7('dul ba): pa rmed kyi/ don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
316b1('dul ba): 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i nang na ste/
316b2('dul ba): bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grags pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang
316b3('dul ba): gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyis na/ dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/ des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshegs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po 'di grag lags
316b4('dul ba): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas 'thab krol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas// gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang ka gnas ma la gzung ba drug mdzad
316b5('dul ba): kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal
316b6('dul ba): gzung ba drug mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing
316b7('dul ba): gshegs pa na/ grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo// drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzha ka nas ka shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang
317a1('dul ba): gis bzung ngo // dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni shing khong stong dag thob bo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ dpung gi cho gas yaH/
317a2('dul ba): lag bzhi dang chas te bsu nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang
317a3('dul ba): po dag gi drung na gnas la/ gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi ni shing khong stong rnams mthong nas/ des 'jal lo zhes byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
317a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gas la rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
317a5('dul ba): ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gtso bo lags te/ yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las/ thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po/
317a6('dul ba): gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags la/ lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du mchis brang dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru ba rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyang
317a7('dul ba): bra na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pa ko'u de n+ya dang / rashA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po
317b1('dul ba): rnams ni thugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzung ches lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs na/
317b2('dul ba): la yang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
317b3('dul ba): rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo // byung ba 'di la bcom ldan
317b4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na shing rnams dang / sbrang bu dang / gsib ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing dang / skad du
317b5('dul ba): dang / gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams rang nyid sko bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang sko ba'i
317b6('dul ba): dge slong bsgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyi phal pa las bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtsug lag khang 'gyed par ma bskos pa ni bsgo/
317b7('dul ba): bar mo bya'o// bsgos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti zugs gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang
318a1('dul ba): bskos pa dang / ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko ba pa bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang
318a2('dul ba): chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sgo bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
318a3('dul ba): gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang bsko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o//
318a4('dul ba): bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te/ gan+d+hi brdungs la/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad
318a5('dul ba): tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / re zhig thog ma spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag kha bsko bar spro'am/ de gal te spro bar gyur na des sngo'o zhes brjod par
318a6('dul ba): bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsam du gsol/ gtsug lag khang bsgo ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba di
318a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bsko bar spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
318b1('dul ba): btsug lag khang sko bar bsgo ba mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las b+ha ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang skyo ba dge slongab ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/
318b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spronas/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di/
318b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni ca ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge
318b4('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gtsug lag khang 'byed
318b5('dul ba): pa ji lta ba bzhin du zas la sko ba dang / thug pa 'drim pa dang / bag chos 'drim pa dang / phran tshegs 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drub pa dang / gos sbed pa dang / gos 'byed pa
318b6('dul ba): dang / dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen 'gyed pa dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / mdzes chos pa yang de bzhin to// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma bskos pa ni bsko pa
318b7('dul ba): mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi
319a1('dul ba): mdzes pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang
319a2('dul ba): ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis
319a3('dul ba): mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung
319a4('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// gtsug lag khang dang zas 'gyed dang // thug pa 'drim dang bag chos dang // phran tshegs snod spyad sbed pa dang // chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du/ dbyar gyi ras chen
319a5('dul ba): sbed pa dang // 'gyed pa dag dang mngag gzhug dang // de bzhin du ni mdzes chos te// gang zag bcu gnyis len par bshad// gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogs so// / rtsod pa/
319a6('dul ba): zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'thab dpa' gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang // rtsa ba gang dang dge ba dang // 'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang // 'gyed pa dus ni zhi ba dang // 'gyed pa mngon sum ni ba dang /
319a7('dul ba): tshul shing dag ni blang ba yis// gdams ngag med pa mngon sum dang // dran dang ma myos 'dul 'os dang // de yi ngo bo tshal gzhug dang // rtswa bkram lta bur 'ong ba yis// dge 'du
319b1('dul ba): ni mthur pa yis// de bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa ni// nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes// drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser
319b2('dul ba): sgra'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phying dus gsum du
319b3('dul ba): 'dong bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad do// rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das
319b4('dul ba): la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya
319b5('dul ba): phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan par byed do// rgyal po zas gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu
319b6('dul ba): chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar song ste/ des chos mnyan nas song ngo // de nas shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te/
319b7('dul ba): dang pa skyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no// ming chen gyi chung ma
320a1('dul ba): dam pas smras pa/ rje'i sras de ci lags na des smras pa/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos/
320a2('dul ba): bas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs so// des smras pa/ rje'i sras sangs rgyas byung ba nr-i bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa
320a3('dul ba): de med de/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas lags kyi/ bdag cag la ni ma lags so// ci'i phyir 'di ltar bcom 'das 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ skyes pa rnams
320a4('dul ba): kyi phyir lags kyi/ bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lags so// des smras pa/ bzang mo de skad ma smra zhig bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang thugs brtse ba yin
320a5('dul ba): gyis song zhig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
320a6('dul ba): dus gsum du bzhud lnga/ lha'i mdun du mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yang tshe lags so// 'di ltar gal te lha snga dro lan cig bzhudun/ bdag gis kyang srad dro bcom ldan 'das
320a7('dul ba): la chos mnyan par bgyi'o// shAkya ming chen gyis bsams pa/ lha la gsol gyis 'gro'o snyam pa las/ yang bsams pa/ rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed mi phod kyis/
320b1('dul ba): lha ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur sti mang du byed de/ de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas/ de la don 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi gang na ba der song ste byin
320b2('dul ba): nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la don de spras pa dang / des spras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ lha la gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas/ shAkya rlabs
320b3('dul ba): kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang / de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang / gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
320b4('dul ba): go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces smras so// ge'u ta mi mkhyen par mdzod cig bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas
320b5('dul ba): ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan no zhes thos nas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das las
320b6('dul ba): chos de thos par 'tshal gyis/ bdag cag gi phyir lnga la ci nas kyang lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la/ bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol ba mdzod cig/
320b7('dul ba): des smras pa/ phu nu mo dag khyed kyis sems bskyed pa legs te/ rgyal po zas gtsab la brtag gis skad cig sdod cig/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi rgyal po
321a1('dul ba): zas gtsang gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
321a2('dul ba): 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas/ snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan
321a3('dul ba): 'das las snyan bskrun pa'i chos nyan no zhes thos shAkya'i mchis thang rnams kyis kyang de skad thos nas/ de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na/ lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
321a4('dul ba): sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so// bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis brang rnams dang de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar spyad dro mchi bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ snga dro ni de
321a5('dul ba): rnams sdum pa'i bgyi ba dag bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs ma mchis so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe skye dgu'i
321a6('dul ba): bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis tshig smras pa de'i tshe lus kyi spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/ re zhig skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin
321a7('dul ba): pas des mgo bos btud nas spras pa/ go'u ta mi bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das
321b1('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // ji tsam na shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de na lhan cig song ste/ gzugs/
321b2('dul ba): dang ling tshe dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye ba bzhugs pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas spras pa/
321b3('dul ba): sring mo re zhig khyod kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin na/ rgyan thams cad brgyan pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ khyod rgyan gyis brgyan te 'dir 'ongs
321b4('dul ba): ba gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yang ma yin no zhes/ de la de skad ces smras pa dang / ngo tsha ba snying la
321b5('dul ba): phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ rgyan rnams bkrol nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las// de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo bskyed ma zhes bya ba dang de ldan
321b6('dul ba): cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pas// des de la bos te smras pa/ bskyed ma song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du zhog la shog cig/ de rings par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongs
321b7('dul ba): so// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
322a1('dul ba): kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do// chos bshad pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ji tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul pa na mu tig gi do shAl btags pa la myur ba
322a2('dul ba): myur bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so// 'on kyang de chos la mi gtod kyi/ mu tig gau do shal
322a3('dul ba): khe na la rtog par byed do// ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas/ shAkya'i bu mo mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam
322a4('dul ba): du sems te/ nyon mongs 'di 'du byed rnams 'di ltar mi rtag par bshad na/ mu tig gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bur brtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi mu tig gi
322a5('dul ba): 'phreng ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas/ mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyed ma la smras pa/ bskyed ma song la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer
322a6('dul ba): te shog cig/ de chos nyan pa la sems bsdus pas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na/ bdag rje mos mngags pas chos kyi bar chad byung bar gyur te/ mdor
322a7('dul ba): na bran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni re sdug snyam du bsams nas/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang yang sdig pas de rang rgyal zhal blta ba dang /
322b1('dul ba): bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi thob pa// bran dngos zhal dbang sdug bsngal mang po tha chad de// bdag gi 'tsho ba sngon byas las kyis thob pa ngan// de nas bcom ldan
322b2('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bu mo bskyed ma 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyis/ tshe cung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung
322b3('dul ba): bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro ba la// dge ma skye ba byung ba ni// 'jig pa yin par bsams nas su// ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la// brtson 'grus
322b4('dul ba): bskyed nas mnyan par bya// zhes bris nas byin no// de nas bu mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras bzhin
322b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams khaskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu
322b6('dul ba): rab tu 'gyur ba nyid// ces bya ba yin pas/ tshe cung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed de/ badrus ma zhig gis bsad do// de sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dad par byas
322b7('dul ba): te sha~M bas/ sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur te/ gang gi nyi ma la nying mtshams sbyar de kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char pa bab //
323a1('dul ba): rgyal pos lhas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa dang / de rnams kyis spras pa/ lha 'di ni sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa de'i mthu
323a2('dul ba): lags so// ci tsam na mngal gyi sprin par bya ba'i phyir te/ sna ya~Md du mAM'i nga ba cung zad kyang mi grag cing / grang ba na thang ba'i yo byad dang / dro bA na dro ba'i yi byad dang / sman pas
323a3('dul ba): bstan pa'i kha za swA ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang sbyar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang rtsub pa ma yin pa dang
323a4('dul ba): ha cang bska ba ma yin pa dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang ga lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / rtsub pa dang / bska ba rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cig do shal dang
323a5('dul ba): se mo dos lus brgyan nas/ lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin pa khr-i nas khri dang / khre'u nas khre'ur 'gro zhing / 'og gi sa la 'bab par mi byed do// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'a
323a6('dul ba): nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig bcas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi chur bab nAs// rgyal pos bsams pa/
323a7('dul ba): 'di ji ltar bu me'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pa ni/ de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur re zhes des de nyid la byin no// de nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas
323b1('dul ba): nas bu mo'i ming cir gdag sa zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming mu tig can
323b2('dul ba): zhes gdags so zhes/ de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te bu mo mu tig can ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
323b3('dul ba): 'gyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse 'grogs kyi ma pa gnyis te/ de ma ma brkyang po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso
323b4('dul ba): po gtso bo dag gis srid par byed skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do// de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa'i tshe rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang gnas pas/
323b5('dul ba): rgyal po nang mi dang bcas pas ldag par bkur sti byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nA mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chen por/
323b6('dul ba): zhugs pa dang / de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyis seng ga la'i gling du phyin to// de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu
323b7('dul ba): brang btab bo// de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs
324a1('dul ba): su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs pa/ mu tig/
324a2('dul ba): can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas thos nas/ de nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi tshong pa dag mchis nas mchid snyan par len no// rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/
324a3('dul ba): shes ldan dag glu mkhan rnams khug cig/ de rnams bkug pa dang / mu tig can gyis spras pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo ci 'dra ba kho mos mnyan gyis lo bzhig/ de rnams kyis
324a4('dul ba): spras pa/ lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te/ bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir mchis pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi/
324a5('dul ba): gsung bton no// mu tig can gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas snying dga' bas pa spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
324a6('dul ba): 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra bar brtsams te/ lha mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba/ chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srob ser
324a7('dul ba): skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang lhas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/
324b1('dul ba): mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che
324b2('dul ba): dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang gabud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog/
324b3('dul ba): gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing / 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med
324b4('dul ba): cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sA dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho
324b5('dul ba): nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung
324b6('dul ba): bstan te/ de lta bu de ni sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba lags so// mu tig can gyis spras pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' bzhin/
324b7('dul ba): 'tshal/ sbran par gyi'o// dzaM tsam na de rnams yul du 'dod pa'i dus la bab nas/ de rnams kyis mu tig can sbran pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol ba/ lha dang lha min mi yiH
325a1('dul ba): phyag bgyis pa// skye dang spun dang bsnyengs las nges byung zhing // gtso bo grags pa rgya cher rab grags pa// drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes
325a2('dul ba): gnod// zhes gsol to// de nas yi ge tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gaban pa der
325a3('dul ba): ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tenaphyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mnyan yod kyi tshob pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
325a4('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa sing ga la'i gling na/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can 'dul ba'i dus
325a5('dul ba): mkhyen nas/ nyid kyis blangs te bklags so// kha klags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nga'i snyan du gsol cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/
325a6('dul ba): tsho pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo // den pong skur te bsgyur ba'i thong thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol pa/ bcom
325a7('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag cag mchin// bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skad bgyi/ bka' stsal bar gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par gyi dor byas pa'i ras dang /
325b1('dul ba): ri mo mkhan dag lug cig/ de rnams kyis ras dang ri mo mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris
325b2('dul ba): shig/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar brtsams pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ ri mo mkhan rnams
325b3('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo // de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang / bcom ldan
325b4('dul ba): 'das kyis 'od btang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis su'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
325b5('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang ka lugs dang mi mthun pa dang ga/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so//
325b6('dul ba): gong du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/ brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par
325b7('dul ba): byan gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas// chos 'dul 'di la spyon 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// zhes bris nas/ sing ga la'i rgyan
326a1('dul ba): po la bka' yig spring ba/ ras la ri mo bris pa/ ngas mu tig can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyis/ khyod kyis de la sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing ga la
326a2('dul ba): gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la bkur sti chen pos ras 'di khroms shig/ tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mu tig can 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di na bcom ldan
326a3('dul ba): 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri naka 'di dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs
326a4('dul ba): dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no/
326a5('dul ba): zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'drin spro bar bya ba yin te/ gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs
326a6('dul ba): dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de/ bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba
326a7('dul ba): yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas dge mtshan
326b1('dul ba): dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur pa dag byas te/ zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste/ rim gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas/ lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos te/ rgyal po ni
326b2('dul ba): drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byon no// rgyal pos yi ge blangs te bklags nas grong khyer de jo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag bta
326b3('dul ba): rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing go la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
326b4('dul ba): ba sogs nas/ de nas bkur sti chen po byas te/ grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams te ras phye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/ sangs rgyas la
326b5('dul ba): phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dadang pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gos pa spu zing zhes byed cing mig mchi mas
326b6('dul ba): gang bas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ tshong pa rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'dre ci yin/ de rnams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lag
326b7('dul ba): so// 'og ma 'di dag ci yin/ 'di ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
327a1('dul ba): 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so// gong ma 'di ci yin/ spo bar bgyi /
327a2('dul ba): lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song na bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog
327a3('dul ba): cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur pa lags so// de nas mu tig can gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag
327a4('dul ba): bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum ma bzlas pa de'i bar du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye/
327a5('dul ba): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// shes rab
327a6('dul ba): mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// gang la 'di 'dra'i gsol mnga' ba// spyan mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyung ste// lta ba'i
327a7('dul ba): zug rngu sel mdzad pa// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras nas/ tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag khyed cag nam 'do pa
327b1('dul ba): de rnal la spyod ga// de nas tshong pa rnams ky-is b+h+yong rnams bsgyur te/ bsgyur ba'i bong rnams khyer nas rtswa tig can gyi rlung du song ste/ po bdag cag ni mtshan/ bdag gis ci 'ig /
327b2('dul ba): ba kang ma babyi gsol/ des smras pa/ kho po'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag tshal la/ gnod pa chung dru/ ba bzlang ga/ 'cho lab sto
327b3('dul ba): pa yang dpe/ stobs dang / bde ba dang ga smra'ams dang ldan nam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di sad ces/ btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags par/
327b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams las ni rkang pa phyung /
327b5('dul ba): lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag ka 'khor ba las ni rgyang bsrings khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bsnams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bskal ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thang gi
327b6('dul ba): sgo r-I bye/ thog pa ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
327b7('dul ba): bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du
328a1('dul ba): gsol ka de bsan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar dad na/ mngon par dang lags so zhes gsol la/ mu tig bre gsum po 'di
328a2('dul ba): khyer la cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni chos la/ cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul cig/ de nas chong pa de rnams kyis zong dang skyes bskur yang khyer te dong nas/ rim gyis mnyan yo/
328a3('dul ba): du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ ji skad spring ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ 'di
328a4('dul ba): skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa skyes su phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te/ mu trig cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni chos la/ cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul
328a5('dul ba): lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skyes 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis
328a6('dul ba): shAkya ming chen gyi mngag bzhug ma bskyed ma zhes bya ba/ nga las chos mnyan nas song ba las/ lam kar ba drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mtho ba lags so// sa
328a7('dul ba): nga la sems dpab bskyed de shaM bas/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can zhes bya bar gyur te/ bden pa mthong nas des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no// 'di las sangs rgyas
328b1('dul ba): kyi skal ba gang yin pa des dri gtsang gyi zhal zhal byos shig/ chos kyi gang yin pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis mnya
328b2('dul ba): par khagos shig// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mu tig can gyis las
328b3('dul ba): ci zhig bgyis na/ des na bran mor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
328b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing
328b5('dul ba): bsags pas/ mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las shing bsags pa dag ni phyi ral gyi sa'i khams la rnam
328b6('dul ba): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
328b7('dul ba): khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dus dang // rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/
329a1('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'chi/
329a2('dul ba): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
329a3('dul ba): pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ wA rA NA sIr phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po kri kis de'i
329a4('dul ba): sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te/ spungs nas bkur sti chen pos bsregs te/ me de 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum par blugs te/ lam po che'i bzhi
329a5('dul ba): mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so// wA rA NA si/
329a6('dul ba): na tshob dpon phyug pa/ nor ma ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig yod pa des rig
329a7('dul ba): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dgal dgur spyod par byed kyang de la bu po yang med
329b1('dul ba): bu mo yang med nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas bdag gi khyim du nor phal po che bsags kyang // bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu med//
329b2('dul ba): zhes byas te/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de la/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / ltas mkhan
329b3('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mnyes par byos shig dang / khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro// de bu med de bu mngon par 'dod pas/ zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs
329b4('dul ba): bar+Na gzhan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan
329b5('dul ba): cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten na de
329b6('dul ba): skad du grags pa yod de/ de yang de lha ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur na ni re re la yang dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum mngon du
329b7('dul ba): gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gnas gsum gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing lhan cig 'dus pa dang / ma mngal rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
330a1('dul ba): dri za nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa lta bu go/ bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na/ des bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas/ des na de la bu pho dang bu/
330a2('dul ba): mo med do// ji tsam na de nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur to// de nas de'i chu
330a3('dul ba): mas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na nor phal mo che bsags pa ni bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med la/ bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol
330a4('dul ba): gyi lam rgyags ma blangs nas/ nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas nas rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas ka de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgul na thogs
330a5('dul ba): pa des/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten de la dri dang byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te btags nas/ dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te smon lam btab
330a6('dul ba): pan+d+ha sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dris/ bdag phyug po'i rigs su skye zhing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/
330a7('dul ba): mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa
330b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug po'i ris su skyes shing ka btsas pa na mu tig gi char bang /
330b2('dul ba): nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa skyes pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi su mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// gzhan yang
330b3('dul ba): dpon nor mang du bsags pa de'i chung mar gyur pa na/ de na 'dis dbang phyug gi grags pas rgyags nas/ spyod yul ni gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes su/
330b4('dul ba): tu smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang por bran mor gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin
330b5('dul ba): zhing gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar la/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// de bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs
330b6('dul ba): la d+ha gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang yin pa de ni/ chos smra ba'i gang
330b7('dul ba): zag rnams la yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de na mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis spras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yi/
331a1('dul ba): pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo // 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul/
331a2('dul ba): ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo // ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan
331a3('dul ba): nyid da / spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes/ de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams
331a4('dul ba): 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma 'thab cig/ mtshang ma
331a5('dul ba): 'dru zhig/ 'thab mo ma byed cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni rtsod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / lhung ba'i rtsod
331a6('dul ba): pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o// 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ga re kAs mi 'phrod par smrag/ mi mthun pa kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud gcig
331a7('dul ba): tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// gdams ngag med pa'i rlod
331b1('dul ba): pa gang zhen/ dge 'dun kangadams drug mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo//
331b2('dul ba): dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// lhung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ ltung ba lnga ni ltung ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang /
331b3('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag ma dang / lhung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas gang yin pa de las brtan nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'byed pa gang
331b4('dul ba): yin pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las
331b5('dul ba): gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang / ma tshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni zhig gi rtsa ba
331b6('dul ba): can yin zhing / 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni yin zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang / 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi ste/ 'gyed pa'i rtsu ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di na la la khros
331b7('dul ba): yin zhing khon du 'dzin pa yin te/ khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// ston pa la bkur
332a1('dul ba): sti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo // chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o// dge sbyong/
332a2('dul ba): gi tshul la mi lhan/ dge 'dun la 'di lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa 'byin par byed do// 'thab pa dang / la tshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gying
332a3('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lnga dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug
332a4('dul ba): bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge sbyong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi 'am phyi rol gyi yang rung / ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun
332a5('dul ba): zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 'gyed/
332a6('dul ba): pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spangs kyi bar du brtson par bya'o// de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang spongs par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi
332a7('dul ba): yang rung po'i yang rung / legs par spangs pa yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag ldan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa
332b1('dul ba): dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i rnam pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci tsam rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'byed pa'o//
332b2('dul ba): ba de yang dag par legs par bsal bas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// / 'dul ba ga ni// bam po don brgyad pa/ khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa
332b3('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'chab cing 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog byed cing sere sna can dang / g.yo byed cing sta can dang / ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa yang de dang 'dra'o// gzhan yang 'di na la lA rang gi lta ba mchog
332b4('dul ba): tu 'dzin pa yin zhing 'tshal pa'i 'dzin pa dang / smras pa la dang na then byed pa yin te/ rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'chal pa 'dzin pa/ smras pa la dang na then byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la
332b5('dul ba): bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// de ston pa la bkur stim byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo // chos
332b6('dul ba): ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lha'o// dge sbyong gi tshul la mi wA na/ dge 'dun la de lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa 'byin par byed do// 'thab pa dang /
332b7('dul ba): mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi/
333a1('dul ba): phan pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i 'ang rung / ma spangs par yang /
333a2('dul ba): dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / snyim pa dang / mi zlog
333a3('dul ba): pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji lta ba 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spongs pa'i bar du brtsod par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de spongs par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag
333a4('dul ba): gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i yang rung / legs par spangs pa yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med/
333a5('dul ba): pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi
333a6('dul ba): 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par bsal bas phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug ces bya'o// 'byed par byed pa'i
333a7('dul ba): gzhi bcu pa'i gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos so zhe 'am/ chos ma yin no zhe 'am/ 'dul ba'o zhe 'am/ 'dul ba ma yin no zhe 'am/ ltung ba'o me 'am/ ltung ba ma yin pa'o zhe 'am/ lA~M ba la
333b1('dul ba): yang ba 'am/ lhag ma dang bcas pa 'am/ lhag ma med pa 'am/ bshags par bya ba 'am/ bsdam par bya ba 'am/ nyes par bshad par gtogs pa 'am/ legs par bshad par gtog/
333b2('dul ba): pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag gdams ngas/
333b3('dul ba): med pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing // gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na// dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag
333b4('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams
333b5('dul ba): ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni ltung ba'i rigs dang ltung
333b6('dul ba): ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas so// gzhan yang lus kyi ltung ba yin/
333b7('dul ba): gyi rtsa ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod/ ngag gi yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa'ang yod/ lus kyi dang sems kyi yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod//
334a1('dul ba): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi yin pa yang yod do// lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong khyim
334a2('dul ba): pa 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ma byung bar khyim pa 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir byung ngo snyam nas nyal bar byed pa na/ de gnyid log pa dang bud med nyal ba 'am
334a3('dul ba): gnyid log nas khri stan chen po'i steng du bzhag pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no// ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi lus kyi ma yin/ sems
334a4('dul ba): kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag bud med la chos tshig lnga 'chad pa las ched du ma bsams par tshig drug tu thal ba 'am/ tshig drug 'chad pa na tshig bdun du thal ba
334a5('dul ba): ste 'di ni ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no// lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyingag gi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched/
334a6('dul ba): du bsams te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral nas/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srogs chags srog dang phral bar bya ste/
334a7('dul ba): de ltar bsad pa ni de legs par bsad pa yin no zhes smra zhing / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung la/ 'di skad ces /
334b1('dul ba): ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/ de ltar 'thungs pa nI legs par 'thungs pa yin no zhes mi smra ba ste/ 'di ni lus dang sems kyi lhung
334b2('dul ba): yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin no// lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi ltung ba yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsams te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog
334b3('dul ba): chags srog dang phral la ka 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang phral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsang pa ni legs par bsad pa yin no zhes smra zhing
334b4('dul ba): ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang 'thung la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin myos par 'gyur ba btung
334b5('dul ba): bar bya ste/ de ltar myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa ni/ legs par 'thungs pa yin no zhes smras pa ste/ 'di ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi ltung ba yin te/ dge slong dag lhung
334b6('dul ba): ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing // bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni yin zhe na/ dge
334b7('dul ba): 'dun gyi bya ba gang yin pa gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin 'ang / bya ba'i
335a1('dul ba): rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/
335a2('dul ba): dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de lnga/
335a3('dul ba): brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems lag dge ba'i don mi//
335a4('dul ba): sgrub cing dge ba mI sems pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba ka rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang /
335a5('dul ba): 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang
335a6('dul ba): ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ ma dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i sems
335a7('dul ba): pa yang ma yin pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa/
335b1('dul ba): 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// gang pas ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang lda na//
335b2('dul ba): 'dun don sgrub cing don sems lagadage ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'ja
335b3('dul ba): ba dang / mching 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sdug cing dge ba mi sems ba
335b4('dul ba): gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge
335b5('dul ba): ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la//
335b6('dul ba): dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdabs
335b7('dul ba): ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no//
336a1('dul ba): ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ mi dge ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'a
336a2('dul ba): gyis khrims su bcas pa las ched du bsams te 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'dun gyis khrim
336a3('dul ba): su bcas pa las ched du ma bsams par 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma
336a4('dul ba): bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing / dge ba sems pa'i gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba
336a5('dul ba): dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub
336a6('dul ba): cing mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing / dge ba mi sems pa'i gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de la brten te/ 'thab pa dang /
336a7('dul ba): mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin// don ma yin pa bsgrub pa yang ma yin ni
336b1('dul ba): don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing // dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/
336b2('dul ba): mi dge ba'i sems pa yang ma yin pa'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ lung dri ma bstan pa yin no// 'gyed pa gang yin pa de rtsod pa
336b3('dul ba): lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de 'gyed pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'gyed pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la 'gyed pa ma yin pa yang yod ka 'gyed
336b4('dul ba): pa yang yin rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ 'gyed pa yang ma yin rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do// re zhig 'gyed pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/
