365b3('dul ba): chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no// chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyi nang du lhung ba brjed pa las brjed par slar dran te/ shes pa de yang brjed pa de la dge
365b4('dul ba): 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa byin pa ni/ chos kyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi gcig yin no// dge slong dag de ltar
365b5('dul ba): na de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing // de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar
365b6('dul ba): byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar lci ba yin no// dge slong dag dzA ltar na rtswa bkram pa lta bu 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/
365b7('dul ba): rtse bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa'i bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams 'thabs par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo/
366a1('dul ba): 'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing / phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du rnam par gnas na/ phyogs gcig na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/ shes/
366a2('dul ba): nyen shes nyen can glang yang rung ba/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs
366a3('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ 'thabs par gyur cing / mtshung 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa na bdug cag gi sa rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes
366a4('dul ba): pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyod kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/ khyim na gnas pa las brten pa
366a5('dul ba): ma gtogs pa/ khro bo sra bdag dang khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcob par mtho zhing bshags par spro'u zhes smra bar bya'o// gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs
366a6('dul ba): nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa/ ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong des phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ rgan rims
366a7('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/ cog tsog pur 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ 'thabs par
366b1('dul ba): gyur cing / ma tshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag
366b2('dul ba): gau ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/ khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bo bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi bcab par
366b3('dul ba): mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o// phyogs cig shos nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/ shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba/ gtso bo
366b4('dul ba): gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des kyang rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la
366b5('dul ba): rab tu byung nas/ 'thabs par gyur cing / mtshung 'dru ba da / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma
366b6('dul ba): rnyed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyed kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/ khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/
366b7('dul ba): kho bos bdag dang khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o// zhes smra bar bya'o// gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig
367a1('dul ba): gis kyang smras pa/ ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong de phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du
367a2('dul ba): gdud pa byas la/ tsog tsog pur 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ 'thabs par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 1
367a3('dul ba): me dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po
367a4('dul ba): 'am d+hu khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi 'chab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o// gang gi tshe phyogs gcig/
367a5('dul ba): gis cig shos la 'am/ cig shos kyis cig shos la spu sa la ltung ba lta bur byed/ 'byung bar skyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston par mdzad kyi/ phan tshun du ltung ba sgrogs pas gleng bar mi byed na/
367a6('dul ba): de ltar na rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os po'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang no zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi
367a7('dul ba): po 'dis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa dang / mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang / rtswa bkram pa
367b1('dul ba): lta bur 'os pas so// dge slong bya ba'i rtsod pa ni dge 'dun mthun pas zhi bar bya'o// dge slong dag gnas gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa de na 'thab pa med/ ma tshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab
367b2('dul ba): mo med/ 'gyed pa med do// gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ ma tshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo me ga 'gyed pa med do// gang na gsum yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ mtshang
367b3('dul ba): 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do// gang na dge slong bzhi 'am lhag pa gnas pa de na ni/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa yod do// dge slong dag/
367b4('dul ba): tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin // brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin// rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin// de las lhag pa 'khrug par 'gyur// dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/
367b5('dul ba): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang / chos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya zhing / des kyang longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// rtsod pa'i gan/
367b6('dul ba): rdzogs so// ka/ 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po brgyad cu pa// / dge 'dun dbyen gyi bsdus pa'i sdom/
367b7('dul ba): ni d+ha mang pos bkur dang lha g.yos dang // ba gam rnyings dang bzang po dang // 'khor dang ko'u di na rdzu 'phrul dang // ko'u shi kas zos dang pa dang // mnar med lhag gyur phyi
368a1('dul ba): ma'o// / sdom ni rba mang pos bkur dang seng ge 'gram// legs par rab sad de bzhin du// dga' ldan 'dod pa'i rigs dang ni// 'dun pa/
368a2('dul ba): 'dug dang gzhod pa dang / srin bu go sboms bzang len dang // lhag bcas pa dang de bcu'o// yangs pa can du bstan pa dang // rab sbyin dang ni grags 'dzin dang // ngang pa dang ni mkhas
368a3('dul ba): mA dang k+Shas 'tsho ma ni bstan pa dang // 'dzam bu ri dgas nang skyes dang // rigs bdun ngan spong bu dang ni// rgyal po khab dang dka' thub dang // ring 'phur dka' spyod dga' bo dang // nag
368a4('dul ba): po bkra shis de bzhin du// bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa dang // 'khor ni mdo ru bsdus pa'o// gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang brgya tham pa'o// dmag gis mi tshugs su
368a5('dul ba): ma rgyal ba las rgyal dang lnga khri bzhi stong ngo // wA rA NA sir bzod dka' dang drug khri sum stong ngo // ki ma pi la ra tshangs sprin dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // glang po che'i grong du glang pos sbyin
368a6('dul ba): dang sum khri nyis stong ngo // rdo 'jog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong ngo // brang gis nyal du chen po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong ngo // ma rgyal ba las rgyal du brgya byin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo //
368a7('dul ba): ka nA kub dzar rgyal sde dang sum khri nyis stong ngo // tsam par klu'i lha dang khri brgyad stong ngo // ta la'i 'phreng du ma'i lha dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo // ta ma li rgya mtsho'i lha dang khri nyis stong ngo //
368b1('dul ba): sa'i grong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo // rgyal po'i khab tu mun sel dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo // wA rA NA srir dbang phyug chen po'i sde dang brgya tham pa'o// rtswa can du rgya mtsho sde dang brgyad/
368b2('dul ba): khri bzhi stong ngo // gru 'dzin du dka' thub spyod dang stong ngo // rtswa can du sa'i gdong dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // wA rA nA sir sa'i bdag po dang 'bum mo// dmag gos mi tshugs par sa 'dzin da
368b3('dul ba): 'bum mo ka/ mi thi la ra lha chen po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // yang mi thi lar lha chen po nas bzung ste/ mu khyung nas shing rta sra ba'i bar brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // kun tu snang bar nam mkha'i bdag/
368b4('dul ba): po dang klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bdun stong ngo // wA rA NA sir kri ki dang legs skyes dang brgya tham pa'o// gru 'dzin du rna ba can dang bu ram shing pa dang brgya tham pa'o// gru 'dzin du 'phag
368b5('dul ba): skyes dang bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya tham pa'o// ser skya'i gzhir shing rta bcu pa nas bzung ste/ lnga khri lnga stong byung ba la seng ge'i 'gram las bzhi ste/ bzhi po
368b6('dul ba): rnams las gnyis gnyis so// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gr-i d+ha'i kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// de na ser sna'i gnon gnas pa
368b7('dul ba): shakya rab tu mang po 'dun 'ang du tshogs shing 'dus nas ba skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de// shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thig ma ni gang yin/
369a1('dul ba): rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag
369a2('dul ba): shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams ni gang /
369a3('dul ba): las skyes pa dang / thog mo gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom
369a4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o//
369a5('dul ba): nas ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs
369a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya ba/
369a7('dul ba): du mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas/ bar skabs bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnam
369b1('dul ba): kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dgra shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ d+hA ni
369b2('dul ba): ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang yin zhes de skad 'dri na/ bdag cag gis kyang shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/
369b3('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong la lpags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don
369b4('dul ba): 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu
369b5('dul ba): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ zlo ga ma nI grang lags/ rgyu ni ci zhig lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang lag/
369b6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te des shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang kun tu
369b7('dul ba): rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas/ bdag nyid la bstod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos
370a1('dul ba): las shAk+Sha rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams nas/ chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yongasam mo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal/
370a2('dul ba): gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shring 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gul gyi bu chen po la bkra' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga
370a3('dul ba): rgyab skung bas re zhig de bsal gyis/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams nas/ dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig/
370a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra
370a5('dul ba): bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nAs/ snam sbyar ba ltab ste sngas phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du 'bras bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran
370a6('dul ba): pa dang / shes bzhin dang / ldang ba'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sem/
370a7('dul ba): ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon/
370b1('dul ba): byi rigs brgyad gang yin pa mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyan/
370b2('dul ba): pa ra bzhag nAM/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnam
370b3('dul ba): kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang yin pa mthong ngo //
370b4('dul ba): mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la sngun bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya
370b5('dul ba): rnams la smras pa/ go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing / 'jig rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzug
370b6('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshung ba med pa/ yan lagu dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba//
370b7('dul ba): dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing mtshe gcig tu 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig
371a1('dul ba): gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// dper na 'o ma bsgrol ba grangs par gyur pa'i/
371a2('dul ba): steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang ka'akhregs pa dang ka khebs pa de bzhin du na sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / 'khregs
371a3('dul ba): ba dang / khebs par byed do// sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing / kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na mar sar lta bu'o// ro ni 'di/
371a4('dul ba): lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad
371a5('dul ba): las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing / de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/
371a6('dul ba): dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe
371a7('dul ba): ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang
371b1('dul ba): med// zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do// skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs
371b2('dul ba): su 'gro'o// de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do// ji lta ji ltar sred pa
371b3('dul ba): de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar
371b4('dul ba): sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo // mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do// ji lta ji ltar
371b5('dul ba): sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zod pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs pa
371b6('dul ba): gyur to// de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung na nyi ma
371b7('dul ba): dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang ka skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'dri/
372a1('dul ba): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de rnams de za zhing zas su zab la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung zad su za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang /
372a2('dul ba): ldan par 'gyur ro// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/
372a3('dul ba): kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no// khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i/
372a4('dul ba): chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// go'u ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra
372a5('dul ba): zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran
372a6('dul ba): nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du/ sems can de rnams sa'i bcu du nub pa nA tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud brob kyi hud bro ba zhes smra
372a7('dul ba): zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams
372b1('dul ba): kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na dong ka'i me tog
372b2('dul ba): lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsi ra ba lta bu'o// de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas las ches nyung
372b3('dul ba): du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dag dang ldan par gyur to// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dran par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon
372b4('dul ba): te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi
372b5('dul ba): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyas sa zhag nub par gyur to// go'u ta ma dag sa zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs
372b6('dul ba): shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal bar byed do// dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ga'
372b7('dul ba): zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ e ma'o kyi bud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pan/
373a1('dul ba): tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di
373a2('dul ba): yin du smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun
373a3('dul ba): sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na spang ma'i sbrang
373a4('dul ba): rtsi btsi ra ba lta bu'o// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to//
373a5('dul ba): kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can
373a6('dul ba): kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i
373a7('dul ba): chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// go'u tam dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na/ sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas par
373b1('dul ba): song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar bcad pas/ tshar gcad par 'dod pa/
373b2('dul ba): na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces/ mdun nus phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub
373b3('dul ba): pa dang tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas par song mdun nas par song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / smras pa 'di'i den ni 'di yin/
373b4('dul ba): smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bu tshon
373b5('dul ba): bzhi pa phub ma dang sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa dag gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brdas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brngas
373b6('dul ba): kyang sung skye bas brjes par yang mi mngon no// de rnams de za 'ang de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas s+ho// gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btub pa'i
373b7('dul ba): sa lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/ kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o// kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o//
374a1('dul ba): de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta'o//
374a2('dul ba): ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lbu ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so// ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen no// ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log pa
374a3('dul ba): zhugs so// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyangs dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di
374a4('dul ba): skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kA ye sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun
374a5('dul ba): dbyung zhes smra'o// dper na da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na phye ma dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems
374a6('dul ba): can rnams kyis/ sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba nas sa gtor cing / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams
374a7('dul ba): ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni byi ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kA ye sems can khyed khyed kyis daji ltar sems cadan sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// goT ta ma dag/
374b1('dul ba): de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod/ 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon spang par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar/
374b2('dul ba): bsngags par bya bar 'dod do// de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa nas/ zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun yang spangs so// gang nas sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
374b3('dul ba): de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas/ de rnams khang pa brtsig pa la brtson par byed de 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do// 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas
374b4('dul ba): khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ go'u ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis yin gyis/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la
374b5('dul ba): rgyal ba'i dbang po'i tshes la 'di ni gtso bo yin te/ de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka/ nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sa lu'i cheng du 'dong bar byed do// de nas sems can
374b6('dul ba): snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyis lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshuras lu'i phyir 'dong ngo //
374b7('dul ba): nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyed rang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni nang par gyis lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/
375a1('dul ba): kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des
375a2('dul ba): zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyis lu blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshwar sa lu'i phyir 'dong /
375a3('dul ba): denas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blangs zin
375a4('dul ba): no// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig gi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang zla
375a5('dul ba): ba gcig gis lu blangs so// gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas/ zos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu phub
375a6('dul ba): ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// brngas shing brngas na yang na phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sa lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to// de nas
375a7('dul ba): sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/ shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med la/ yan lag dang nying lag
375b1('dul ba): thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba zla zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag sa'i bcungad
375b2('dul ba): kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag gis sa'i bcud
375b3('dul ba): la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe / bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid zhugs par gyur te/ kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten
375b4('dul ba): du mun pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to// bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog bzang po gyur//
375b5('dul ba): kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa ye sems
375b6('dul ba): can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi
375b7('dul ba): ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// sa'i bcud de nub pa na sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar
376a1('dul ba): gyur te/ bdag cag de za 'ang de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhi yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag las kha zlas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan/
376a2('dul ba): par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnams gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ k+Sha
376a3('dul ba): ye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams
376a4('dul ba): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to// sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs
376a5('dul ba): pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas
376a6('dul ba): ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dran par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kA ye sems can khro bo ni ba/
376a7('dul ba): dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de
376b1('dul ba): dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// lta gu'i tshal de nub pa na ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/
376b2('dul ba): dag pa gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brdas na nad skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brdas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brdas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/
376b3('dul ba): bdag cag de za zhing zas su zab la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyod pas/
376b4('dul ba): zos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / spun pa dang / shun pas g.yogs par gyur to// brngas shing brngas pa yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sa lu yang
376b5('dul ba): sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la 'di ni khyed kyi'o// 'di ni nga'i'o zhes mu thug bre bar
376b6('dul ba): bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshams bcad mu thug bres so// glo'u tu ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thugs 'dri ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom
376b7('dul ba): pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin pa de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi gtso bo yin no// de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sa lu
377a1('dul ba): yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu la ma byin par blangs so// sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can des rang gis lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu la ma byin
377a2('dul ba): par blangs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA ye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /
377a3('dul ba): kA ye sems can song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ sems can des lanA gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gis lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par blangs so// sem
377a4('dul ba): can des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par len pa mthong ngo // mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//
377a5('dul ba): kA ye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blangs zhes des de phar drangs tshur drangs nas/ ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/ shes ldan dag
377a6('dul ba): sems can 'di rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsul gyi bar du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par len no zhes skyes so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can del
377a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so// kwa ye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par ci'i phyir brang / kA ye sems can song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas
377b1('dul ba): sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdug sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te/ ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas
377b2('dul ba): spyos so// de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA ye sems can khyod kyis sems can la sa lu'i phyir par drangs tshur drangs nas// ji tsam na 'khor
377b3('dul ba): gyi nang du yang phyung nas ci'i phyir spyo/ kA ya sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag sa lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur
377b4('dul ba): 'dren cing / ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spyo ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la/ bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes
377b5('dul ba): paHlhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan
377b6('dul ba): gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/
377b7('dul ba): de rnams kyi nang nas sems can ldag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/
378a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog/ kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod cig/ phan gdags par bya ba la ni phan thogs shig/ kho bo ca
378a2('dul ba): gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdegs par bya ba rnams
378a3('dul ba): ni phan 'dogs par byed cing / de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shes 'bul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur cing // skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkung bas/
378a4('dul ba): mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so// zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas// rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so// chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed
378a5('dul ba): cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas/ rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems
378a6('dul ba): can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi cha mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog tshur shog ces bya bar/
378a7('dul ba): gyur to// 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/ go'u ta ma/
378b1('dul ba): dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to// dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi
378b2('dul ba): rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi
378b3('dul ba): 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// dri sprin nas brdol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas
378b4('dul ba): brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang // de thams cad kyi chu
378b5('dul ba): ma las 'o ma thigs nas re res nga las nung l-is nr-i zhes smras pas/ ba las nung los nu zhes bye bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po de las nu gang go tshe rnal srid byed pa de'i tshem
378b6('dul ba): rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed do// de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas/ des na
378b7('dul ba): rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po drug 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no// / bar sdom la/ sems
379a1('dul ba): can tshur shog sme ba can// sprin mgrin dang ni de bzhin du// ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes// sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa yin/ godra ta ma dag rgyal/
379a2('dul ba): po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bral gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas
379a3('dul ba): brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing / blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas rgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming
379a4('dul ba): mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes
379a5('dul ba): pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyer te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nus brtol ba dang
379a6('dul ba): khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya
379a7('dul ba): bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha
379b1('dul ba): rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba
379b2('dul ba): blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to//
379b3('dul ba): gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu mche ba yin pas/ da dung yang gleng gnyis la rgyal sbed kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig
379b4('dul ba): skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu gnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bltan
379b5('dul ba): sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to//

383b3('dul ba): spyod tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro// des gos dang rgyan dag

384a1('dul ba): jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smos shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi jo mo skad/

384a6('dul ba): gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung nas bsad do// de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas
384a7('dul ba): jo mo bsad do jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa/ skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs po dang / de tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong go'u ta ma gnas so// de nas skyes
384b1('dul ba): bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de srag nas// ral gri khrag can drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen pos der ral gri khrag/
384b2('dul ba): can mthong nas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes/ de nas drang srong go'u ta ma de bskor te mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kA ye rab tu byung ba drang skyong gi rgyal mtshan thogs
384b3('dul ba): nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa ci byas// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' dgur spyad nas de bsad do// des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi
384b4('dul ba): byed do zhes des zhi ba smras kyang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phying ga log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad
384b5('dul ba): nas de bkum lags so// rgyal po rnams ni mi rtogs pa yin pas/ des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la gshon cig/ de nas rab tu byung ba da me/
384b6('dul ba): tog ka rA bI ra'i 'phreng ba mgul du btags shing // skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum
384b7('dul ba): mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no// de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas
385a1('dul ba): su 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas/ des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon
385a2('dul ba): par mthong nas/ de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad migasal zhing yid chad la gnang du
385a3('dul ba): bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gzhan ci lags na las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma byung ba 'am gnod pa zhig ma byas grang / mkhan po/
385a4('dul ba): bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gI/ sems kyis ni ma yin nu/ khu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma
385a5('dul ba): phyung gi/ sems kyis ni ma yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam
385a6('dul ba): paM goms pa yin pas/ tshig spras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing ka gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/
385a7('dul ba): zhes sgra grags pas// de'i ming giser mdog ces bya bar gyur te/ de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to// de nas drang srong go'u ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba
385b1('dul ba): gang rtsa skye ba ni kAng / tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re bu med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na/ khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po ya /
385b2('dul ba): kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na/ bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skye ba lha ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la
385b3('dul ba): spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnang rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa
385b4('dul ba): rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang rlung grang
385b5('dul ba): mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so// gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i
385b6('dul ba): thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa
385b7('dul ba): dang rta sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang khye'u
386a1('dul ba): gnyis shig byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so// / 'dul ba gni/
386a2('dul ba): bam po gyu gcig pa// de nas nyi ma'i 'od gzer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o// de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des
386a3('dul ba): gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong
386a4('dul ba): ngon des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis pasti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bstod
386a5('dul ba): de rta de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas/ de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs
386a6('dul ba): zhes bya bar gyur to// drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas/ ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas/ ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes zhes
386a7('dul ba): bya bar gyur to// bu ram shing gi tshil gseb nas rnyed pas/ ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba radwa dza bu med par shinas/ thon po
386b1('dul ba): rnams 'dus nas thos bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su rig rgyal por dbang bsgyur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'dod ga can tho tha ma drang srong rnams kyi nang dungab tu byung ste
386b2('dul ba): rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs brgyad du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis thos byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste/ ser pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/
386b3('dul ba): smras pa/ drang srong chen po galu ta ma gang du mchis/ des spras pa rdo khyed cag kho nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi rngan na ji ltar bsad/
386b4('dul ba): kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o// ma nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang ka smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang baspags pa ma yin gyis
386b5('dul ba): zhog cig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di dang 'di'o// skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas
386b6('dul ba): khar smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las gyis so zhes de rnams de skad du gtam
386b7('dul ba): smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o// de rnams
387a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon pa rnams kyis thos te mchog tu ngo mtshad
387a2('dul ba): skyes nas/ de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las/ gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang bu med par shi'o// de nas cig shos nu
387a3('dul ba): bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i brgyad rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang
387a4('dul ba): grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo // go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pa la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda'
387a5('dul ba): gdong dang kA lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no// dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shaM nas/ de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// blon
387a6('dul ba): po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs me dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga yi btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha gal
387a7('dul ba): te de ltar na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ lha ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di
387b1('dul ba): dag yod na/ nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur ba lta/ dgongs shig dang bdag cag gis btsal lo// ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ btsun
387b2('dul ba): mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba khug cig/
387b3('dul ba): de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gdugs te/ thog mar gtam byas te 'dug go// gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha bkra shis par
387b4('dul ba): gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol// rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong
387b5('dul ba): ngo d+ha rma rgyal po sa smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod pa na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag
387b6('dul ba): pa lta na sbyin no// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha la snyan du gdas par gsol lo zhes/ de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa
387b7('dul ba): dang nga rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu chos phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no// lha don
388a1('dul ba): 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun mo blangs la/ lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig dang / de la khye'u btsa' bar/
388a2('dul ba): 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ spyi ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long bzhig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsam na
388a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/
388a4('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las// dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na
388a5('dul ba): sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di
388a6('dul ba): ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i maung rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gan+da
388a7('dul ba): pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la pho nya btang ste tshig rtsub po dang /
388b1('dul ba): chas pa'i spring yig spring ba/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa
388b2('dul ba): gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo 'o ni 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar rlog go/ rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas sbag ste/ blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes/
388b3('dul ba): ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag
388b4('dul ba): gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang ba 'on
388b5('dul ba): kha rgya che bas/ gal te 'dir mchis na gdon ma 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur/
388b6('dul ba): la rba gzhon nu de rnams ni spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman
388b7('dul ba): par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon ma mchis pa dang nongs pa ma mchis pa yang spyug la/ skyon ma mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhog go// rgyal po btang snyoms su
389a1('dul ba): bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig sham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po//
389a2('dul ba): gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun
389a3('dul ba): 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas
389a4('dul ba): gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo // blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/
389a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so// de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras
389a6('dul ba): pa d+ha lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ wA 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis// de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so//
389a7('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la spras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po chas pa dang / skyed mos tshal na kun tso'i sgra thos
389b1('dul ba): soHmthos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na sra zhig 'dug blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de ltan ngas
389b2('dul ba): gzhon nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te spras pa/ lnga bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams
389b3('dul ba): sprug par chos pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na/ de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal par rigs so// rgyal
389b4('dul ba): bis bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po
389b5('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na sgo chod cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas
389b6('dul ba): mthar gyis ri bo gangs ro dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te gnas btag
389b7('dul ba): ste/ ri dgas gsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing / dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do// lang tsho dang da la bab pa'i rdegs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin
390a1('dul ba): tu nyen te sha byi ngan pa skya bo bsang bseng por gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por/
390a2('dul ba): gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so// des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang ldan
390a3('dul ba): cig 'dug cig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stong pa rnams kyis rung ngo // de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam
390a4('dul ba): nas na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi srib mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan
390a5('dul ba): cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/ drang srong ser skya sems rtse
390a6('dul ba): gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi cher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi tu
390a7('dul ba): pas so// drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan du mchi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog cig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams/
390b1('dul ba): ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas/ des gser gyi b+he ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser skyas de rnam/
390b2('dul ba): kyi gnas kyi phyir gni yongs su btang bas/ ser skya'i ga'i ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur ro// de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshigs chen por gyur to// dag pas 'phel che bar ma gyu
390b3('dul ba): lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der dong ste grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas/ lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas
390b4('dul ba): de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag sprug pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis// de lta bas na bdag
390b5('dul ba): cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o// de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi chun ma ni mi len no// de
390b6('dul ba): nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyas par
390b7('dul ba): spras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ba' zhig las stsogs pa las/ de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa nas/ gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i
391a1('dul ba): bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/
391a2('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do// de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na khu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod
391a3('dul ba): dmarta lnga rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrung nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pas brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin
391a4('dul ba): nor+yA du kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa
391a5('dul ba): yin no zhes byas pas/ de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro//
391a6('dul ba): de yang bu med par shi nas/ skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang bu med par shi nas/ lag na rgyal por gyur te// de yang bu med par shi nas/ glab po
391a7('dul ba): che 'dul rgyal por gyur tote/ de yang bu med par shi nas/ rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur te/ de'i bu gnas 'jog go// go'u ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal
391b1('dul ba): gos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang ka yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i brgyad rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing na/
391b2('dul ba): dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra'o dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shI ri na dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no// goT
391b3('dul ba): ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gum dang / seng ge'i sba'o// go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu gling gi ga'u thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni/ seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu thag+sa
391b4('dul ba): somra du go'u ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu ba'i ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre mo ma dang / tshad med ma'o//
391b5('dul ba): zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu
391b6('dul ba): gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lhas byin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do//
391b7('dul ba): dkar mo'i bu ni 'phreng ba can no// bre bo ma'i ni bzang len no// tshad med ma'i ni dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan zin yin te/ go'u ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi brgyud/
392a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa swA gtsun zir du rdzogs/ srid pa'i phreng rgyan chad/ skye ba'i 'khor ba zad de/ da ni yang srid pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
392a2('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal
392a3('dul ba): gyi bu legs so legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyed kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so//
392a4('dul ba): mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu spros shig dang / des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar
392a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/
392a6('dul ba): zung zhig/ lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs par spyod
392a7('dul ba): pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so//
392b1('dul ba): de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
392b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dang ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs
392b3('dul ba): ba skye bo dang mi ming pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang /
392b4('dul ba): ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/
392b5('dul ba): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur/
392b6('dul ba): pa na 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi
392b7('dul ba): btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngag/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su
393a1('dul ba): bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' rab me tog phun sum
393a2('dul ba): tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der/ rgyal po dus dus
393a3('dul ba): su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhag nas/ de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyam+b+ha sa su myong bar byed do// lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag
393a4('dul ba): la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig
393a5('dul ba): bya'o/ de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum pa ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to//
393a6('dul ba): rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi brgyad la 'khor las skur ba skye bar gyur kyang cim rung skam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sad la yun ring ponas
393a7('dul ba): kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur
393b1('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba kha lda na sdug pa mdzes pagayan lag dang ting
393b2('dul ba): lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal pos legs par rab sang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams
393b3('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di'i yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin skam mo// 'di btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu
393b4('dul ba): rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i skye ba'i tsho gas lam po che dang / tshong dus dang /
393b5('dul ba): gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes
393b6('dul ba): mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes
393b7('dul ba): gdags so zhes/ de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan
394a1('dul ba): rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig bca' bar 'gyur zhing / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan
394a2('dul ba): toH yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blda na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so//
394a3('dul ba): btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so// de btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya
394a4('dul ba): cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar
394a5('dul ba): gdags zhes btags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar
394a6('dul ba): 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul
394a7('dul ba): dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu gcig bca' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro 'os lung
394b1('dul ba): bstan to// cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis/
394b2('dul ba): las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dges mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par
394b3('dul ba): mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de re zhig 'dod do// cig
394b4('dul ba): shos kyang tshogs la brtags par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas/ shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng
394b5('dul ba): ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul spad
394b6('dul ba): par mi nus so// lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa zhig blangs pa de sbyin pa lta na gtang ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha
394b7('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' 'o// de nas
395a1('dul ba): shAkya rnams mgu nas/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' lags pas/ bdag cag gro ba dga'
395a2('dul ba): ba naH gzhon nu mchog cigazheng gsungs shig dbul lo// shegs ldan dag shAkye rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sras kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so// lha ci khrims
395a3('dul ba): dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa zhig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa yin no// lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/
395a4('dul ba): nas seng ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs la brtags zin gyis/ bu mo cig shos kyang smi zhig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgri ste/ gzhon nu zas
395a5('dul ba): gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang // bde
395a6('dul ba): ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang pa/ 'thub pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'a
395a7('dul ba): dang rtab lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang ldan cig steng gi khang bzang
395b1('dul ba): kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa//
395b2('dul ba): 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / brgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la
395b3('dul ba): gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas ni bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/
395b4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs
395b5('dul ba): btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtsham
395b6('dul ba): sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas
395b7('dul ba): smod par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
396a1('dul ba): rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na/
396a2('dul ba): bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang kAm he phun sum tshogs
396a3('dul ba): pad+ma slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi
396a4('dul ba): 'phreng dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan
396a5('dul ba): dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khro ba rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor
396a6('dul ba): ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
396a7('dul ba): bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas// rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad
396b1('dul ba): cen du byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ci lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyaman/
396b2('dul ba): skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba nA brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len laka mI rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no// byang chub sems dpal
396b3('dul ba): rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po
396b4('dul ba): rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs
396b5('dul ba): ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shes che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs
396b6('dul ba): so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam/
396b7('dul ba): ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas// rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis brgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na
397a1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgyad rtsi 'dra zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len sgyu ma na rigs/
397a2('dul ba): gang zhing btsun par bkur zhing / ma sems dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing / mang
397a3('dul ba): bos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas brgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar
397a4('dul ba): bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi brgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /
397a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas// rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgyud la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'
397a6('dul ba): rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dru
397a7('dul ba): zhig gi drim du nying mtshams sbyar ba len snyam na/ zung med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ nod pag can ma yin la/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon
397b1('dul ba): gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces sngon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpa' zla ba bcur rnam du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed/
397b2('dul ba): pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma
397b3('dul ba): yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/
397b4('dul ba): kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so//
397b5('dul ba): zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu
